response: agar aap taweel arsay se koshish kar rahay hain aur phir bhi haamla nahi hue hain, to aap ko ya aap ke saathi ko zarkhaizifertlity ke masail ho satke hain. masla kya hai yeh jannay ke liye aap dono ko kuch test karwanay ki zaroorat hai. mardon ke liye jismani muaina aur sperm test kya jaye ga . khawateen ke liye jismani muaina, ultrasaond test, xray, khoon ka test, urine test aur laproscopy karai jaye gi taakay zarkhaizi ke masail maloom hon . tashkhees ke baad, aap mutaliqa zarkhaizi ke ilaaj ke liye ja satke hain .

response: mardana banjh pan ke masail sperm ki kam tadaad ya naqal o harkat, toleedi aaza mein infection ya hormonal Adam tawazun ki wajah se ho satke hain. mardana banjh pan ke ziyada tar masail tanao, wazan, sharaab noshi aur cigrette noshi se jurey hue hain .

response: jism har mah aik anda peda karta hai. bacha daaniuterus ki parat aik anday ke liye tayyar karne ke liye mouti ho jati hai jo aurat ke haamla honay ki soorat mein khad daali jati hai. agar anday ko fertilise nah kya jaye to jism is se nijaat paata hai. is ke baad Aster ko jism se khoon ke tor par andaam nihanivagina ke zariye kharij kya jata hai. is mahana amal ko haiz ya muddat kaha jata hai. lehaza jab kisi larki ko mahvari hoti hai, to is ke jism se khoon ki thori si miqdaar aur kuch ghair zaroori tissues nikaltay hain. yeh tamam khawateen ke liye aik fitri, normal jismani amal hai kyunkay woh aurat ban jati hain aur jismani tor par baaligh hoti hain .

response: haan, yeh mumkin hai. kyun? kuch mahino mein, aap ka mahvari pichlle mahinay ki nisbat ziyada ya kam dinon tak jari reh sakta hai. ya aap ka cycle pehlay ya baad mein shuru ho sakta hai. agar aap ka aam tor par baqaida cycle hai, to aap ke cycle mein tabdeeli tibbi haalat ki nishandahi kar sakti hai. kisi bhi tashweesh ki soorat mein, barah karam infiradi tibbi mahswara haasil karne ke liye apne doctor se baat karen

response: baaz auqaat be qaida mahvari kuch adwiyaat, bohat ziyada werzish, bohat kam ya bohat ziyada jismani wazan, aur hormonal adam tawazunimbalance ki wajah se ho sakti hai. agar aap ko lagta hai ke aap ko be qaida mahvari hai to barah karam apne dr se rujoo karen .

response: be qaida mahvari ke liye aam tor par apne dr se mahswara karne ki koi fori wajah nahi hoti. lekin agar aap fikar mand hain to barah karam aisa karen. agar aap ko Maney hamal ki zaroorat ho to aap ka dr aap ko hormonal Maney hamal adwiyaat tajweez karkay is mein aap ki madad karsaktha hai jo nah sirf ghair iraadi hamal ko qabil aetmaad tareeqay se roktay hain balkay aap ke mahvari ko bhi mustahkam kar saktay hain taakay aap apne mahvari ke liye behtar mansoobah bandi kar saken .

response: mahvari ki be qaadgyon ki mojoodgi deegar sehat ke masail ki alamat ho sakti hai jaisay ke thyroid ki bemari, poi, endometriosis, pcos, polyps, aur uterine fibroids agar ilaaj nah kya jaye to mahvari ki be qaidgi deegar halaat ka baais ban sakti hai ya is mein hissa daal sakti hai. yeh mumkina halaat mahvari ki be qaidgi ki qisam ke lehaaz se mukhtalif hoti hain, lekin kuch mein bacha daaniuterus ki parat ka gaarha hona  jisay endometrial hyperplasia kaha jata hai , hadion ki kam kasafat, aur iron ki kami ka khoon ki kami shaamil hain. mahvari ki be qaidgi wali aurat ke liye yeh zaroori hai ke woh be qaidgi ki wajah ka taayun karne ke liye sehat ki dekh bhaal karne walay se baat kere aur zaroorat ke mutabiq munasib ilaaj haasil kere .

context/3: kya woh cancer ka baais ban satke hain ?
context/4: mahvari ki be qaadgyon ki mojoodgi deegar sehat ke masail ki alamat ho sakti hai jaisay ke thyroid ki bemari, poi, endometriosis, pcos, polyps, aur uterine fibroids agar ilaaj nah kya jaye to mahvari ki be qaidgi deegar halaat ka baais ban sakti hai ya is mein hissa daal sakti hai. yeh mumkina halaat mahvari ki be qaidgi ki qisam ke lehaaz se mukhtalif hoti hain, lekin kuch mein bacha daaniuterus ki parat ka gaarha hona  jisay endometrial hyperplasia kaha jata hai , hadion ki kam kasafat, aur iron ki kami ka khoon ki kami shaamil hain. mahvari ki be qaidgi wali aurat ke liye yeh zaroori hai ke woh be qaidgi ki wajah ka taayun karne ke liye sehat ki dekh bhaal karne walay se baat kere aur zaroorat ke mutabiq munasib ilaaj haasil kere .
context/5: kya yeh be zaabtgiirregularities sehat ke deegar masail ka baais ban sakti hai ?

response: tampon aik mahvari ki masnoaat hai jo haiz ke douran andaam nihanivagina mein daakhil karkay khoon aur andaam nihanivagina ki secretion ko jazb karne ke liye design ki gayi hai. pad ke bar aks, yeh androoni tor par andaam nihanivagina ki naali ke andar rakha jata hai. aik baar sahih tareeqay se daakhil karne ke baad, andaam nihanivagina ke zareya aik tampon ko jagah par rakha jata hai aur yeh mahvari ke khoon ko jazb karne ke sath phialta hai .

context/1: mahvari ka cup mahvari se mutaliq hifzaan sehat ka aala hai jo haiz ke douran andaam nihanivagina mein daakhil kya jata hai. is ka maqsad mahvari ke seyal ko jama karna hai. mahvari ke cupp aam tor par lachak dar slikon se banay hotay hain
context/2: menstrual cups kya hote hai
context/3: tampon aik mahvari ki masnoaat hai jo haiz ke douran andaam nihanivagina mein daakhil karkay khoon aur andaam nihanivagina ki secretion ko jazb karne ke liye design ki gayi hai. pad ke bar aks, yeh androoni tor par andaam nihanivagina ki naali ke andar rakha jata hai. aik baar sahih tareeqay se daakhil karne ke baad, andaam nihanivagina ke zareya aik tampon ko jagah par rakha jata hai aur yeh mahvari ke khoon ko jazb karne ke sath phialta hai .
context/4: tampons kya hai
context/5: mahvari ka sponge ya period sponge aik qisam ka sponge hai jo dobarah qabil e istemaal hai. sponge ko naram karne ke liye usay garam pani se geela karen, izafi pani ko nikaalte ke liye nichorain aur ahthyat se apni andaam nihanivagina mein daakhil karen. yeh aap ki andaam nihanivagina ke andar khoon ko jazb aur barqarar rakhay ga .

response: mahvari ke dard aur dard ko kam karne ke liye aap darj zail cheeze aazma satke hain : apne pait ya kamar ke nichale hissay par hating pad rakhna, ya garam ghusal karna. dard aap ki mahvari ka aik khobsorat mayaari hissa hai. lekin agar aap ki mahvari ka dard itna takleef da hai ke aap roz marrah ki zindagi mein hissa nahi le satke to barah karam apne doctor se rujoo karen .

response: Mere mahwaari ka rang ajeeb hai. Mai kya karun
context: sehat mand mahvari ka khoon aam tor par roshan surkh se gehray bhooray ya siyah tak mukhtalif hota hai. khoon ya kharij honay wala madah jo naranji ya surmai rang ka ho kisi infection ki nishandahi kar sakta hai .
context/0: Aik aam mahwaari ka rang kya hota hai
context/1: dard naak mahvari ke dard bohat ziyada mahvari khoon behnay ya endometriosis ki wajah se ho saktay hain. endometriosis mein, bacha daaniuterus ke Aster walay khaliyaat ya tissue, bacha daaniuterus ke bahar barhatay hain. aap ko apne dr se milna chahiye jo khoon ki jaanch kar sakta hai aur aap ki history haasil kar sakta hai taakay aap ko behtar honay mein madad miley .
context/2: mujhe lagta hai ke meri mahwaari ke dard bohat takleef deh hai
context/3: mahvari ke dard aur dard ko kam karne ke liye aap darj zail cheeze aazma satke hain : apne pait ya kamar ke nichale hissay par hating pad rakhna, ya garam ghusal karna. dard aap ki mahvari ka aik khobsorat mayaari hissa hai. lekin agar aap ki mahvari ka dard itna takleef da hai ke aap roz marrah ki zindagi mein hissa nahi le satke to barah karam apne doctor se rujoo karen .
context/4: mai iska intezaam kaise karsakti hun

response: yeh rang sust bahao ki tajweez karta hai. ziyada tar logon ke liye, cycle ke douran khoon gehra ho jata hai. is ki wajah yeh hai ke bacha daaniuterus ke Aster ke gehray hisson se purana khoon baad mein bahaya jata hai. aap ki paidaiesh ke baad ke hafton mein bhoora khoon bhi aam hai. taham, baaz sooraton mein gehra surkh ya bhoora khoon hamal ki ibtidayi alamat ho sakta hai aur siyah khoon andaam nihanivagina ki rukawat ki alamat ho sakta hai. agar yeh rang aap ke liye ghair mutawaqqa ya ghair mamooli hain to apne health care faraham kanandah se baat karen .

context/1: jee haan, safaid madah ka tajurbah karna bilkul aam baat hai. yeh aap ke poooray daur mein mukhtalif hota hai. aap ke cycle ke shuru aur aakhir mein is ka hona aam hai. jaisay hi aap beza daani  anday ka ikhraj  ke qareeb pahunchte hain aap ko wahan balgham nazar aata hai  yeh anday ki safedi ki terhan lagta hai . aap ka jism beza daani ke din is qisam ke andaam nihanivagina se kharij honay walay madah ki sab se ziyada miqdaar peda karta hai lehaza aap is waqt panty liners pehnana chahain ge .
context/2: kabhi kabhi jab mai mahwaari mai hoti hun, mujhe apne zair e jaama mai safeed cheezain milti hai. Kya ye normal hai
context/3: aap ki mahvari ke douran waqtan foqatan kuch jhuriyan nazar aana bilkul mamool ki baat hai. yeh khoon ke jamnay hain jin mein tissue shaamil ho satke hain. jaisa ke bacha daaniuterus apni Aster ko bahati hai, yeh tissue mahvari ke qudrati hissay ke tor par jism se nikal jata hai. lehaza tissue ke jamnay aam tor par fikar mand honay ki koi cheez nahi hai .
context/4: mere mahvari mein chhootey jamnay kya hain ?
context/5: nahi, jis terhan musalman namaz, roza ya muqaddas kitaab ko haath nahi laga satke, deen islam is ki ijazat nahi deta .

response: mahvari se pehlay ki sab se ziyada aam alamaat afsurdah mizaaj, ghusse mein phootna, chirchira pan, iztiraab, uljan, samaji dast bardari, chhaati mein narmi, pait ka phoolna, sir dard, aur aaza ki soojan hain. tibbi mohqiqeen ab bhi un alamaat ki sahih wajah ki nishandahi par kaam kar rahay hain, lekin yeh yakeeni hai ke un ka talluq mahvari ke douran harmons ke utaar charhao se hai. agar aap un alamaat mein bohat ziyada mubtala hain to barah karam apne dr se baat karen .

response: aap apni mahvari se aik hafta pehlay werzish karna, namkeen khaano ko chhorna, aur caffeine ko kam karna chahtay hain. agar aap ka mood ab bhi mushkil hai to apne dr se baat karen. woh aap ko dawa lainay ka mahswara day satke hain .

response: jism har mah aik anda peda karta hai. bacha daaniuterus ki parat aik anday ke liye tayyar karne ke liye mouti ho jati hai jo aurat ke haamla honay ki soorat mein khad daali jati hai. agar anday ko frtilayz nah kya jaye to jism is se nijaat paata hai. is ke baad Aster ko jism se khoon ke tor par andaam nihanivagina ke zariye kharij kya jata hai. is mahana amal ko haiz ya muddat kaha jata hai. lehaza jab kisi larki ko mahvari hoti hai, to is ke jism se khoon ki thori si miqdaar aur kuch ghair zaroori tissues nikaltay hain. yeh tamam khawateen ke liye aik fitri, normal jismani amal hai kyunkay woh aurat ban jati hain aur jismani tor par baaligh hoti hain .

response: mahvari aam tor par 12 saal ki umar mein shuru hoti hai, halaank kuch larkiyan inhen pehlay ya baad mein shuru kar deti hain. adwaar shuru honay mein takheer aam tor par tashweesh ka baais nahi hoti. ziyada tar larkiyon ko 16 se 18 saal ki umar mein baqaidagi se mahvari anay lagti hai .

context/2: jism har mah aik anda peda karta hai. bacha daaniuterus ki parat aik anday ke liye tayyar karne ke liye mouti ho jati hai jo aurat ke haamla honay ki soorat mein khad daali jati hai. agar anday ko frtilayz nah kya jaye to jism is se nijaat paata hai. is ke baad Aster ko jism se khoon ke tor par andaam nihanivagina ke zariye kharij kya jata hai. is mahana amal ko haiz ya muddat kaha jata hai. lehaza jab kisi larki ko mahvari hoti hai, to is ke jism se khoon ki thori si miqdaar aur kuch ghair zaroori tissues nikaltay hain. yeh tamam khawateen ke liye aik fitri, normal jismani amal hai kyunkay woh aurat ban jati hain aur jismani tor par baaligh hoti hain .
context/3: Hamay mahvari kuyn hoti hai?
context/4: aap apni mahvari se aik hafta pehlay werzish karna, namkeen khaano ko chhorna, aur caffeine ko kam karna chahtay hain. agar aap ka mood ab bhi mushkil hai to apne dr se baat karen. woh aap ko dawa lainay ka mahswara day satke hain .
context/5: Me is ki alamaat ko kis tarah munazam karsakti hun?

response: Mahvari kitni lambi chalti hai?
context: menopause woh waqt hai jo aap ke mahvari ke ekhtataam ki nishandahi karta hai. is ki tashkhees is waqt hoti hai jab aap 12 mah baghair haiz ke guzar chuke hon. rajunoortimenopause aap ke 40 ya 50 ki dahai mein hosakti hai .

response: mahvari ka khoon isi khoon se bana hota hai jo aap ki ragon se beh raha hai, lekin is mein woh tissue bhi hota hai jo aap ki bacha daaniuterus ki parat se baha hota hai. is liye is ka rang aur mustaqil mizaji is se mukhtalif hai jo aap dekhen ge ke agar aap apni ungli kaat den ge .

response: aap ke mahvari ka asal bahao ziyada mehsoos nahi hota jab yeh ho raha hai. imkanaat hain, aap ko yeh mehsoos bhi nahi hoga ke yeh bahar aata hai. jab aap waqai apni mahvari shuru karte hain, to aap ko apne private hissay mein kuch nami mehsoos hosakti hai  yeh aap ke zair jama par khoon ke chand dhabbon ki wajah se ho sakta hai .

response: sehat mand mahvari mein khoon ki halki bo aa sakti hai. un mein lohay aur bacteria se halki si dhaati bo bhi ho sakti hai, tanbay ke sakay ki terhan. aam tor par, muddat ki badboo doosron ke liye qabil tawajah nahi hai. hifzaan sehat ke achay tareeqay mamool ki badboo se bhi lar satke hain aur mahvari ke douran aap ko ziyada aaraam da bana satke hain .

response: mahvari khud takleef nahi deti, lekin kuch larkiyon aur khawateen ko mahvari ke douran dard ya deegar alamaat hoti hain jo takleef da hosakti hain. yeh aam tor par haiz ke douran aap ke jism se kharij honay walay harmons ki wajah se hota hai jis ki wajah se bacha daaniuterus suker jati hai taakay yeh is ke Aster ko baha sakay .

context/5: aap ke mahvari ka asal bahao ziyada mehsoos nahi hota jab yeh ho raha hai. imkanaat hain, aap ko yeh mehsoos bhi nahi hoga ke yeh bahar aata hai. jab aap waqai apni mahvari shuru karte hain, to aap ko apne private hissay mein kuch nami mehsoos hosakti hai  yeh aap ke zair jama par khoon ke chand dhabbon ki wajah se ho sakta hai .

response: ziyada tar larkiyan mahvari ke douran taqreeban 60 mili letter  taqreeban 4 khanay ke chamach  pani se mahroom ho jati hain  ziyada tar pehlay chand dinon mein . pareshan honay ki koi baat nahi, agarchay aap ka jism is ke liye tayyar hai .
context: Meray mahvari me kitna khoon nikalta hai?
context/0: aap ki mahvari aap ko un kamon se roknay ki zaroorat nahi hai jo aap aam tor par karte hain. aap ab bhi school ja satke hain, ghar mein madad kar satke hain, apne doston ko dekh satke hain, khail khail satke hain aur woh tamam kaam kar satke hain jo aap aam tor par karte hain .
context/1: Kia koi aisi chez hai jo me mahvari me nahi karsakti?
context/2: mahvari khud takleef nahi deti, lekin kuch larkiyon aur khawateen ko mahvari ke douran dard ya deegar alamaat hoti hain jo takleef da hosakti hain. yeh aam tor par haiz ke douran aap ke jism se kharij honay walay harmons ki wajah se hota hai jis ki wajah se bacha daaniuterus suker jati hai taakay yeh is ke Aster ko baha sakay .

response: aap ki mahvari ke douran waqtan foqatan kuch jhuriyan nazar aana bilkul mamool ki baat hai. yeh khoon ke jamnay hain jin mein tissue shaamil ho satke hain. jaisa ke bacha daaniuterus apni Aster ko bahati hai, yeh tissue mahvari ke qudrati hissay ke tor par jism se nikal jata hai. lehaza tissue ke jamnay aam tor par fikar mand honay ki koi cheez nahi hai .

response: haan, yeh mumkin hai. kyun? kuch mahino mein, aap ka mahvari pichlle mahinay ki nisbat ziyada ya kam dinon tak jari reh sakta hai. ya aap ka cycle pehlay se pehlay ya baad mein shuru ho sakta hai. agar aap ke paas aam tor par baqaida cycle hai, to aap ke cycle mein tabdeeli tibbi haalat ki nishandahi kar sakti hai. kisi bhi tashweesh ki soorat mein, barah karam infiradi tibbi mahswara haasil karne ke liye apne dr se baat karen .

response: mamool se halka haiz aam tor par tashweesh ka baais nahi hota hai. log aksar dekhte hain ke un ki mahvari ka bahao maheena bah maheena mukhtalif hota hai, aur kuch mahinay qudrati tor par doosron ke muqablay halkay hotay hain. darj zail awamil mahvari ko mamool se halka kar satke hain : beza daani ki kami, wazan kam hona, tanao, hamal ya tibbi haalat. infiradi tibbi mahswara haasil karne ke liye barah karam apne dr se baat karen. woh yeh bhi bta satke hain ke Maney hamal tareeqay aap ke mahvari ke dard ko kaisay kam kar satke hain .

response: tum tanha naahi ho! cycle se mutaliq alamaat das mein se aath khawateen ko un ki zarkhaiz zindagi ke douran kisi nah kisi marhalay par mehsoos hoti hain. agar aap pareshaniyon ke baray mein shikayat karte hain jaisay ke zaroorat se ziyada khwahisaat, aap ko aisi alamaat ka saamna karna par sakta hai jo aap ki behan ya aap ke behtareen dost se mukhtalif hon. yahan tak ke agar aap ki alamaat kisi aur se millti jalti hain, to aap inhen kam o besh shiddat se mehsoos kar satke hain. agar aap mustaqil bunyadon par un alamaat mein se kisi ka shikaar rehtay hain, to hamesha aap ki mahvari shuru honay se chand din pehlay, apne dr se baat karen .
context: Kia Cycle se mutaliq alaamat aam hai?
context/0: mamool se halka haiz aam tor par tashweesh ka baais nahi hota hai. log aksar dekhte hain ke un ki mahvari ka bahao maheena bah maheena mukhtalif hota hai, aur kuch mahinay qudrati tor par doosron ke muqablay halkay hotay hain. darj zail awamil mahvari ko mamool se halka kar satke hain : beza daani ki kami, wazan kam hona, tanao, hamal ya tibbi haalat. infiradi tibbi mahswara haasil karne ke liye barah karam apne dr se baat karen. woh yeh bhi bta satke hain ke Maney hamal tareeqay aap ke mahvari ke dard ko kaisay kam kar satke hain .
context/1: Mahvari ke darmian kum khoon anay ki waja kia hai?
context/2: haan, yeh mumkin hai. kyun? kuch mahino mein, aap ka mahvari pichlle mahinay ki nisbat ziyada ya kam dinon tak jari reh sakta hai. ya aap ka cycle pehlay se pehlay ya baad mein shuru ho sakta hai. agar aap ke paas aam tor par baqaida cycle hai, to aap ke cycle mein tabdeeli tibbi haalat ki nishandahi kar sakti hai. kisi bhi tashweesh ki soorat mein, barah karam infiradi tibbi mahswara haasil karne ke liye apne dr se baat karen .
context/3: Kia Mahinay me do dafa mahvari aana theek hai?
context/4: rajunortimenopause is waqt hoti hai jab hormone ki kam satah ki wajah se aap ki mahvari ruk jati hai. yeh aam tor par 45 aur 55 saal ki umar ke darmiyan hota hai .
context/5: rajunortimenopausemenopause kia hai?

response: 815 saal ki umar ke darmiyan  aam tor par , tamam larkiyan zindagi ke is marhalay se guzarti hain jisay baloghat kaha jata hai. yeh taizi se bherne ke sath shuru hota hai  lehaza aap kuch inch barhatay hain, aap ki chatiyon mein kaliyan aati hain, aur phir hanptay hain  nai jaghon par baal! aakhir mein aap apne zair jama par aik chip chapa safaid madah dekh satke hain. theek hai! yeh sirf aap ka jism apni pehli muddat ke liye tayari kar raha hai. aik baar aisa honay ke baad, aap bazabta tor par club mein shaamil ho gaye hain .

response: hamein yaqeen nahi hai ke khwahisaat aur pms ke deegar alamaat ka asal sabab kya hai, lekin aisa lagta hai ke harmons mulawis hain. kuch khawateen waqai mein ice kareem, chocolate aur aalo ke chips jaisay khanay ki khwahish karti hain jab un ki mahvari aati hai. kuch meetha chahiye? is ke bajaye phalon tak pohnchain. charbi wali, tali hui ya chiknai wali ghazayen chahtay hain? saalman aur giri daar meway jaisay sehat mand charbi walay khanay ka intikhab karen .

response: yaad rakhen, aap ki muddat ya aap ke jism mein honay wali tabdeelion ke baray mein baat karne mein koi sharam ki baat nahi hai! yeh aik qudrati aur sehat mand amal hai aur usay mahana haasil karne ka matlab hai ke aap ka jism apna kaam kar raha hai. is ke ilawa, apne saathi ke sath apni muddat ke baray mein khil kar baat karna doosri ahem baat cheet mein shaamil honay ke liye aik ahem pehla qadam hai, jaisay birth control ya jinsi taluqaat. agar aap abhi tak apni mahvari ke baray mein baat karne mein raahat mehsoos nahi karte hain, to ghhor karen ke kya jinsi tor par faaal honay ke kisi bhi faislay ko is waqt tak rokna behtar hoga jab tak ke aap aur aap ka saathi un mozuaat ke baray mein khil kar baat nah kar len .

response: mahvari ki be qaadgyon ki mojoodgi deegar sehat ke masail ki alamat ho sakti hai jaisay ke thyroid ki bemari, poi, endometriosis, pcos, polyps, aur uterine fibroids agar ilaaj nah kya jaye to mahvari ki be qaidgi deegar halaat ka baais ban sakti hai ya is mein hissa daal sakti hai. yeh mumkina halaat mahvari ki be qaidgi ki qisam ke lehaaz se mukhtalif hoti hain, lekin kuch mein bacha daaniuterus ki parat ka gaarha hona  jisay endometrial hyperplasia kaha jata hai , hadion ki kam kasafat, aur iron ki kami ka khoon ki kami shaamil hain. mahvari ki be qaidgi wali aurat ke liye yeh zaroori hai ke woh be qaidgi ki wajah ka taayun karne ke liye sehat ki dekh bhaal karne walay se baat kere aur zaroorat ke mutabiq munasib ilaaj haasil kere .

context/1: haan tum kar satke ho. hamein tasleem karna parre ga ke yeh qadray gumraah kin ho sakta hai, lekin haan, aap apni pehli mahvari se pehlay haamla ho sakti hain aur is ki wajah yeh hai : haamla hona beza daani se mutaliq hai. beza daani ka matlab yeh hai ke aap ki beza daani aik anda kharij karti hai jo mardana nutfa ke zariye khaadne ke liye tayyar hai. aap ka pehla beza aap ki pehli mahvari se taqreeban 2 haftay pehlay hota hai .
context/2: kya mein haamla ho sakti hon agar mujhe kabhi haiz nahi aaya ?
context/3: yaad rakhen, aap ki muddat ya aap ke jism mein honay wali tabdeelion ke baray mein baat karne mein koi sharam ki baat nahi hai! yeh aik qudrati aur sehat mand amal hai aur usay mahana haasil karne ka matlab hai ke aap ka jism apna kaam kar raha hai. is ke ilawa, apne saathi ke sath apni muddat ke baray mein khil kar baat karna doosri ahem baat cheet mein shaamil honay ke liye aik ahem pehla qadam hai, jaisay birth control ya jinsi taluqaat. agar aap abhi tak apni mahvari ke baray mein baat karne mein raahat mehsoos nahi karte hain, to ghhor karen ke kya jinsi tor par faaal honay ke kisi bhi faislay ko is waqt tak rokna behtar hoga jab tak ke aap aur aap ka saathi un mozuaat ke baray mein khil kar baat nah kar len .
context/4: kya mein apne shohar ko bta dun ke mein mahvari par hon ?
context/5: hamein yaqeen nahi hai ke khwahisaat aur pms ke deegar alamaat ka asal sabab kya hai, lekin aisa lagta hai ke harmons mulawis hain. kuch khawateen waqai mein ice kareem, chocolate aur aalo ke chips jaisay khanay ki khwahish karti hain jab un ki mahvari aati hai. kuch meetha chahiye? is ke bajaye phalon tak pohnchain. charbi wali, tali hui ya chiknai wali ghazayen chahtay hain? saalman aur giri daar meway jaisay sehat mand charbi walay khanay ka intikhab karen .

response: mahvari ki be qaidgi aksar bunyadi haalat ki alamat hoti hai aur baaz sooraton mein, bunyadi haalat cancer ke ziyada khatray se munsalik ho sakti hai. misaal ke tor par, ghair haazir aur fasid mahvari estrogen ki pedawar se wabasta hai lekin progesterone ki pedawar taqreeban 14  khawateen mein endometrial cancer se wabasta nahi hai, agar yeh masla baar baar hota hai. 70. 4 saal ki umar ke baad dambagarinti ka cancer mahvari ki be qaadgyon jaisay ke bohat ziyada ya taweel mahvari ka khoon behna cancer se wabasta nahi hai .

response: mahvari ke douran bohat ziyada khoon behnay ki wajah se dard naak doraniye ke dard ho satke hain, jo aksar aap ko apni mahvari ke ird gird roz marrah ki zindagi mein hissa lainay par assar andaaz hota hai. ya woh endometriosis ki wajah se ho saktay hain. is takleef da haalat mein bacha daaniuterus ke andar mojood khaliyaat ya tissue bacha daaniuterus ke bahar barhatay hain. aap ko apne dr se milna chahiye jo khoon ki jaanch kar sakta hai aur aap ki history haasil kar sakta hai taakay aap ko behtar honay mein madad miley. kuch hormonal Maney hamal adwiyaat un khawateen ya larkiyon ke liye registered hain jin ko mahvari mein bohat ziyada khoon aata hai jinhein Maney hamal ki bhi zaroorat hoti hai .

response: mahvari ke dard aur dard ko kam karne ke liye aap darj zail cheeze aazma satke hain : apne pait ya kamar ke nichale hissay par hating pad rakhna, ya garam ghusal karna. dard aap ki mahvari ka aik khobsorat mayaari hissa hai. lekin agar aap ki mahvari ka dard itna takleef da hai ke aap roz marrah ki zindagi mein hissa nahi le satke to barah karam apne dr se rujoo karen .

context/1: mahvari ke dard aur dard ko kam karne ke liye aap darj zail cheeze aazma satke hain : apne pait ya kamar ke nichale hissay par hating pad rakhna, ya garam ghusal karna. dard aap ki mahvari ka aik khobsorat mayaari hissa hai. lekin agar aap ki mahvari ka dard itna takleef da hai ke aap roz marrah ki zindagi mein hissa nahi le satke to barah karam apne dr se rujoo karen .
context/2: mahvari ke dard ko kaisay kam kya jaye ?
context/3: mahvari ke douran bohat ziyada khoon behnay ki wajah se dard naak doraniye ke dard ho satke hain, jo aksar aap ko apni mahvari ke ird gird roz marrah ki zindagi mein hissa lainay par assar andaaz hota hai. ya woh endometriosis ki wajah se ho saktay hain. is takleef da haalat mein bacha daaniuterus ke andar mojood khaliyaat ya tissue bacha daaniuterus ke bahar barhatay hain. aap ko apne dr se milna chahiye jo khoon ki jaanch kar sakta hai aur aap ki history haasil kar sakta hai taakay aap ko behtar honay mein madad miley. kuch hormonal Maney hamal adwiyaat un khawateen ya larkiyon ke liye registered hain jin ko mahvari mein bohat ziyada khoon aata hai jinhein Maney hamal ki bhi zaroorat hoti hai .
context/4: merray mahvari ke dard itnay takleef da kyun hain ?
context/5: mahvari ki be qaidgi aksar bunyadi haalat ki alamat hoti hai aur baaz sooraton mein, bunyadi haalat cancer ke ziyada khatray se munsalik ho sakti hai. misaal ke tor par, ghair haazir aur fasid mahvari estrogen ki pedawar se wabasta hai lekin progesterone ki pedawar taqreeban 14  khawateen mein endometrial cancer se wabasta nahi hai, agar yeh masla baar baar hota hai. 70. 4 saal ki umar ke baad dambagarinti ka cancer mahvari ki be qaadgyon jaisay ke bohat ziyada ya taweel mahvari ka khoon behna cancer se wabasta nahi hai .

response: hormonal adam tawazunimbalance ka matlab hai ke khawateen ya larkiyon mein kisi khaas hormone ki miqdaar bohat ziyada ya bohat kam hoti hai  jaisay estrogen aur progesterone . hormonal adam tawazunimbalance deegar cheezon ke ilawa ghair mamooli tor par ziyada tanao, chout, sadme aur thyroid ke masail ki wajah se ho sakta hai. khoon ke test ke zariye khoon mein estrogen, progesterone, testosterone, thyroxin, insoline aur cortisol ki satah ka pata lagaya ja sakta hai. barah karam infiradi tibbi mashwaray ke liye apne dr se baat karen. hormonal adam tawazunimbalance fasid mahvari ki wajah ho sakta hai. fasid mahvari is waqt hoti hai jab mahvari ki lambai musalsal badalti rehti hai. nojawan khawateen jin ke cycle abhi itnay achay tareeqay se qaim nahi hue hain un mein aksar hormonal utaar charhao hota hai jo be qaida mahvari ka sabab ban sakta hai .

context: jab aap ka haiz ka khoon chamakdar surkh hota hai, to is ka matlab hai ke yeh aap ke reham mein daakhil honay ke kaafi jald baad aap ki andaam nihanivagina se guzar gaya. aap ko apni mahvari ke aaghaz mein roshan surkh khoon dekhnay ka ziyada imkaan hai. jab aap ko dard hota hai to aap baaz auqaat roshan khoon bhi dekh satke hain. is ki wajah yeh hai ke dard is waqt hota hai jab aap ka bacha daaniuterus suker jata hai, aur sankejancontractions se khoon ka bahao ziyada hota hai .
context/0: Meray Mahvari ka khoon Roshan Lal hai
context/1: hormonal adam tawazunimbalance ki alamaat mein bhaari ya be qaida mahvari, balon ka patla hona ya girna, wazan barhna ya wazan kam hona, raat ko paseena aana aur bohat kuch shaamil hain .
context/2: hormonal adam tawazunimbalance ki alamaat kya hain ?
context/3: hormonal adam tawazunimbalance ka matlab hai ke khawateen ya larkiyon mein kisi khaas hormone ki miqdaar bohat ziyada ya bohat kam hoti hai  jaisay estrogen aur progesterone . hormonal adam tawazunimbalance deegar cheezon ke ilawa ghair mamooli tor par ziyada tanao, chout, sadme aur thyroid ke masail ki wajah se ho sakta hai. khoon ke test ke zariye khoon mein estrogen, progesterone, testosterone, thyroxin, insoline aur cortisol ki satah ka pata lagaya ja sakta hai. barah karam infiradi tibbi mashwaray ke liye apne dr se baat karen .
context/4: hormonal adam tawazunimbalance ki kya wajah hai ?
context/5: hormonal adam tawazunimbalance ka matlab hai ke khawateen ya larkiyon mein kisi khaas hormone ki miqdaar bohat ziyada ya bohat kam hoti hai  jaisay estrogen aur progesterone . hormonal adam tawazunimbalance deegar cheezon ke ilawa ghair mamooli tor par ziyada tanao, chout, sadme aur thyroid ke masail ki wajah se ho sakta hai. khoon ke test ke zariye khoon mein estrogen, progesterone, testosterone, thyroxin, insoline aur cortisol ki satah ka pata lagaya ja sakta hai. barah karam infiradi tibbi mashwaray ke liye apne dr se baat karen. hormonal adam tawazunimbalance fasid mahvari ki wajah ho sakta hai. fasid mahvari is waqt hoti hai jab mahvari ki lambai musalsal badalti rehti hai. nojawan khawateen jin ke cycle abhi itnay achay tareeqay se qaim nahi hue hain un mein aksar hormonal utaar charhao hota hai jo be qaida mahvari ka sabab ban sakta hai .

response: yeh rang sust bahao ki tajweez karte hain. ziyada tar logon ke liye, cycle ke douran khoon gehra ho jata hai. is ki wajah yeh hai ke bacha daaniuterus ke Aster ke gehray hisson se purana khoon baad mein bahaya jata hai. aap ki paidaiesh ke baad ke hafton mein bhoora khoon bhi aam hai. taham, baaz sooraton mein gehra surkh ya bhoora khoon hamal ki ibtidayi alamat ho sakta hai aur siyah khoon andaam nihanivagina ki rukawat ki alamat ho sakta hai. agar yeh rang aap ke liye ghair mutawaqqa ya ghair mamooli hain to apne health care faraham kanandah se baat karen .

response: mahvari ke dard aur dard ko kam karne ke liye aap darj zail cheeze aazma satke hain: apne pait ya kamar ke nichale hissay par hating pad rakhna, ya garam ghusal karna. dard aap ki mahvari ka aik khobsorat mayaari hissa hai. lekin agar aap ki mahvari ka dard itna takleef da hai ke aap roz marrah ki zindagi mein hissa nahi le satke to barah karam apne doctor se rujoo karen.

response: mamool se halka ya bhari haiz aam tor par tashweesh ka baais nahi hota hai. log aksar dekhte hain ke un ki mahvari ka bahao maheena bah maheena mukhtalif hota hai, aur kuch mahinay qudrati tor par doosron ke muqablay halkay hotay hain. darj zail awamil mahvari ko mamool se halka kar satke hain : beza daani ki kami, wazan kam hona, tanao, hamal ya tibbi haalat. infiradi tibbi mahswara haasil karne ke liye barah karam apne dr se baat karen. woh yeh bhi bta satke hain ke Maney hamal tareeqay aap ke mahvari ke dard ko kaisay kam kar satke hain .

response: Agar aapko periods ke dauran itching aur irritation ho rahi hai, toh aap cotton ke underwear istemaal karein aur har roz nahayein. response: Periods ke baad acne hone ki wajah hormones ho sakte hain. Aap apne diet par dhyan rakhein aur junk food, oily food, aur processed food se door rahein. Apne chehre ko har roz saaf rakhein aur noncomedogenic skincare products ka istemaal karein. Iske alawa, aap ek dermatologist se consult kar sakti hain, jo aapko acne ke liye sahi treatment suggest karenge.

response: Hi. Periods ke saath ovulation hota hai, jo ki usually 14th day se shuru hota hai. Agar aapki periods ki cycle 28 din ki hai, toh aapke ovulation day 14th day hoga. response: Aapko periods ke dauran apne baalo ko regularly shampoo karne ki zarurat hai, taaki scalp clean rahe. response: aam andaam nihanivagina kharij honay wala madahdischarge saaf ya safaid rang mein hota hai. rang aap ke poooray daur mein mukhtalif ho sakta hai . aap ke cycle ke shuru aur aakhir mein is ka hona aam hai . jaisay hi aap beza daani  anday ka ikhraj  ke qareeb pahunchte hain aap ko wahan balgham nazar aata hai  yeh anday ki safedi ki terhan lagta hai  . aap ka jism beza daani ke din is qisam ke andaam nihanivagina se kharij honay walay madahdischarge ki sab se ziyada miqdaar peda karta hai taakay aap is waqt liner pehnana chahtay hain .

response: jee haan. jismani madahdischarge aur ghair mamooli madahdischarge. jismani madahdischarge aam tor par mahvari ke wast mein hota hai, hamal ke douran bhi hormonal tabdeelion ki wajah se. is madahdischarge se badboo nahi aati aur saaf hai. ghair mamooli madahdischarge khameer ke infection, rajonoorti, ya jinsi tor par muntaqil honay walay infection ki wajah se ho sakta hai .

response: yeh infection candida, aik fungus ki wajah se hota hai . is se andaam nihanivagina se gaarha safaid kareemi madahdischarge kharij hota hai, kharish aur andaam nihanivagina ke gird surkhi hoti hai. kharij honay wala madahdischarge bo ke baghair hai . phaphondi aam tor par garam martoob mahol mein barhti hai is liye andaam nihanivagina ke ilaqay ko saaf aur khushk rakhnay ka mahswara diya jata hai .

response: pH tezabiyat ka pemana hai aur usay 014 ke pemanay par mapa jata hai. kam pi each value  7 se kam  ko tezabi samjha jata hai. aam andaam nihanivagina ka pi each tezabi hai  3. 84. 5 . yeh aam pi each aam andaam nihanivagina keeray ke sahih tawazun se barqarar rehta hai, jab yeh tawazun baggar jata hai to pi each mutasir hota hai jis ke nateejay mein mukhtalif infection hotay hain . misaal ke tor par, bacterial vaginosis ki soorat mein andaam nihanivagina ka pi each alkaline ho jata hai aur thrush ki soorat mein yeh ziyada tezabi ho jata hai .

response: andaam nihanivagina ki aik ajeeb bo hai, is ke ilawa deegar qisam ki badboo bhi hai jo kisi bhi ghair mamooli baat ki nishandahi karti hai . ghair mamooli badboo mein machhli ki badboo bhi shaamil hai jo bacterial vaginosis ki soorat mein hoti hai aur jinsi tor par muntaqil honay walay infection mein se aik jisay trichomoniasis kehte hain . agar aap andaam nihanivagina ke infection ko dekh rahay hain, to aam tor par badboo ke sath sharamgah mein kisi qisam ka madahdischarge, laali aur dard hota hai .

response: private part mein danay niklny ki mukhtalif wajohaat hoti hain, kuch infection ki wajah se hoti hain aur kuch jalan ya kisi aur bemari ki wajah se hoti hain . pareshan kin cheezon ke baray mein baat karte hue, aap ko kisi bhi qisam ke kapray se allergy ho sakti hai jisay aap ne maazi mein kabhi istemaal nahi kya aur yeh aap ke liye aik naya kapra hai. yeh detergent ke liye bhi durust hai, kyunkay jab tak aap usay istemaal nahi karte aap ko kisi chemical se allergy ke baray mein maloom nahi hoga . private part ko khushk aur saaf rakhen kyunkay num aur ghair sehat bakhash tarz amal un danay ko mazeed kharab kar dete hain . doosri wajohaat jinsi tor par muntaqil honay walay ya ghair jinsi tor par muntaqil honay walay infection jaisay infection ho satke hain, lekin yeh kuch deegar masail jaisay kharij honay walay madahdischarge aur private hissay mein ganthon aur tukron ke sath hotay hain. agar aap ko lagta hai ke aap ke danay kisi jalan ki wajah se hain aur phir bhi woh mawaad ko tabdeel karne ke baad bhi khatam nahi hotay hain jo aap ke mutabiq jalan karne wala tha, to aap ko apne dr se zaroor milna chahiye taakay danay ki deegar mumkina wajohaat ko mustard kya ja sakay .

context/0: meri sharamgah par danay hain. mein kya karoon ?
context/1: andaam nihanivagina ki aik ajeeb bo hai, is ke ilawa deegar qisam ki badboo bhi hai jo kisi bhi ghair mamooli baat ki nishandahi karti hai . ghair mamooli badboo mein machhli ki badboo bhi shaamil hai jo bacterial vaginosis ki soorat mein hoti hai aur jinsi tor par muntaqil honay walay infection mein se aik jisay trichomoniasis kehte hain . agar aap andaam nihanivagina ke infection ko dekh rahay hain, to aam tor par badboo ke sath sharamgah mein kisi qisam ka madahdischarge, laali aur dard hota hai .
context/2: andaam nihanivagina se kis qisam ki badboo aa sakti hai ?
context/3: pH tezabiyat ka pemana hai aur usay 014 ke pemanay par mapa jata hai. kam pi each value  7 se kam  ko tezabi samjha jata hai. aam andaam nihanivagina ka pi each tezabi hai  3. 84. 5 . yeh aam pi each aam andaam nihanivagina keeray ke sahih tawazun se barqarar rehta hai, jab yeh tawazun baggar jata hai to pi each mutasir hota hai jis ke nateejay mein mukhtalif infection hotay hain . misaal ke tor par, bacterial vaginosis ki soorat mein andaam nihanivagina ka pi each alkaline ho jata hai aur thrush ki soorat mein yeh ziyada tezabi ho jata hai .
context/4: misali khawateen ki andaam nihanivagina pH balance kya hai ?
context/5: yeh infection candida, aik fungus ki wajah se hota hai . is se andaam nihanivagina se gaarha safaid kareemi madahdischarge kharij hota hai, kharish aur andaam nihanivagina ke gird surkhi hoti hai. kharij honay wala madahdischarge bo ke baghair hai . phaphondi aam tor par garam martoob mahol mein barhti hai is liye andaam nihanivagina ke ilaqay ko saaf aur khushk rakhnay ka mahswara diya jata hai .

response: jinsi tor par muntaqil shuda infection  sti  infection ki aik qisam hai jo jinsi taluqaat ke douran 1 shakhs se dosray mein muntaqil ho sakti hai. sti ki kayi mukhtalif kasmain hain jo mukhtalif qisam ke keeron ki wajah se hoti hain. sti ki aksar koi alamaat nahi hoten .

response: Hepatitis C aik bug  virus  hai jo jigar ke infection ka sabab bantaa hai. virus mukhtalif tareeqon se phail sakta hai aur un mein se aik jinsi raabtey ke zariye hai. dosray zaraye mein mutasirah soyyan baantna, Hepatitis C se mutasirah shakhs se khoon ki muntaqili shaamil hain. bacha maa se virus le sakta hai, aam tor par paidaiesh ke waqt . bad qismati se big is waqt tak koi masla peda nahi karta jab tak ke jigar kharab nah ho jaye aur jigar ke afaal mutasir nah hon . abhi tak virus ke khilaaf vaccination dastyab nahi hai aur ilaaj bhi mumkin nahi hai. lekin bemari ke bherne ko kam karne ke liye duwaein dastyab hain .

HIV infection jinsi raabtey se phialta hai, hamal ke douran maa se bachay mein ya bachay ko janam dainay ke douran, aaloda soyyan baantane, HIV misbet shakhs se khoon lagwanay se . har woh shakhs jo HIV se mutasir hota hai is mein aids nahi hota

context: ibtidayi tor par, jaisay hi koi shakhs HIV se mutasir hota hai yeh flow jaisi alamat ka sabab bantaa hai . bunyadi tor par yeh virus hamaray mdafati nizaam par hamla karta hai aur mdafati khalion ko is had tak mutasir honay mein kayi saal lagtay hain ke woh alamaat peda kar saken. lehaza, kayi saloon ke baad insaan ko sir se le kar paon tak kayi qisam ke infection honay lagtay hain kyunkay jism ka mdafati nizaam keeron ka muqaabla karne ke liye bohat kamzor hai .
context/0: HIV ki alamaat kya hain ?
context/1: HIV infection honay ka matlab yeh nahi hai ke kisi shakhs ko aids hai . HIV ka matlab human Immunodeficiency  virus hai jo aids  acquired immunodeficiency syndrome ka sabab bantaa hai . HIV infection jinsi raabtey se phialta hai, hamal ke douran maa se bachay mein ya bachay ko janam dainay ke douran, aaloda soyyan baantane, HIV misbet shakhs se khoon lagwanay se . har woh shakhs jo HIV se mutasir hota hai is mein aids nahi hota
context/2: AIDSHIV kya hai?
context/3: yeh aik virus hai jo jinsi raabtey ke zariye phialta hai. yeh private ke ird gird dard naak chhaalon ka sabab bantaa hai. bad qismati se virus ko mukammal tor par saaf nahi kiya ja sakta lekin is ki wajah se honay wali alamaat ke maslay se chhutkara panay ke liye ilaaj faraham kya ja sakta hai .
context/4: herpes kya hai ?
context/5: yeh aik virus hai jo masson aur cervical cancer ka sabab bantaa hai. yeh virus qareebi raabtey aur jinsi raabtey se phailta hai .

response: agar aap ko lagta hai ke aap ko HIV ka saamna sunhwa hai aur abhi 72 ghantay nahi hue hain to aap post exposure prophylaxis haasil kar satke hain .  agar aap injunction kisi bhi maqsad ke liye istemaal karte hain, to yakeeni banayen ke yeh pehlay istemaal nahi sunhwa hai .  agar kisi ko khoon ki muntaqili ki zaroorat ho to yakeeni banayen ke yeh kisi mustand blood bank se hai jo atiyah dahindgaan ke khoon ki haqeeqi screening paish karta hai .  agar aap health care professional hain to aap ko soi ki chhari ki choton se bachney ke liye ahteyati tadabeer ikhtiyar karni chahiye  agar aap haamla hain aur HIV pazityo hain, to aap ko jald az jald apne gaynakalojst se milna chahiye aur bachay ko HIV se mutasir honay se roknay ke liye ilaaj ke tareeqa car aur bachay ki paidaiesh ke tareeqa car par tabadlah khayaal karna chahiye .

response: sti ka ilaaj is maslay ki qisam par munhasir hai jis ki wajah se yeh sunhwa hai. kuch ko mukammal tor par theek kya ja sakta hai, jaisay chlamydia, sozaak, trichomonas aur aatishak ki soorat mein. jabkay baaz auqaat herpes ki soorat mein infection mukammal tor par theek nahi ho sakta lekin bemari ke bharak uthnay ko kam karne ke liye ilaaj diya ja sakta hai .  hepatitis bi aur si ke sath sath HIV ka ilaaj imtezaaj therapy aur musalsal nigrani se kya jata hai aur is ke bawajood mukammal ilaaj mumkin nahi hai. ilaaj alamaat se bachna, pechidgion aur bemari ke phelao ko rokna hai .  yeh note karna bhi zaroori hai ke kuch stis phail satke hain is liye bemari ke mazeed phelao ko roknay ke liye zaroori ahteyati tadabeer ikhtiyar karna zaroori hai .

response: jinsi taluqaat ke douran kndom ka istemaal nah sirf sti ki muntaqili se tahaffuz faraham karta hai balkay yeh Maney hamal ke liye bhi hai .  agar aap ko sti ki tashkhees hui hai to : . agar aap ko STI ki tashkhees hui hai to kisi bhi qisam ke mubashrat jinsi raabtey se mukammal tor par guraiz karne ka mahswara diya jata hai. mukammal ilaaj karwanay ke baad koi bhi jinsi sargarmi dobarah shuru kar sakta hai . . khoon ka atiyah nah den . . zaati istemaal ke liye soyyan, astra ya koi taiz dhaar cheez share nah karen . agar aap ke paas koi kat ya kisi qisam ka zakham hai, to aap ko behtar tor par usay dhaanp kar rakhna chahiye .

response: sti ka ilaaj is maslay ki qisam par munhasir hai jis ki wajah se yeh sunhwa hai. kuch ko mukammal tor par theek kya ja sakta hai, jaisay chlamydia, sozaak, trichomonas aur aatishak ki soorat mein. jabkay baaz auqaat herpes ki soorat mein infection mukammal tor par theek nahi ho sakta lekin bemari ke bharak uthnay ko kam karne ke liye ilaaj diya ja sakta hai . hepatitis bi aur si ke sath sath HIV ka ilaaj imtezaaj therapy aur musalsal nigrani se kya jata hai .

response: kuch screening test hain jo aap ko yeh maloom karne mein madad kar satke hain ke aaya aap ko kisi qisam ka sti hai ya nahi. kuch stis aisay hain jin ki wajah se jismani muaina  private part ko dekh kar  mein zakham ki nishandahi ki ja sakti hai misaal ke tor par' massay' ki wajah se. insani papillomavirus  hpv  ke zariye .  sti ki deegar wajohaat jaisay chlamydia, sozaak aur trichomonas ko' swab' test se maloom kya ja sakta hai. jharoo cotton bidder ki terhan hota hai jisay andaam nihanivagina , uzoo tanasul, pichlle rastay, aur baaz auqaat gilaay ke gird bhi ghumaya jata hai aur jharoo ko khordbeen ke neechay jancha jata hai aur ya qareeb se jaanch ke liye laboratory mein bheja jata hai .  chlamydia ki wajah se honay walay infection ka pata pishaab ke test se bhi lagaya ja sakta hai .  baaz wajohaat ke liye, jaisay hepatitis bi, hepatitis si aur each aayi v, khoon ke test ki zaroorat hoti hai. taham, agar aap pareshan hain to aap ko kisi dr ya maahir se madad maangni chahiye .

response: STI ka ilaaj is waqt namukammal hai jab partners se STI ki tehqiqaat nahi ki jayen aur zaroorat ke mutabiq ilaaj kya jaye , saathi ka ilaaj zaroori hai kyunkay agar saathi keeray ko le jata hai aur yeh dobarah aap ko jinsi taluqaat ke douran muntaqil kya jaye ga aur aap sti ki pechidgion ke sath khatam ho satke hain. lehaza, dobarah infection ke is shaytani chakkar ko khatam karne ke liye ilaaj ke mansoobay mein shiraakat daar ko shaamil karna zaroori hai .

response: kuch aisay awamil hain jo stis ke phelao mein Muawin hain. un mein ghair mehfooz jinsi amal, hum jins parasti, ghair mehfooz khoon ki muntaqili, iv manshiat ka istemaal aur syringes ka dobarah istemaal shaamil hain .  har qisam ke andaam nihanivagina se kharij honay walay madahdischarge ka matlab yeh nahi hai ke kisi shakhs ko sti hai. baaz auqaat andaam nihanivagina se kharij hona mamool ki baat hai. kuch infection hain jaisay thrush aur bacterial vaginosis jo andaam nihanivagina se kharij honay walay madahdischarge aur kharish ka sabab bhi ban satke hain lekin woh STI nahi hain .  agar aap ko kisi bhi STI ki tashkhees hui hai to apne saathi ko is ke baray mein batana aur saathi ko tehqiqaat aur ilaaj ki khatir sehat ke pesha war se milnay ke liye raazi karna intehai zaroori hai .

context/3: kya mujhe apne saathi ko mutala karna chahiye? kya apne saathi ko mutala karna zaroori hai ?
context/4: kuch screening test hain jo aap ko yeh maloom karne mein madad kar satke hain ke aaya aap ko kisi qisam ka sti hai ya nahi. kuch stis aisay hain jin ki wajah se jismani muaina  private part ko dekh kar  mein zakham ki nishandahi ki ja sakti hai misaal ke tor par' massay' ki wajah se. insani papillomavirus  hpv  ke zariye .  sti ki deegar wajohaat jaisay chlamydia, sozaak aur trichomonas ko' swab' test se maloom kya ja sakta hai. jharoo cotton bidder ki terhan hota hai jisay andaam nihanivagina , uzoo tanasul, pichlle rastay, aur baaz auqaat gilaay ke gird bhi ghumaya jata hai aur jharoo ko khordbeen ke neechay jancha jata hai aur ya qareeb se jaanch ke liye laboratory mein bheja jata hai .  chlamydia ki wajah se honay walay infection ka pata pishaab ke test se bhi lagaya ja sakta hai .  baaz wajohaat ke liye, jaisay hepatitis bi, hepatitis si aur each aayi v, khoon ke test ki zaroorat hoti hai. taham, agar aap pareshan hain to aap ko kisi dr ya maahir se madad maangni chahiye .
context/5: agar mujhe sti hai to mein pareshan hon .

response: kya Maney hamal jinsi tor par muntaqil honay walay infection ko rokta hai ?
context: kuch aisay awamil hain jo stis ke phelao mein Muawin hain. un mein ghair mehfooz jinsi amal, hum jins parasti, ghair mehfooz khoon ki muntaqili, iv manshiat ka istemaal aur syringes ka dobarah istemaal shaamil hain .  har qisam ke andaam nihanivagina se kharij honay walay madahdischarge ka matlab yeh nahi hai ke kisi shakhs ko sti hai. baaz auqaat andaam nihanivagina se kharij hona mamool ki baat hai. kuch infection hain jaisay thrush aur bacterial vaginosis jo andaam nihanivagina se kharij honay walay madahdischarge aur kharish ka sabab bhi ban satke hain lekin woh STI nahi hain .  agar aap ko kisi bhi STI ki tashkhees hui hai to apne saathi ko is ke baray mein batana aur saathi ko tehqiqaat aur ilaaj ki khatir sehat ke pesha war se milnay ke liye raazi karna intehai zaroori hai .
context/0: jinsi tor par muntaqil honay walay infection ke baray mein kuch haqayiq kya hain ?
context/1: mein samajh sakta hon ke aap kaisa mehsoos kar rahay hain. lekin aap ko yeh samajhney ki zaroorat hai ke agar aap ko sti hai to yeh aap ki ghalti nahi hai . aap ko usay apne saathi aur dr ke sath zaroor share karna chahiye kyunkay is se aap ko ilaaj mein madad miley gi aur aap ki sehat ki khatir madad lena aap ka haq aur aap ki apni zimma daari hai . aap maahir nafsiat ki madad bhi haasil kar satke hain aur agar aap ko is ka saamna karna parta hai to apni pareshaniyon ko daur kar satke hain .

response: jinsi taluqaat ke douran kndom  mard aur khawateen  ka istemaal aik intehai sifarish kardah rukawat ka tareeqa hai. agarchay yeh 100  tahaffuz faraham nahi karta lekin stis ke phelao ko ziyada had tak rokta hai .  yahan tak ke agar aap aik prazm rishta mein hain, to kndom istemaal karne ki intehai sifarish ki jati hai kyunkay sti ke keeray aksar alamaat ka sabab nahi bantay lekin dosray fard mein phail satke hain aur alamaat ke masail peda karna shuru kar dete hain .  agar aap sex worker hain to aap ko intehai mohtaat rehne ki zaroorat hai kyunkay mutadid partnrz ke sath jinsi talluq sti ka aik bohat bara khatrah hai. rukawat ke tareeqay istemaal karen aur baar baar screening test karwaen taakay agar koi sti big hai, chahay is se koi wazeh masla nah ho, is ka ilaaj kisi bhi mumkina pechidgion ko roknay aur big ke phelao se bachney ke liye kya ja sakta hai .

response: stis mardon mein namardi aur khawateen mein banjh pan ka sabab ban satke hain, kyunkay aam tor par mareez maahir se mahswara nahi letay aur samaji mamnoaat ki wajah se woh khud adwiyaat par inhisaar karte hain kyunkay stis jinsi bemariyan hain. is liye mareez dr se milnay se guraiz karte hain .  stis agar ilaaj nah kya jaye to toleedi rastay ko nuqsaan pohanchana hai is liye haamla honay aur banjh pan mein dushwari ka baais banti hai .

response: stis shuruni soozish ki wajohaat mein se aik hai. is se kamar mein dard, andaam nihanivagina se ghair mamooli kharij honay wala madahdischarge aur khoon behna, pait mein dard aur bukhaar hota hai. yeh reham aur is ke ird gird ke dhanchay ka infection hai is liye reham se bahar hamal  ectopic hamal  ya banjh pan ke sath khatam ho sakta hai. haalat ka ilaaj antibiotics se kya ja sakta hai .

context/3: stis mardon mein namardi aur khawateen mein banjh pan ka sabab ban satke hain, kyunkay aam tor par mareez maahir se mahswara nahi letay aur samaji mamnoaat ki wajah se woh khud adwiyaat par inhisaar karte hain kyunkay stis jinsi bemariyan hain. is liye mareez dr se milnay se guraiz karte hain .  stis agar ilaaj nah kya jaye to toleedi rastay ko nuqsaan pohanchana hai is liye haamla honay aur banjh pan mein dushwari ka baais banti hai .
context/4: jinsi tor par muntaqil honay wala infection  sti  zarkhaizi ko kaisay mutasir karta hai ?
context/5: stis ke phelao ko roknay ke liye kndom ka istemaal kya ja sakta hai. mard aur zanana kndom dastyab hain .

response: cervical cancer human papillomavirus  hpv  ki wajah se hota hai. usay hpv ke khilaaf vaccination ke zariye roka ja sakta hai aur mamool ki screening test ke zariye is ka jald pata lagaya ja sakta hai .
context: cervical cancer kya hai ?

response: beza daaniovary chhootey, baizvi shakal ke ghudood hain jo aap ke reham ke dono taraf waqay hain. woh aap ke anday tayyar karte aur zakheera karte hain  jisay beza bhi kaha jata hai  aur hormones banatay hain jo aap ke mahvari aur hamal ko control karte hain. beza daaniovary ke douran, aap ke beza daaniovary mein se aik anda kharij karta hai. agar koi nutfa is anday ko khad deta hai to aap haamla ho sakti hain. aap ke beza daaniovary har mahvari ke douran aik anda jari karti rehti hai jab tak ke aap rajunoortimenopause tak nah pahonch jayen. mujhe umeed hai ke yeh aap ke sawal ka jawab day ga .

response: mahvari mahvari ke pehlay din se shuru hoti hai aur agli mahvari ke aaghaz par khatam hoti hai. aik mukammal mahvari aam tor par 24 se 38 din ke darmiyan rehti hai, lekin mahvari ke chakkar 1 shakhs se dosray, cycle se mukhtalif ho satke hain, aur saloon ke douran tabdeel bhi ho satke hain. kuch log apne balon, jald, pakhana, daimi bemari ki alamaat, mood, dard shaqeeqa ke sir dard, ya yahan tak ke mahvari ke douran mukhtalif maqamat par sex ka tajurbah karne ke andaaz mein tabdeelian mehsoos karte hain. cycle mein yotrn cycle aur avorin cycle shaamil hota hai. kya aap samajte hain ke uterine cycle kya hai ?

response: theek hai to ovulation se pehlay, yeh cycle jismani tor par bacha daaniuterus ko tabdeel karta hai. yeh woh marhala hai jahan haiz aata hai aur yeh muddat ke douran hota hai  jab se andaam nihanivagina se khoon behna shuru hota hai is ke khatam honay tak. bacha daaniuterus ke andar se pichlle chakkar se khoon grewah aur andaam nihanivagina ke zariye bahaya jata hai. bacha daaniuterus ki parat, jisay endometrium kaha jata hai, is marhalay ke douran sab se patla hota hai. aik aam muddat 8 din tak chal sakti hai, lekin ausatan taqreeban paanch ya chay rehti hai

context/0: mahvari mahvari ke pehlay din se shuru hoti hai aur agli mahvari ke aaghaz par khatam hoti hai. aik mukammal mahvari aam tor par 24 se 38 din ke darmiyan rehti hai, lekin mahvari ke chakkar 1 shakhs se dosray, cycle se mukhtalif ho satke hain, aur saloon ke douran tabdeel bhi ho satke hain. kuch log apne balon, jald, pakhana, daimi bemari ki alamaat, mood, dard shaqeeqa ke sir dard, ya yahan tak ke mahvari ke douran mukhtalif maqamat par sex ka tajurbah karne ke andaaz mein tabdeelian mehsoos karte hain. cycle mein yotrn cycle aur avorin cycle shaamil hota hai. kya aap samajte hain ke uterine cycle kya hai ?
context/1: mahvari mein kya hota hai .
context/2: bacha daaniuterus aik khokhala azlaati uzoo hai jo khawateen ke sharooni mein masanay aur milaashi ke darmiyan waqay hota hai. beza daaniovary anday peda karti hai jo fallopian tubes ke zariye safar karti hai. aik baar jab anda beza daaniovary se nikal jata hai to usay frtilayz kya ja sakta hai aur khud ko bacha daaniuterus ki parat mein lagaya ja sakta hai .
context/3: oh, theek hai? shukriya. mein yeh bhi soch rahi thi ke bacha daaniuterus kaisa lagta hai .
context/4: beza daaniovary chhootey, baizvi shakal ke ghudood hain jo aap ke reham ke dono taraf waqay hain. woh aap ke anday tayyar karte aur zakheera karte hain  jisay beza bhi kaha jata hai  aur hormones banatay hain jo aap ke mahvari aur hamal ko control karte hain. beza daaniovary ke douran, aap ke beza daaniovary mein se aik anda kharij karta hai. agar koi nutfa is anday ko khad deta hai to aap haamla ho sakti hain. aap ke beza daaniovary har mahvari ke douran aik anda jari karti rehti hai jab tak ke aap rajunoortimenopause tak nah pahonch jayen. mujhe umeed hai ke yeh aap ke sawal ka jawab day ga .

response: zaroor! is mein shaamil hormones hain aur woh hain estrogen aur progesterone. Estrogen aur progesterone ki satah aam tor par sab se kam hoti hai. is ki wajah se asterlining ki oopri tahein jism se bahar nikal jati hain. beza daaniovary ke baad, is mein secretary Fez shaamil hota hai, jo beza daaniovary se agli muddat ke aaghaz tak hota hai. bacha daaniuterus ki parat hamal ko sahara dainay ya mahvari ke liye totnay ke liye tayyar ho jati hai. is marhalay mein progesterone barh jata hai. is ki wajah se bacha daaniuterus ki parat gaarha hona band ho jati hai aur fertilized anday ki tayari karti hai. yeh hormone beza daaniovary ke baad barhatay hain aur muddat ke douran sab se ziyada hotay hain. khoon ki naalian suker jati hain aur bacha daaniuterus ki parat toot jati hai. agar hamal hota hai to bacha daaniuterus ke khaliye un mein se kam chemical peda karte hain .

response: pehla marhala follicular marhala hai. yeh muddat ke aaghaz se beza daaniovary tak shuru hota hai. mahvari ke poooray daur mein, dono beza daaniovary mein nashonuma ke mukhtalif marahil mein aik se ziyada follicles  anday par mushtamil seyalfluid bharay thelay  hotay hain. muddat is marhalay mein taqreeban nisf khatam ho jati hai. beza daaniovary mein se aik mein aik patak tamam follicles mein sab se bara ban jata hai, jisay ghalib follicle kehte hain aur rait ke aik danay  12 centi meter  ke size ka hota hai. yeh follicle woh hai jo ovulation ke waqt jari honay ke liye tayyar hota hai. ziyada tar logon ke liye, patak ka marhala 1022 din tak rehta hai, lekin yeh cycle se cycle se mukhtalif ho sakta hai .

context/3: zaroor! is mein shaamil hormones hain aur woh hain estrogen aur progesterone. Estrogen aur progesterone ki satah aam tor par sab se kam hoti hai. is ki wajah se asterlining ki oopri tahein jism se bahar nikal jati hain. beza daaniovary ke baad, is mein secretary Fez shaamil hota hai, jo beza daaniovary se agli muddat ke aaghaz tak hota hai. bacha daaniuterus ki parat hamal ko sahara dainay ya mahvari ke liye totnay ke liye tayyar ho jati hai. is marhalay mein progesterone barh jata hai. is ki wajah se bacha daaniuterus ki parat gaarha hona band ho jati hai aur fertilized anday ki tayari karti hai. yeh hormone beza daaniovary ke baad barhatay hain aur muddat ke douran sab se ziyada hotay hain. khoon ki naalian suker jati hain aur bacha daaniuterus ki parat toot jati hai. agar hamal hota hai to bacha daaniuterus ke khaliye un mein se kam chemical peda karte hain .
context/4: kya aap bta satke hain ke kya hormones mahvari mein koi kirdaar ada karte hain ?
context/5: apna khayal rakhe, alwida

response: yahan faaal hormone follicle stimulating hormone  fsh  hai. f s each beza daaniovary se kehta hai ke beza daaniovary ke liye aik anda tayyar karen  beza daaniovary se anday ka ikhraj . ghalib follicle barhatay hi estrogen peda karta hai, jo beza ban'nay se ain pehlay urooj par pahonch jata hai .
context: is follicular marhalay mein kon se hormones faaal hain ?
context/0: pehla marhala follicular marhala hai. yeh muddat ke aaghaz se beza daaniovary tak shuru hota hai. mahvari ke poooray daur mein, dono beza daaniovary mein nashonuma ke mukhtalif marahil mein aik se ziyada follicles  anday par mushtamil seyalfluid bharay thelay  hotay hain. muddat is marhalay mein taqreeban nisf khatam ho jati hai. beza daaniovary mein se aik mein aik patak tamam follicles mein sab se bara ban jata hai, jisay ghalib follicle kehte hain aur rait ke aik danay  12 centi meter  ke size ka hota hai. yeh follicle woh hai jo ovulation ke waqt jari honay ke liye tayyar hota hai. ziyada tar logon ke liye, patak ka marhala 1022 din tak rehta hai, lekin yeh cycle se cycle se mukhtalif ho sakta hai .
context/1: haan mein beza daaniovary ke chakkar ke marahil janna chahti hon .
context/2: haan yeh hai! beza daaniovary se pehlay dambagranti cycle jismani tor par beza daaniovary ko tabdeel karta hai. kya aap janna chahain ge ke dambagranti cycle ke marahil kya hain ?
context/3: kya reham ka chakkar bhi mahvari ka hissa hai ?

response: ovulation ke baad, yeh cycle luteal marhala hai. yeh ovulation se agli muddat ke aaghaz tak hota hai aur taqreeban 14 din rehta hai, lekin 9 se 16 din ke darmiyan aam hai. beza daaniovary ke baad, anday ko pakarney wala patak aik aisi cheez mein badal jata hai jisay corpus luteum kehte hain. yeh hormones progesterone aur estrogen ko hamal ko sahara dainay ke liye banata hai. agar hamal nahi hota hai to, corpus luteum ovulation ke 9 se 11 dinon ke darmiyan toot jata hai. basorat deegar, progesterone ibtidayi hamal ki himayat karta hai agar anda aur supreme aapas mein jurey hon. agar hamal nahi hota hai to, progesterone chouti aur phir gir jaye ga. yeh hormonal tabdeelian mahvari se pehlay ki aam alamaat jaisay mood mein tabdeeli, sir dard, mahasay, aphara, aur chhaati ki narmi mein hissa daal sakti hain. progesterone aur estrogen mein kami mahvari ka sabab banti hai .

response: mahvari mein utaar charhao aata hai jab woh pehli baar shuru hotay hain. agar aap ki mahvari kuch saloon se guzar rahi hai, to yeh aam tor par har aik cycle ki lambai aur hajam ke barabar hona chahiye. aap ab bhi waqtan foqatan tabdeelian mehsoos kar satke hain, jaisay aap ke hormones ke lehaaz se aap ki muddat ka wazan aur Tawalat jo utaar charhao ka shikaar ho sakti hai. tanao, khoraak, ya hungami Maney hamal goli contraceptive pilllainay jaisi cheezon ki wajah se hormones earzi tor par tabdeel ho satke hain. agar aap har daur mein beza nahi karte hain to aap ki muddat mein bhi tagayuraat hon ge  aap ko aik period chhuut sakta hai, ya mamool se baad mein aata hai, aur  ya aap ke mamool se ziyada bhaari  halka aur chhota  lamba ho sakta hai. har chakkar ke douran beza nah hona jawani aur peeri menopause ke douran aam hai, aur yeh earzi tor par ghair haazir aur  ya mahvari ke bhaari honay ki aik aam wajah hai .

response: apni mahvari ka suraagh laganay se aap ko un alamaat ke namonon ko samajhney mein madad mil sakti hai jo aap apne mahvari ke douran mehsoos karte hain  dard se le kar khwahisaat tak, jinsi khwahish tak. tracking aap ko behtar andaza day sakti hai ke aap kab zarkhaiz hain, jo madadgaar saabit ho sakta hai agar aap haamla honay ki koshish kar rahay hain .

response: nau umaron ke liye, 2145 din ki had se bahar aur balighon ke liye, 2438 din ki had se bahar ke cycle ya aisay cycle jin ki lambai 79 din se ziyada hoti hai  misaal ke tor par, aik cycle jo 27 din ka hota hai. aik maheena, 42 agla . agar mahvari achanak 90 dinon se ziyada ruk jati hai  istasna mein hamal, rajonooti, aur haal hi mein band hormonal birth control shaamil hain , is ka shumaar bhi cycle ki be qaidgi ke tor par kya jata hai. kya aap janna chahtay hain kyun ?

response: yahan kuch aam wajohaat hain jin ki wajah se cycle be qaida ho jatay hain. mukhtalif wajohaat mukhtalif qisam ki be qaadgyon ka baais banti hain .  zindagi ke marahil aur hamal jab aap ka cycle khatam hojaye hamal hamal ke baad ki muddat doodh pilana baar baar isqaat hamal neend ki kharabi jismani ya jazbati tabdeelian daimi tanao shadeed werzish maday ka istemaal wazan mein fori tabdeelian khanay ki kharabi baaz adwiyaat poli stick ovary sndrom  ki kharabi ghair munazzam diabities yotrn polyps uterine fibroids kuch cancer ya somi tumor

response: cycle jo musalsal be qaida hotay hain mukhtasir aur taweel mudti sehat par sangeen assar daal satke hain. woh sehat ki ziyada sangeen halaton ki aik wasee range ka baais ban satke hain, aur pareshan kin alamaat ka sabab ban satke hain. mahvari ki sehat ka talluq aap ke dil ki sehat, metabolism, neend, zarkhaizi aur bohat kuch se hai. is liye yeh zaroori hai ke kisi bhi mumkina masail ki jald az jald tashkhees ki jaye, aur sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne walay ki madad se un ka intizam kya jaye .

context/3: nau umaron ke liye, 2145 din ki had se bahar aur balighon ke liye, 2438 din ki had se bahar ke cycle ya aisay cycle jin ki lambai 79 din se ziyada hoti hai  misaal ke tor par, aik cycle jo 27 din ka hota hai. aik maheena, 42 agla . agar mahvari achanak 90 dinon se ziyada ruk jati hai  istasna mein hamal, rajonooti, aur haal hi mein band hormonal birth control shaamil hain , is ka shumaar bhi cycle ki be qaidgi ke tor par kya jata hai. kya aap janna chahtay hain kyun ?
context/4: fasid cycle ki lambai kya hain ?
context/5: apni mahvari ka suraagh laganay se aap ko un alamaat ke namonon ko samajhney mein madad mil sakti hai jo aap apne mahvari ke douran mehsoos karte hain  dard se le kar khwahisaat tak, jinsi khwahish tak. tracking aap ko behtar andaza day sakti hai ke aap kab zarkhaiz hain, jo madadgaar saabit ho sakta hai agar aap haamla honay ki koshish kar rahay hain .

response: bohat se log fikar mand hotay hain jab un ke mahvari waqt par zahir nahi hoti hai, lehaza mein samjhta hon ke aap kyun pareshan ho satke hain. taham, abhi tak fikar karne ki zaroorat nahi hai. aap ki mahvari mein der kyun ho sakti hai is ki kayi wajohaat ho sakti hain. un mein shaamil ho sakta hai :  tanao safar khoraak bemari ilaaj birth control apne tarz zindagi aur mahol mein honay wali tabdeelion par nazar rakhnay se aap ko is baat ki nishandahi karne mein madad mil sakti hai ke aap ko mahvari ke douran mukhtalif tabdeelion ka saamna kyun ho sakta hai. rozana aisa karne se aap ko kya ho raha hai is ke baray mein mazeed aagahi haasil karne mein madad mil sakti hai aur aap ko yeh bitanay mein madad mil sakti hai ke kya aap ko apne health care faraham kanandah ke sath kuch bhi lana chahiye .

response: andaam nihanivagina se kharij honay wala madahfluid koi bhi ghair mudti seyalfluid hai jo aap ki andaam nihanivagina se nikalta hai. yeh ziyada tar pani hai. bacteria samait chhootey chhootey microorganisms bhi mojood hain. yeh madahfluid jism ko andaam nihanivagina se puranay khalion ko nikaalte mein madad karta hai aur andaam nihanivagina ke tissues ko infection se bachata hai. andaam nihanivagina se kharij honay wala madahfluid poooray chakkar ke douran is ke dikhne aur mehsoos karne ke andaaz mein badal jata hai .  kharij honay walay madahfluid mein andaam nihanivagina ki phislan, hosla afzai ka seyalfluid, jinsi taluqaat ke baad money, aur cervical seyalfluid, ya mumkina tor par bacteria ki afzaish ya infection se kharij honay wala madahfluid shaamil ho sakta hai .  aap apne poooray chakkar mein aur apni zindagi ke mukhtalif marahil ke douran kam ya ziyada andaam nihanivagina se kharij honay walay madahfluid ko dekh satke hain, jaisay ke paidaiesh ke baad ya rajonooti ke douran .

response: garewa seyalfluid aap ke garewa ke khaliyaat ke zareya tayyar kya jata hai. garewa andaam nihanivagina se bacha daaniuterus ka khilna hai. garewa seyalfluid aap ke poooray daur mein mouti, kareemi, aur chip chapa se patli, geelay aur phislan mein tabdeel ho sakta hai .  jab beza daaniovary se pehlay hormone estrogen barh jata hai to cervical seyalfluid patla hojata hai. is se supreme ko garewa ke zariye muntaqil karna aasaan ho jata hai. yeh patla honay se aisa lagta hai jaisay kharij honay walay madahfluid mein izafah sunhwa hai aur yehstretcher lag sakta hai. jab hormone progestrone barhta hai to cervical balgham gaarha ho jata hai .

context/1: andaam nihanivagina se kharij honay wala madahfluid koi bhi ghair mudti seyalfluid hai jo aap ki andaam nihanivagina se nikalta hai. yeh ziyada tar pani hai. bacteria samait chhootey chhootey microorganisms bhi mojood hain. yeh madahfluid jism ko andaam nihanivagina se puranay khalion ko nikaalte mein madad karta hai aur andaam nihanivagina ke tissues ko infection se bachata hai. andaam nihanivagina se kharij honay wala madahfluid poooray chakkar ke douran is ke dikhne aur mehsoos karne ke andaaz mein badal jata hai .  kharij honay walay madahfluid mein andaam nihanivagina ki phislan, hosla afzai ka seyalfluid, jinsi taluqaat ke baad money, aur cervical seyalfluid, ya mumkina tor par bacteria ki afzaish ya infection se kharij honay wala madahfluid shaamil ho sakta hai .  aap apne poooray chakkar mein aur apni zindagi ke mukhtalif marahil ke douran kam ya ziyada andaam nihanivagina se kharij honay walay madahfluid ko dekh satke hain, jaisay ke paidaiesh ke baad ya rajonooti ke douran .
context/2: andaam nihanivagina kharij honay walay madahfluid ke baray mein kya hai, yeh kya hai ?
context/3: bohat se log fikar mand hotay hain jab un ke mahvari waqt par zahir nahi hoti hai, lehaza mein samjhta hon ke aap kyun pareshan ho satke hain. taham, abhi tak fikar karne ki zaroorat nahi hai. aap ki mahvari mein der kyun ho sakti hai is ki kayi wajohaat ho sakti hain. un mein shaamil ho sakta hai :  tanao safar khoraak bemari ilaaj birth control apne tarz zindagi aur mahol mein honay wali tabdeelion par nazar rakhnay se aap ko is baat ki nishandahi karne mein madad mil sakti hai ke aap ko mahvari ke douran mukhtalif tabdeelion ka saamna kyun ho sakta hai. rozana aisa karne se aap ko kya ho raha hai is ke baray mein mazeed aagahi haasil karne mein madad mil sakti hai aur aap ko yeh bitanay mein madad mil sakti hai ke kya aap ko apne health care faraham kanandah ke sath kuch bhi lana chahiye .
context/4: haan, mujhe fikar hai ke meri mahvari der se hai .
context/5: kya aap kuch aur janna chahain ge ?

response: chikna seyalfluid khoon ke plasma  khoon ka maya hissa minus khoon ke khaliyaat   paadri  se flutter kya jata hai. jinsi josh  josh  andaam nihanivagina ke bafton mein izafi khoon behnay ka sabab bantaa hai. sooji hui bafton mein ziyada dabao hota hai aur is ki wajah se seyalfluid andaam nihanivagina ki dewaron ki satah par dhkilta hai. nami mein yeh izafah, ya" geela pan ", andaam nihanivagina ki chikna ya hosla afzai ka seyalfluid hai .

response: nahi, woh nahi hain. zanana inzaalejaculate chand mili letter motay safaid seyalfluid ka ikhraj hai jo pishaab ki naali se kharij hota hai. yeh pishaab nahi hai. vulvas ke sath kuch log orgasm se pehlay ya baad mein aur orgasm ke sath ya is ke baghair honay ki ittila dete hain .  squirting pishaab ki naali se saaf seyalfluid ka ikhraj hai, aam tor par orgasm ya ziyada josh ke douran. squirting mein seyalfluid pishaab ki terhan hai aur masanay se aata hai. dono aik hi waqt mein ho satke hain. har koi un ka tajurbah nahi kere ga aur yeh mamool bhi hai .

response: jinsi taluqaat se pehlay, douran aur baad mein, aap dekh satke hain ke aap ki andaam nihanivagina giili mehsoos hoti hai. yeh hosla afzai ke seyalfluid, chiknai, ya agar aap ne kndom, money ke baghair uzoo tanasul mein andaam nihanivagina jinsi taluqaat ki wajah se ho sakta hai. aap sex ke foran baad ya sex ke baad ke ghanton ke douran andaam nihanivagina se money nikaltay dekh satke hain. money aam tor par aik surmai safaid, abr alood, jelly jaisa maya hota hai. jinsi taluqaat ke baad dhabbay khushki ya jalan ki wajah se ho satke hain, lekin yeh infection se aap ke garewa ke soojan ki wajah se bhi ho sakta hai .

response: hormonal birth control andaam nihanivagina se kharij honay walay madahfluid ko mutasir kar sakta hai. birth control jis mein progestin hota hai  hormone progestrone ka aik masnoi version  garewa ke ratobat ko gaarha bana sakta hai, jis ki wajah se supreme ke liye garewa ke zariye jana mushkil ho jata hai. agar aap is qisam ka birth control kar rahay hain, to aap ko is ki wajah se andaam nihanivagina se ziyada gaarha ya kam ikhraj nazar aa sakta hai .

response: sirf aik muddat ke baad, madahfluid gayab aur khushk hai. estrogen beza daaniovary mein aik choti si theli se peda hota hai jis mein anday hotay hain, jisay follicle kehte hain. muddat khatam honay ke baad estrogen aahista aahista barhta hai. aap ki mahvari khatam honay ke baad chand dinon tak cervical fluid kam ho sakta hai jab tak ke estrogen dobarah nah barh jaye. dar haqeeqat, yeh mahvari ke baad aur beza daaniovary se pehlay bhi badal jata hai .

context/3: kya mahvari andaam nihanivagina se kharij honay walay madahfluid ko mutasir karti hai .

response: aap ki mahvari aur beza daaniovary ke darmiyan ke dinon mein yeh madahfluid chip chapa, safaid aur kareemi ho jaye ga. estrogen ki satah ab taizi se barh rahi hai aur garewa ziyada seyalfluid peda karta hai. sab se pehlay, madahfluid mota aur chip chapa lag sakta hai. phir yeh aik lotion ki terhan ziyada geela aur kareemi ho sakta hai. is waqt ke douran kharij honay wala madahfluid safaid aur abr alood, ya yahan tak ke zard nazar aasakta hai  khaas tor par agar yeh aap ke zair jama par khushk ho . 28 din ke mahvari ke chakkar mein, aap sab se pehlay din no ya das ke ird gird is seyalfluid ko mehsoos kar satke hain. yeh sirf aik andaza hai. logon ki cycle ki lambai mukhtalif hoti hai aur ovulation aik cycle se mukhtalif ho sakta hai, yahan tak ke un logon mein bhi jo mehsoos karte hain ke un ke chakron ka andaza lagaya ja sakta hai .

response: beza daaniovary se kuch din pehlay aur is ke douran, yeh saaf, geela, phisalna aur khainchta sunhwa hoga. beza daaniovary se pehlay ke dinon mein cervical fluid bohat ziyada hota hai. aap ki andaam nihanivagina bohat ziyada giili mehsoos karne lagey gi. is douran cervical seyalfluid ziyada hota hai aur yeh aam tor par bohat phisalta hai. yeh ovulation se aik se do din pehlay estrogen ki chouti ki wajah se hota hai. kharij honay wala madahfluid kachay anday ki safedi ki terhan nazar aata hai jisay aap ke angothay aur ungli ke darmiyan inch tak phelaya ja sakta hai .

context/3: beza daaniovary se kuch din pehlay aur is ke douran, yeh saaf, geela, phisalna aur khainchta sunhwa hoga. beza daaniovary se pehlay ke dinon mein cervical fluid bohat ziyada hota hai. aap ki andaam nihanivagina bohat ziyada giili mehsoos karne lagey gi. is douran cervical seyalfluid ziyada hota hai aur yeh aam tor par bohat phisalta hai. yeh ovulation se aik se do din pehlay estrogen ki chouti ki wajah se hota hai. kharij honay wala madahfluid kachay anday ki safedi ki terhan nazar aata hai jisay aap ke angothay aur ungli ke darmiyan inch tak phelaya ja sakta hai .
context/4: ovulation ke qareeb aur douran yeh kaisa nazar aaye ga ?
context/5: aap ki mahvari aur beza daaniovary ke darmiyan ke dinon mein yeh madahfluid chip chapa, safaid aur kareemi ho jaye ga. estrogen ki satah ab taizi se barh rahi hai aur garewa ziyada seyalfluid peda karta hai. sab se pehlay, madahfluid mota aur chip chapa lag sakta hai. phir yeh aik lotion ki terhan ziyada geela aur kareemi ho sakta hai. is waqt ke douran kharij honay wala madahfluid safaid aur abr alood, ya yahan tak ke zard nazar aasakta hai  khaas tor par agar yeh aap ke zair jama par khushk ho . 28 din ke mahvari ke chakkar mein, aap sab se pehlay din no ya das ke ird gird is seyalfluid ko mehsoos kar satke hain. yeh sirf aik andaza hai. logon ki cycle ki lambai mukhtalif hoti hai aur ovulation aik cycle se mukhtalif ho sakta hai, yahan tak ke un logon mein bhi jo mehsoos karte hain ke un ke chakron ka andaza lagaya ja sakta hai .

response: andaam nihanivagina ke khameeryeast ke infection is waqt hotay hain jab andaam nihanivagina mein candida Nami fungus ki bohat ziyada nashonuma hoti hai. aap ko khameeryeast ka infection ho sakta hai agar aap ko jalan, kharish, laali, aur safaid, be tarteebi kharij honay wala madahfluid nazar aata hai jo aap ke liye ghair mamooli lagta hai .

response: andaam nihanivagina se kharij honay walay madahfluid mein aik lateef bo hoti hai. agar aap ke kharij honay walay madahfluid se bohat taiz badboo ya" machhli" bo anay lagti hai, to is ka talluq bacterial khaliyaat ki zayadti se ho sakta hai. volva ya andaam nihanivagina ke ird gird dard, kharish, ya jalna aam nahi hain, aur apne health care faraham kanandah ke sath pairwi karne mein madad mil sakti hai .

response: kharij hona mahvari ka aik hissa hai. kharij honay walay madahfluid se chhutkara haasil karne ki zaroorat nahi hai jo aap ke jism ke liye aam hai. agar aap ko lagta hai ke aap ki miqdaar mein izafah ho raha hai ya aap ke kharij honay walay madahfluid ki bo aap ki tawaqqa se ziyada mazboot hai, to aap rahnumai ke liye sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne walay se rabita kar satke hain. baghair khushbu walay sabun se dhona, andaam nihanivagina ke andar ko dotch se saaf nah karna, aur haiz ke tamam cupp, jinsi khilonay, daya frame, neez jinsi taluqaat ke douran kndom ka istemaal infection ko roknay aur andaam nihanivagina ke microorganism ko aam range mein rakhnay mein madad day sakta hai .

response: aisay auqaat hotay hain jab andaam nihanivagina se kharij honay walay madahfluid mein tabdeeli infection ya hormones mein tabdeeli ki alamat hoti hai. agar aap ko darj zail mein se koi nazar aata hai to apne health care faraham kanandah se baat karne par ghhor karen :  mustaqil mizaji : ghair mamooli tor par patla, ya mota aur ziyada banawat wala chinky rang : surmai, sabz, peela, ya bhoora hajam : hajam mein ahem aur ghair mutawaqqa bo : machhli, dhaati, ya ganda . dard, kharish, laali, ya volva ki soojan agar aap apne sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne walay se apne jism mein honay wali kisi bhi tabdeeli ke baray mein baat karne mein sharam mehsoos karte hain  yaad rakhen ke har jism mukhtalif hota hai aur sirf aap hi jantay hain ke aap ke liye kya mamool se bahar hai .

context/3: kharij hona mahvari ka aik hissa hai. kharij honay walay madahfluid se chhutkara haasil karne ki zaroorat nahi hai jo aap ke jism ke liye aam hai. agar aap ko lagta hai ke aap ki miqdaar mein izafah ho raha hai ya aap ke kharij honay walay madahfluid ki bo aap ki tawaqqa se ziyada mazboot hai, to aap rahnumai ke liye sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne walay se rabita kar satke hain. baghair khushbu walay sabun se dhona, andaam nihanivagina ke andar ko dotch se saaf nah karna, aur haiz ke tamam cupp, jinsi khilonay, daya frame, neez jinsi taluqaat ke douran kndom ka istemaal infection ko roknay aur andaam nihanivagina ke microorganism ko aam range mein rakhnay mein madad day sakta hai .
context/4: mein andaam nihanivagina se kharij honay walay madahfluid se kaisay chhutkara haasil karoon ?
context/5: andaam nihanivagina se kharij honay walay madahfluid mein aik lateef bo hoti hai. agar aap ke kharij honay walay madahfluid se bohat taiz badboo ya" machhli" bo anay lagti hai, to is ka talluq bacterial khaliyaat ki zayadti se ho sakta hai. volva ya andaam nihanivagina ke ird gird dard, kharish, ya jalna aam nahi hain, aur apne health care faraham kanandah ke sath pairwi karne mein madad mil sakti hai .

response: yeh aam baat hai ke bacterial viogosis  bv  ke baray mein is waqt tak nahi suna hai jab tak ke aap ko apne seyalfluid ke sath koi masla mehsoos nah ho. bv is waqt hota hai jab andaam nihanivagina ke bacteria ke mamool ke tawazun ko ziyada tadaad mein anorbik bacteria  bacteria jin ko bherne ke liye oxygen ki zaroorat nahi hoti  se badal diya jata hai. bv peda karne walay bacteria ki sab se aam qisam ko gardnerella kaha jata hai. naye bacterial community ke amal inhizam ke amal mukhtalif zimni masnoaat aur maholiyati tabdeelian peda karte hain, jo machhli ya nakhushgawaar badboo se le kar kharish, takleef aur soozish tak alamaat ka baais ban satke hain. andaam nihanivagina mein mdafati radeamal bhi shuru hota hai aur andaam nihanivagina ke qudrati tor par hifazati balgham ko kharab kar sakta hai. yeh toleedi rastay ko jinsi tor par muntaqil honay walay infection  stis  jaisay hiv aur chlamydia ka ziyada khatrah bana sakta hai .
context: jee haan, bv kya hai ?

response: bohat se mamlaat mein, allamti bv ke sab se ahem asraat jazbati aur samaji hotay hain. yeh khaas tor par un logon ke liye durust hai jin ka bv baar baar hota hai  ilaaj ke bawajood usay kayi baar hona . aik tehqeeq se pata chala hai ke alamaat ki shiddat aur tadad par munhasir hai, bv logon ko ". .. sharminda, sharminda," gandi" aur" bohat fikar mand" mehsoos kar sakta hai doosron ko un ki kharabi aur ghair mamooli madahfluid ka pata lag sakta hai. yeh kisi shakhs ki khud itmadi aur jinsi zindagi ko mutasir kar sakta hai, aur woh jinsi sargarmi  khaas tor par qubool karne wali zabani jinsi  se yaksar guraiz kar satke hain. baar baar honay wali alamaat, wajah ko samjhay baghair, mayoos kin hosakti hain aur kisi ko qaboo se bahar honay ka ehsas dilaati hain .

context/4: kya aap ke jism ke ilawa bacterial vaginosis ke koi asraat hain ?
context/5: yeh aam baat hai ke bacterial viogosis  bv  ke baray mein is waqt tak nahi suna hai jab tak ke aap ko apne seyalfluid ke sath koi masla mehsoos nah ho. bv is waqt hota hai jab andaam nihanivagina ke bacteria ke mamool ke tawazun ko ziyada tadaad mein anorbik bacteria  bacteria jin ko bherne ke liye oxygen ki zaroorat nahi hoti  se badal diya jata hai. bv peda karne walay bacteria ki sab se aam qisam ko gardnerella kaha jata hai. naye bacterial community ke amal inhizam ke amal mukhtalif zimni masnoaat aur maholiyati tabdeelian peda karte hain, jo machhli ya nakhushgawaar badboo se le kar kharish, takleef aur soozish tak alamaat ka baais ban satke hain. andaam nihanivagina mein mdafati radeamal bhi shuru hota hai aur andaam nihanivagina ke qudrati tor par hifazati balgham ko kharab kar sakta hai. yeh toleedi rastay ko jinsi tor par muntaqil honay walay infection  stis  jaisay hiv aur chlamydia ka ziyada khatrah bana sakta hai .

response: bacterial viogosis aam tor par toleedi Umar ki khawateen mein dekha jata hai, halaank yeh bemari kisi bhi Umar tak mehdood nahi hai. bv ka phelao abadi ke lehaaz se wasee pemanay par mukhtalif hota hai, aur yeh nasal, nasal, taleem aur aamdani samait samaji aabadyati khususiyaat se munsalik hai .

response: andaam nihanivagina ke bacteria baaz auqaat tawazun se bahar ho jatay hain aur phir khud hi behtar ho jatay hain. bv ko roknay ke liye, apne khatray ke awamil ko mehdood karkay shuru karen. kndom istemaal karen, dotch nah karen aur tamam sabun ko apni volva aur andaam nihanivagina se daur rakhen  kuch mahireen kehte hain ke jhaag nah anay wala ghair khushbu wala sabun wolve par theek hai, aur dosray kehte hain ke pani se chipak jayen . is ilaqay mein khushbu ya prfume wali koi bhi masnoaat istemaal nah karen aur apne bulbala hamaam ko mehdood karen .  agarchay aksar, alamaat barqarar rehti hain ya dobarah aati hain aur un ka ilaaj karne ki zaroorat hoti hai. maslay ke maakhuz ko talaash karna sab se ziyada madadgaar saabit hoga, lekin yeh aksar mushkil hota hai jab bv ki wajohaat ke baray mein bohat kam maloom hota hai .
