context: bv ka ilaaj anti biotics aur jaraseem kash adwiyaat se le kar tezabiyat ko bahaal karne wali dawaiyon aur probiotics tak ho sakta hai. kuch ilaaj counter par dastyab hain, lekin doosron ko nuskhay ki zaroorat hogi. aap ki alamaat ka suraagh lagana, khaas tor par jab woh shuru ho jayen aap ko aur aap ke sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne walay ko muharikaat ki shanakht karne mein madad mil sakti hai .  bad qismati se, ilaaj ke baad bv ka wapas aana aam hai. bv ki kya wajah hai is ki samajh mein kami ka matlab hai ke ilaaj ko taweel muddat mein moasar honay ke liye abhi bohat taweel safar tay karna hai. f d ae ka takhmeenah hai ke ilaaj ke baad" ilaaj ki sharah 10 mein se 4 se kam hai, jis mein 3 se 8 ke darmiyan log kayi mahino ke andar dobarah honay lagtay hain. ilaaj ke baad khatray ke awamil ko mehdood karne mein madad mil sakti hai  ikhtiyarat ke baray mein apne health care faraham kanandah se baat karen .
context/0: bacterial vaginosis ka ilaaj kaisay karen .
context/1: andaam nihanivagina ke bacteria baaz auqaat tawazun se bahar ho jatay hain aur phir khud hi behtar ho jatay hain. bv ko roknay ke liye, apne khatray ke awamil ko mehdood karkay shuru karen. kndom istemaal karen, dotch nah karen aur tamam sabun ko apni volva aur andaam nihanivagina se daur rakhen  kuch mahireen kehte hain ke jhaag nah anay wala ghair khushbu wala sabun wolve par theek hai, aur dosray kehte hain ke pani se chipak jayen . is ilaqay mein khushbu ya prfume wali koi bhi masnoaat istemaal nah karen aur apne bulbala hamaam ko mehdood karen .  agarchay aksar, alamaat barqarar rehti hain ya dobarah aati hain aur un ka ilaaj karne ki zaroorat hoti hai. maslay ke maakhuz ko talaash karna sab se ziyada madadgaar saabit hoga, lekin yeh aksar mushkil hota hai jab bv ki wajohaat ke baray mein bohat kam maloom hota hai .
context/2: bacterial vaginosis ko kaisay roka jaye .
context/3: jinsi sargarmi bv ke ziyada khatray se bhi wabasta hai. makhsoos khatray ke awamil mein naye ya aik se ziyada jinsi shiraakat daar, kndom ke istemaal ki kami, andaam nihanivagina se jamaa karna aur baghair kisi hifazati rukawat ke andaam nihanivagina se hambistari se pehlay maqad se jinsi talluq haasil karna shaamil ho satke hain .
context/4: oh, to kya yeh sach hai ke jinsi sargarmi ka bacterial vaginosis se koi talluq hai ?

response: agar aap is par munhasir hain to, apne shiraakat daaron aur doston ke sath bv ke baray mein baat karen. is ke ird gird baydaari ki kami heran kin hai ke yeh kitna aam hai. bv ke baray mein maloomat ko awaami baydaari mein laane se is tanao ko roknay mein madad millti hai jo is ke honay se aasakta hai .

response: hormone estrogen andaam nihanivagina ko num rakhnay aur andaam nihanivagina ke asterlining ki motai ko barqarar rakhnay mein madad karta hai. atrophic vaginitis  vulvovaginal atrophy  aik aam haalat hai jo is waqt ho sakti hai jab reham mein estrogen ki kam miqdaar peda hoti hai, jis mein andaam nihanivagina ki khushki ki numaya alamat shaamil hai .

response: aap ki jinsi khwahish kuch unhi hormones se mutasir hoti hai jo aap ke cycle ke sath utaar charhao atay hain, jaisay estrogen aur progestrone. aap ko maloom ho sakta hai ke aap ki khwahish beza daaniovary tak ke dinon mein barhti hai aur beza khatam honay ke baad kam hoti hai. sex drive kam hosakti hai jab luotel marhalay ke douran ziyada progestrone peda hota hai  beza ke baad ke din aur mahvari tak . bilkul kis terhan toleedi hormones khwahish aur tarjeeh ko mutasir karte hain sab ke liye yaksaa nahi hai. kuch log apne haiz se pehlay ke tajarbay ke hissay ke tor par ziyada sex drive ki ittila dete hain, jab ke kuch log jinsi khwahish mein kami ke sath mojood hotay hain. apne poooray daur mein khwahish ka suraagh lagana aap ko yeh daryaft karne mein madad kar sakta hai ke aap ke liye kya sach hai .

context/0: meri jinsi khwahish mein utaar charhao kyun araha hai ?
context/1: hormone estrogen andaam nihanivagina ko num rakhnay aur andaam nihanivagina ke asterlining ki motai ko barqarar rakhnay mein madad karta hai. atrophic vaginitis  vulvovaginal atrophy  aik aam haalat hai jo is waqt ho sakti hai jab reham mein estrogen ki kam miqdaar peda hoti hai, jis mein andaam nihanivagina ki khushki ki numaya alamat shaamil hai .
context/2: meri andaam nihanivagina khushk hai me kya karun ?
context/3: theek hai, aap ka din shandaar guzray. alvidah !
context/4: nahi shukriya
context/5: mein yahan par khush hon. kya aap ke paas mere liye mazeed sawalaat hain ?

response: agar aap dawaiyon ya hormonal birth control ki aik shakal ke baad se khushki ka saamna kar rahay hain to : apne health care faraham kanandah se baat karen ke koi aur aazmayen jo aap ke jism ke liye behtar ho . agar aap ko shak hai ke aap ki khushki kam estrogen ki satah ki wajah se hosakti hai, to ilaaj ke kayi ikhtiyarat hain : andaam nihanivagina ke moisturize ya chikna karne walay maday, muqami andaam nihanivagina estrogen kareem ya goli. yeh jannay ke liye ke aap ke liye behtareen option kya hai apne health care faraham kanandah se milein . agar aap ka jinsi saathi jo kuch kar raha hai woh aap ke liye kaam nahi karta hai : aap apni jinsi pasand aur napasand par baat karne ki koshish kar satke hain . agar aap mehsoos karte hain ke aap aan hain lekin aap geelay nahi hain : for pallay par ziyada waqt guzaarna aap ke qudrati chikna ko badhaane ka aik tareeqa ho sakta hai. dosra option yeh hai ke jinsi amal ke douran zaati chikna karne wala  lube  istemaal kya jaye .

response: jinsi hosla afzai aur estrogen ki satah ke ilawa, izafi awamil hain jo andaam nihanivagina ki chikna ko mutasir kar satke hain :  andaam nihanivagina ki khushki kuch adwiyaat aur Maney hamal adwiyaat ka zimni assar ho sakta hai. yeh jannay ke liye apne health care faraham kanandah se baat karen ke aaya aap ki andaam nihanivagina ki khushki ka zareya aap ki dawa ya Maney hamal ho sakta hai. taham, kayi hain

response: aap ki andaam nihanivagina khud ki safai karti hai, is liye kisi bhi androoni wash  dotch  ya andaam nihanivagina ke dyodornt istemaal karne ki zaroorat nahi hai  dar haqeeqat, woh nuqsaan da ho satke hain. tehqeeq ne douching ke amal ko bacterial aur khameeryeast ke infection, shoroni soozish ki bemari, cervical cancer, stis ki barhti hui muntaqili, oopri genital ki naali ke infection, endometritis  bacha daaniuterus ki asterlining ki soozish  aur deegar manfi sehat ke nataij se jora hai .

response: ghair mamooli  ghair mamooli  kharij honay wala madahfluid kisi maslay ka ishara ho sakta hai, jaisay ke bacterial Vaginosis , khameeryeast ka infection, ya trichomoniasis jaisa s tea aayi. yahan ghair mamooli kharij honay walay madahfluid ke kuch isharay hain :  rang : surmai, sabz, peela, bhoora hajam : ahem miqdaar, aksar deegar alamaat jaisay kharish ke sath mustaqil mizaji : seyalfluid bohat patla, ya gaarha aur ziyada banawat wala ho jata hai . bo : nakhushgawaar, machhli, dhaati ghair mamooli kharij honay walay madahfluid ko chore kar, aap ke poooray daur mein andaam nihanivagina ke seyalfluid ki mukhtalif aqsam, neez jinsi sargarmi ke douran aur baad mein dekhna mamool hai .

context: ghair mamooli  ghair mamooli  kharij honay wala madahfluid kisi maslay ka ishara ho sakta hai, jaisay ke bacterial Vaginosis , khameeryeast ka infection, ya trichomoniasis jaisa s tea aayi. yahan ghair mamooli kharij honay walay madahfluid ke kuch isharay hain :  rang : surmai, sabz, peela, bhoora hajam : ahem miqdaar, aksar deegar alamaat jaisay kharish ke sath mustaqil mizaji : seyalfluid bohat patla, ya gaarha aur ziyada banawat wala ho jata hai . bo : nakhushgawaar, machhli, dhaati ghair mamooli kharij honay walay madahfluid ko chore kar, aap ke poooray daur mein andaam nihanivagina ke seyalfluid ki mukhtalif aqsam, neez jinsi sargarmi ke douran aur baad mein dekhna mamool hai .
context/0: ghair mamooli kharij honay walay madahfluid ki shanakht kaisay karen .
context/1: aap ki andaam nihanivagina khud ki safai karti hai, is liye kisi bhi androoni wash  dotch  ya andaam nihanivagina ke dyodornt istemaal karne ki zaroorat nahi hai  dar haqeeqat, woh nuqsaan da ho satke hain. tehqeeq ne douching ke amal ko bacterial aur khameeryeast ke infection, shoroni soozish ki bemari, cervical cancer, stis ki barhti hui muntaqili, oopri genital ki naali ke infection, endometritis  bacha daaniuterus ki asterlining ki soozish  aur deegar manfi sehat ke nataij se jora hai .
context/2: kya meri andaam nihanivagina ko saaf karne ki zaroorat hai ?
context/3: jinsi hosla afzai aur estrogen ki satah ke ilawa, izafi awamil hain jo andaam nihanivagina ki chikna ko mutasir kar satke hain :  andaam nihanivagina ki khushki kuch adwiyaat aur Maney hamal adwiyaat ka zimni assar ho sakta hai. yeh jannay ke liye apne health care faraham kanandah se baat karen ke aaya aap ki andaam nihanivagina ki khushki ka zareya aap ki dawa ya Maney hamal ho sakta hai. taham, kayi hain
context/4: kya andaam nihanivagina ki khushki ki koi ghair mamooli wajohaat hain ?
context/5: agar aap dawaiyon ya hormonal birth control ki aik shakal ke baad se khushki ka saamna kar rahay hain to : apne health care faraham kanandah se baat karen ke koi aur aazmayen jo aap ke jism ke liye behtar ho . agar aap ko shak hai ke aap ki khushki kam estrogen ki satah ki wajah se hosakti hai, to ilaaj ke kayi ikhtiyarat hain : andaam nihanivagina ke moisturize ya chikna karne walay maday, muqami andaam nihanivagina estrogen kareem ya goli. yeh jannay ke liye ke aap ke liye behtareen option kya hai apne health care faraham kanandah se milein . agar aap ka jinsi saathi jo kuch kar raha hai woh aap ke liye kaam nahi karta hai : aap apni jinsi pasand aur napasand par baat karne ki koshish kar satke hain . agar aap mehsoos karte hain ke aap aan hain lekin aap geelay nahi hain : for pallay par ziyada waqt guzaarna aap ke qudrati chikna ko badhaane ka aik tareeqa ho sakta hai. dosra option yeh hai ke jinsi amal ke douran zaati chikna karne wala  lube  istemaal kya jaye .

response: aap ke nipples aur chatiyon mein tabdeeli pehli cheez ho sakti hai jisay aap mehsoos karte hain. shuru mein, aap ke nipples ke ird gird chhootey takra ubhray hue hain. is ke baad, aap ke nipples ka gehra hissa bara ho jaye ga aur phoolna shuru ho jaye ga. un ko breast bdz kehte hain. yeh aik hi waqt mein dono taraf ho sakta hai, ya pehlay sirf aik taraf. agar yeh aik taraf hota hai, to doosri taraf ko pakarney mein 6 mahinay lag satke hain .  ziyada tar logon ko pehli baar apni chhaati ke bherne ke 23 saal baad aata hai. agar aap ki chhaati ki kaliyan aap ki class ke ziyada tar logon ke muqablay mein baad mein banti hain, jaisay ke jab aap 13 saal ke hotay hain, to aap ki mahvari shuru honay mein aik saal se bhi kam waqt lag sakta hai .

response: chhaati ki kaliyon ke baad, aap zaire naaf balon ki pehli alamaat dekh satke hain. shuru mein sirf chand lambay baal agg satke hain. aap ke zaire naaf baal waqt ke sath barheen ge, aur woh baal ghungheryalay, ghany aur aap ki ranon ki taraf phail jayen ge .  aik mauqa hai ke aap ko apni chatiyon ke bherne se pehlay naaf ke kuch baal nazar ayen ge, lekin ziyada tar log usay is ke bar aks dekhte hain .  aap ko shayad aap ke baazuon ke neechay koi baal nazar nahi aaye ga jab tak ke aap ki mahvari shuru nahi hoti, ya is se kuch pehlay is waqt aap ke jism ki shakal aur qad bhi badalta rahay ga. jab tak aap chhaati ki kaliyon ko dekhen ge, aap ka poora jism pehlay hi taizi se barhna shuru kar chuka hoga .

context/3: aap ke nipples aur chatiyon mein tabdeeli pehli cheez ho sakti hai jisay aap mehsoos karte hain. shuru mein, aap ke nipples ke ird gird chhootey takra ubhray hue hain. is ke baad, aap ke nipples ka gehra hissa bara ho jaye ga aur phoolna shuru ho jaye ga. un ko breast bdz kehte hain. yeh aik hi waqt mein dono taraf ho sakta hai, ya pehlay sirf aik taraf. agar yeh aik taraf hota hai, to doosri taraf ko pakarney mein 6 mahinay lag satke hain .  ziyada tar logon ko pehli baar apni chhaati ke bherne ke 23 saal baad aata hai. agar aap ki chhaati ki kaliyan aap ki class ke ziyada tar logon ke muqablay mein baad mein banti hain, jaisay ke jab aap 13 saal ke hotay hain, to aap ki mahvari shuru honay mein aik saal se bhi kam waqt lag sakta hai .

response: bohat si tabdeelian jo aap apne cycle ke douran apne balon se munsalik kar satke hain woh aap ke sebaceous ghudood se tail ki pedawar mein honay wali tabdeelion ki wajah se hain. chunkay sebum  sebaceous ghudood se peda honay wala tail  aur balon ke follicle jald mein aik hi sorakh se bahar nikaltay hain, is liye balon aur is ke aas paas ki jald sebum mein lapit ho sakti hai. aik tehqeeq mein aik dilchasp nateeja samnay aaya : yahan tak ke agar haiz ke douran balon ke ziyada kharab din register kiye gaye thay, to woh khopdi ke sebum ki satah mein izafay ke sath koi talluq nahi rakhtay thay. balon ke kharab dinon ki koi wazeh wazahat nahi thi  shayad is ki wajah un ke balon ke baray mein shurka ke zaati khayaal mein farq hai. tabdeeli aap ke sir par hai ya aap ke sir mein? dilchasp hai na ?

response: kuch hormonal Maney hamal adwiyaat  jaisay chlormadinone acetate, aik masnoi progestrone jo anti endrogen sargarmi faraham karti hai  balon aur jald ke miyaar ko bhi mutasir kar sakti hain. yeh adwiyaat lainay walay logon ke aik mutalea mein, shurka ne sebum ki pedawar mein kami ki thi aur balon ke miyaar ko behtar banaya tha. sebum ki pedawar aap ke hormones, khaas tor par endrogen  jaisay tistostiron  se mutasir hoti hai. sebum ki pedawar aksar baloghat ke douran bohat ziyada barh jati hai, aksar 15 se 35 saal ki Umar ke darmiyan ziyada miqdaar mein peda hoti hai, jaisa ke jald par andaza lagaya jata hai. estrogen sebum ki pedawar ko bhi mutasir karta hai, khaas tor par ziyada miqdaar mein .

context/3: aap ki chatiyon ke bherne ke kuch der baad, aap apni andaam nihanivagina mein seyalfluid mein tabdeeli mehsoos kar satke hain, aur yeh pehlay ke muqablay mein thora geela mehsoos kar sakta hai. kuch log usay pehli mahvari se taqreeban 612 mah pehlay mehsoos karen ge. yeh mumkina tor par aik patla, safaid rang ka maya hoga, aur is mein ziyada bo nahi hogi .  jaisay jaisay aap apni pehli mahvari ke qareeb pohnchain ge, aap apni andaam nihanivagina se rozana bdalty hue seyalfluid ko dekh saken ge. yahan tak ke agar aap ko abhi tak haiz nahi aaya hai, to yeh aap ke mahvari ka aaghaz hai, jo ke aap ki mahvari se kahin ziyada hai .
context/4: meri pehli mahvari se pehlay meri andaam nihanivagina ka seyalfluid kaisay tabdeel hota hai .
context/5: aap ki mahvari shuru honay se pehlay aap ke jism ki shakal aur size bhi taizi se badal jatay hain. aap ki sab se barri taraqqi aap ki pehli mahvari se chay mah se aik saal pehlay hosakti hai  yeh ziyada tar logon ke liye hota hai, sab ke liye nahi . agar aap dekhte hain ke aap ka qad taizi se barhta hai aur phir aahista hona shuru ho jata hai, to ho sakta hai aap ki pehli mahvari khatam honay wali ho. aap ke kullho ke choray hotay hi aap ki patlon ka size bara hona bhi mamool hai. aap ke jism ke kuch hissay ziyada motay aur gole ho jayen ge, jabkay dosray hissay waisay hi rahen ge. aap dekh satke hain ke yeh isi waqt shuru hota hai jab aap ki chhaati ki kaliyan barhna shuru hoti hain . aap ke jism ki nashonuma ka sahih waqt aap ke liye munfarid hoga .

response: mein kis terhan madad kar sakta hon ?
context: mera aik sawal hai
context/0: kuch hormonal Maney hamal adwiyaat  jaisay chlormadinone acetate, aik masnoi progestrone jo anti endrogen sargarmi faraham karti hai  balon aur jald ke miyaar ko bhi mutasir kar sakti hain. yeh adwiyaat lainay walay logon ke aik mutalea mein, shurka ne sebum ki pedawar mein kami ki thi aur balon ke miyaar ko behtar banaya tha. sebum ki pedawar aap ke hormones, khaas tor par endrogen  jaisay tistostiron  se mutasir hoti hai. sebum ki pedawar aksar baloghat ke douran bohat ziyada barh jati hai, aksar 15 se 35 saal ki Umar ke darmiyan ziyada miqdaar mein peda hoti hai, jaisa ke jald par andaza lagaya jata hai. estrogen sebum ki pedawar ko bhi mutasir karta hai, khaas tor par ziyada miqdaar mein .

response: haiz ke sath pait ki makhsoos qisam ki shikayaat ka ilaaj karne ke baray mein bohat ziyada tehqeeq nahi hai. angothay ke usool ke tor par, jab aap ko ishaal hota hai, to yeh acha hai ke aap apne pakhanay ke zariye kho jane walay mayaat ko tabdeel kar saken. namak peenay aur khanay se madad mil sakti hai, lehaza aap soop, saada krikr, ya khelon ke mashrobat aazma satke hain. doodh ki masnoaat, sodda aur juice se parhaiz karen. agar aap ka dorania ishaal chand dinon se ziyada arsa tak rehta hai, to apne health care faraham kanandah se rabita karen .  agar aap apni mahvari ke douran haazma ke masail ke sath jadojehad karte hain, to aik option yeh hai ke aap apne sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne walay se Maney hamal ki aik shakal shuru karne ke baray mein baat karen jo aap ko mahvari ko chorney mein madad day sakti hai, jaisay ke Maney hamal golian .

response: jab aap ka jism un prostaglandins proinflammatory chemical messenger  ko jari karta hai, jo aap ke bacha daaniuterus ko sukarnay ki tehreek deta hai, to aap ka endometrial asterlining aap ke reham se kharij hota hai. yeh ovarian hormones estrogen aur progestrone mein taizi se kami ke sath mil kar, haiz se pehlay aur is ke douran maiday ki tabdeelion ke liye zimma daar manay jatay hain. is ki wajah yeh khayaal kya jata hai ke prostaglandins qareebi anton ke bafton par bhi kaam kar satke hain, jis se soozish hoti hai .

response: har koi pakhana ke namonon mein is tabdeeli ko mehsoos nahi karsaktha. aik tehqeeq se pata chala hai ke aayi bi s ya anton ke deegar amraaz mein mubtala taqreeban 50  log apni muddat ke douran anton ki aadaat mein tabdeeli ka tajurbah karte hain. is ke muqablay mein, anton ki kharabi ke baghair sirf aik tahai khawateen ne haiz se mutaliq anton mein tabdeeli ka tajurbah kya. is ka matlab yeh hai ke har aik ko apni mahvari ke douran ishaal ya maiday ki deegar takleef ka saamna nahi hota hai. agar koi shakhs pehlay se hi anton ki takleef ke sath rehta hai, to is ke haiz ke douran anton ki aadaat mein tabdeeli ka imkaan ziyada ho sakta hai .

context/2: mujhe mahvari ke douran ishaal kyun ho raha hai ?
context/3: haiz ke sath pait ki makhsoos qisam ki shikayaat ka ilaaj karne ke baray mein bohat ziyada tehqeeq nahi hai. angothay ke usool ke tor par, jab aap ko ishaal hota hai, to yeh acha hai ke aap apne pakhanay ke zariye kho jane walay mayaat ko tabdeel kar saken. namak peenay aur khanay se madad mil sakti hai, lehaza aap soop, saada krikr, ya khelon ke mashrobat aazma satke hain. doodh ki masnoaat, sodda aur juice se parhaiz karen. agar aap ka dorania ishaal chand dinon se ziyada arsa tak rehta hai, to apne health care faraham kanandah se rabita karen .  agar aap apni mahvari ke douran haazma ke masail ke sath jadojehad karte hain, to aik option yeh hai ke aap apne sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne walay se Maney hamal ki aik shakal shuru karne ke baray mein baat karen jo aap ko mahvari ko chorney mein madad day sakti hai, jaisay ke Maney hamal golian .
context/4: kya mein mahvari se pehlay aphara aur muddat ke ishaal ko rokkk sakta hon ?
context/5: mein kis terhan madad kar sakta hon ?

response: mukhtalif qisam ke halaat hain jo hmb ka sabab ban satke hain. sab se aam halaat mein shaamil hain : polyps, ya bacha daaniuterus ke asterlining mein izafah, aam tor par mahvari aur baaz auqaat hmb ke darmiyan dhabbay ya khoon behnay ka sabab bantaa hai . bacha daaniuterus ke fibroids, bacha daaniuterus par somi nashonuma  hamwar pathon ke tumor , jisay leiomyomas bhi kaha jata hai, baaz auqaat hmb ka sabab ban sakta hai . cancer aur precancers bohat ghair mamooli hain, lekin ahem hain, ghair mamooli khoon behnay ki wajohaat, khaas tor par 40 saal se kam Umar ke afraad ke liye .
context: mere mahvari mein bhaari khoon behnay ki wajah kya hai ?
context/0: har koi pakhana ke namonon mein is tabdeeli ko mehsoos nahi karsaktha. aik tehqeeq se pata chala hai ke aayi bi s ya anton ke deegar amraaz mein mubtala taqreeban 50  log apni muddat ke douran anton ki aadaat mein tabdeeli ka tajurbah karte hain. is ke muqablay mein, anton ki kharabi ke baghair sirf aik tahai khawateen ne haiz se mutaliq anton mein tabdeeli ka tajurbah kya. is ka matlab yeh hai ke har aik ko apni mahvari ke douran ishaal ya maiday ki deegar takleef ka saamna nahi hota hai. agar koi shakhs pehlay se hi anton ki takleef ke sath rehta hai, to is ke haiz ke douran anton ki aadaat mein tabdeeli ka imkaan ziyada ho sakta hai .

response: darj zail mein se koi bhi aap ko bhaari adwaar ki shanakht mein madad kar sakta hai :  aap ki mahvari saat din se ziyada rehti hai . aap ka bahao tempon ya pad ke zariye har ghantay lagataar chand ghanton tak bhigota hai . aap ko raat ke waqt pad ya tempon tabdeel karne ki zaroorat hai . aap ke paas angoor ke size ke mutadid  ya barray  khoon ke jamnay hain . aap ki mahvari ka bhaari bahao aap ko un kamon se rokta hai jo aap aam tor par karte hain . aap thakey hue hain, aap mein tawanai ki kami hai ya aap ko saans lainay mein takleef hai . aap ko apne pait aur kamar ke nichale hissay mein shadeed dard mehsoos hota hai .

response: hmb ke ilaaj ke liye aap ko aur aap ke health care faraham kanandah ko is ki wajah ya wajohaat ka taayun karne ki zaroorat hai. yeh chand saada tiston ke zariye kya ja sakta hai jis mein khoon ka test, trans vaginal altrasaond aur ya uterin asterlining  endometrial biopsy  se tissue ka namona lena shaamil hai . kuch wajohaat mein polyps, fibroids, cancer, khoon ka jamna, aur iron ki kami shaamil hain. un wajohaat mein se har aik ka ilaaj mukhtalif hoga .

response: khoon ka rang badalta hai is baat par munhasir hai ke yeh sunhwa ke oxygen ke kitney arsay se samnay aaya hai. jab aap ko mahvari aati hai, to aap ka endometrium  aap ke reham ki androoni asterlining  aik sath allag nahi hota, aap ke endometrial tissue ko aap ke garewa aur andaam nihanivagina ke zariye neechay anay mein waqt lagta hai. yeh ibtidayi khoon aur baftin gehray surkh ya bhooray, ya yahan tak ke siyah bhi nazar askati hain kyunkay aap ke jism se bahar niklny mein ziyada waqt lagta hai. jaisay hi tissue toot jata hai, yeh khoon ki nalion ke phatay hue suron ko chore deta hai jin se khoon jari rehta hai. yeh woh jagah hai jahan se aap ko mahvari ke douran chamakdar surkh khoon nazar aata hai. jaisa ke aik muddat ke ekhtataam ki taraf khoon behna sust ho jata hai, yeh aik baar phir gehra surkh ya bhoora zahir ho sakta hai .

response: mein ne apni mahvari ke douran khoon ke mukhtalif rang dekhe, kya un ki koi ahmiyat hai ?
context: khoon ka rang badalta hai is baat par munhasir hai ke yeh sunhwa ke oxygen ke kitney arsay se samnay aaya hai. jab aap ko mahvari aati hai, to aap ka endometrium  aap ke reham ki androoni asterlining  aik sath allag nahi hota, aap ke endometrial tissue ko aap ke garewa aur andaam nihanivagina ke zariye neechay anay mein waqt lagta hai. yeh ibtidayi khoon aur baftin gehray surkh ya bhooray, ya yahan tak ke siyah bhi nazar askati hain kyunkay aap ke jism se bahar niklny mein ziyada waqt lagta hai. jaisay hi tissue toot jata hai, yeh khoon ki nalion ke phatay hue suron ko chore deta hai jin se khoon jari rehta hai. yeh woh jagah hai jahan se aap ko mahvari ke douran chamakdar surkh khoon nazar aata hai. jaisa ke aik muddat ke ekhtataam ki taraf khoon behna sust ho jata hai, yeh aik baar phir gehra surkh ya bhoora zahir ho sakta hai .
context/0: aap ke mahvari ke khoon ke rang ka kya matlab hai ?
context/1: hmb ke ilaaj ke liye aap ko aur aap ke health care faraham kanandah ko is ki wajah ya wajohaat ka taayun karne ki zaroorat hai. yeh chand saada tiston ke zariye kya ja sakta hai jis mein khoon ka test, trans vaginal altrasaond aur ya uterin asterlining  endometrial biopsy  se tissue ka namona lena shaamil hai . kuch wajohaat mein polyps, fibroids, cancer, khoon ka jamna, aur iron ki kami shaamil hain. un wajohaat mein se har aik ka ilaaj mukhtalif hoga .
context/2: mein bhaari haiz ke liye kya karoon, yeh bohat be cheeni hai
context/3: darj zail mein se koi bhi aap ko bhaari adwaar ki shanakht mein madad kar sakta hai :  aap ki mahvari saat din se ziyada rehti hai . aap ka bahao tempon ya pad ke zariye har ghantay lagataar chand ghanton tak bhigota hai . aap ko raat ke waqt pad ya tempon tabdeel karne ki zaroorat hai . aap ke paas angoor ke size ke mutadid  ya barray  khoon ke jamnay hain . aap ki mahvari ka bhaari bahao aap ko un kamon se rokta hai jo aap aam tor par karte hain . aap thakey hue hain, aap mein tawanai ki kami hai ya aap ko saans lainay mein takleef hai . aap ko apne pait aur kamar ke nichale hissay mein shadeed dard mehsoos hota hai .
context/4: lekin mujhe nahi maloom ke un ki shanakht kaisay ki jaye aur mein khaufzadah hon .
context/5: mukhtalif qisam ke halaat hain jo hmb ka sabab ban satke hain. sab se aam halaat mein shaamil hain : polyps, ya bacha daaniuterus ke asterlining mein izafah, aam tor par mahvari aur baaz auqaat hmb ke darmiyan dhabbay ya khoon behnay ka sabab bantaa hai . bacha daaniuterus ke fibroids, bacha daaniuterus par somi nashonuma  hamwar pathon ke tumor , jisay leiomyomas bhi kaha jata hai, baaz auqaat hmb ka sabab ban sakta hai . cancer aur precancers bohat ghair mamooli hain, lekin ahem hain, ghair mamooli khoon behnay ki wajohaat, khaas tor par 40 saal se kam Umar ke afraad ke liye .

response: aap ki mahvari ke aaghaz ya ekhtataam par, khoon gehra bhoora saya ho sakta hai aur is mein gaarha mustaqil mizaji ho sakta hai  lekin aap ki mahvari ki pehli alamaat ka roshan surkh aur ziyada maya hona bhi mamool hai .  agar aap ko apni mahvari ke aaghaz ya ekhtataam par brown period ka khoon nazar aata hai, to is ki wajah yeh hai ke khoon purana hai aur aap ke reham se niklny mein ziyada waqt lagta hai. bacha daaniuterus ki parat siyah ho jati hai jism se niklny mein jitna ziyada waqt lagta hai .  aap ki mahvari ke sab se bhaari dinon mein khoon ke jamnay mamool ki baat hai aur yeh gehray surkh ya taqreeban gehray siyah bhi zahir ho satke hain .
context: mein ne apni mahvari ke douran khoon ke mukhtalif rang dekhe, kya un ki koi ahmiyat hai ?

response: dorania ka bahao aam tor par cycle ke dosray ya teesray din bhaari ho jata hai kyunkay bacha daaniuterus ki parat taizi se beh jati hai. roshan surkh daur ka khoon aik naya khoon hai, is terhan aap ke jism se bahar niklny se pehlay is ke paas siyah honay ka waqt nahi hota hai .

response: spotting koi bhi khoon behna hai jo aap ke mamool ke dorania se bahar hota hai. kuch logon ko darmiyani chakkar mein dhabbay nazar atay hain, jisay baizvi khoon behna bhi kaha jata hai. khoon behna jo zarkhaiz cervical seyalfluid ke sath mil jata hai halka surkh ya gulaabii zahir ho sakta hai .  pani daar, gulaabii andaam nihanivagina se kharij honay wala madahfluid jo be qaida tor par hota hai  baghair kisi patteren ke aur aap ke mahvari se mutaliq nahi  garewa ke cancer ki alamat ho sakti hai aur is ka andaza sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne walay se karana chahiye .

context/4: aap ki mahvari ke aaghaz ya ekhtataam par, khoon gehra bhoora saya ho sakta hai aur is mein gaarha mustaqil mizaji ho sakta hai  lekin aap ki mahvari ki pehli alamaat ka roshan surkh aur ziyada maya hona bhi mamool hai .  agar aap ko apni mahvari ke aaghaz ya ekhtataam par brown period ka khoon nazar aata hai, to is ki wajah yeh hai ke khoon purana hai aur aap ke reham se niklny mein ziyada waqt lagta hai. bacha daaniuterus ki parat siyah ho jati hai jism se niklny mein jitna ziyada waqt lagta hai .  aap ki mahvari ke sab se bhaari dinon mein khoon ke jamnay mamool ki baat hai aur yeh gehray surkh ya taqreeban gehray siyah bhi zahir ho satke hain .
context/5: mein ne apni mahvari ke douran khoon ke mukhtalif rang dekhe, kya un ki koi ahmiyat hai ?

response: yeh malomati tha, alvidah
context: agar aap ko surmai rang ka madahfluid hai to yeh infection ki alamat ho sakti hai. agar aap ko surmai bafton ke tukron ke sath bohat ziyada khoon beh raha hai, to yeh isqaat hamal ki alamat ho sakti hai. kisi bhi soorat e haal ke liye sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne walay ko dekhnay ki sifarish ki jati hai .
context/0: is ka kya matlab hai agar mera mahvari ka khoon giray ho ?
context/1: spotting koi bhi khoon behna hai jo aap ke mamool ke dorania se bahar hota hai. kuch logon ko darmiyani chakkar mein dhabbay nazar atay hain, jisay baizvi khoon behna bhi kaha jata hai. khoon behna jo zarkhaiz cervical seyalfluid ke sath mil jata hai halka surkh ya gulaabii zahir ho sakta hai .  pani daar, gulaabii andaam nihanivagina se kharij honay wala madahfluid jo be qaida tor par hota hai  baghair kisi patteren ke aur aap ke mahvari se mutaliq nahi  garewa ke cancer ki alamat ho sakti hai aur is ka andaza sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne walay se karana chahiye .

response: mahvari ka khoon behna  yani aap ki mahvari , daghdar hona, aur ghair mahvari khoon behnay ke darmiyan ki lakerain uljan ka baais ban sakti hain. mahvari ka khoon behna woh khoon hai jo mahvari ke ekhtataam par endometrium ke behnay se hota hai. spotting ki mukhtalif tareefen hain, is par munhasir hai ke aap kis se puchhte hain .

response: mohqiqeen aur sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne walay aksar spotting ko khoon behnay ke tor par bayan karte hain jis ke liye sinitri tahaffuz ki zaroorat nahi hoti hai  misaal ke tor par aap ko pad ya tempon istemaal karne ki zaroorat nahi hai  .  taham, yeh aik sawab dedi tareef hai. yahan tak ke agar khoon bohat ziyada nahi hai, kuch log sirf tahaffuz istemaal karne ka intikhab kar satke hain .  usooli tor par, aap ke cycle ke douran kisi bhi waqt daagh lag sakta hai, is liye muddat ke ird gird ya adwaar ke darmiyan. aisa khoon behna jo muddat se wabasta nahi lagta, jaisay aap ke cycle ke wast mein khoon behna, jis ke liye sinitri tahaffuz ki zaroorat hoti hai, ghair mahvari khoon behna kehlata hai. baaz auqaat log is khoon ko bhaari dhabbay ke tor par bayan karte hain .

response: baaz auqaat log halkay se khoon behnay ki wazahat karte hain jo un ki muddat ke aaghaz ya ekhtataam par hota hai jaisay dhabba .  sirf miqdaar ko dekh kar mahvari ke khoon se dhabbon mein farq karna mushkil ho sakta hai. aam tor par, agar aap ko halka khoon beh raha hai jo aap ki mahvari ke do din ke andar hota hai, to aap ko apni mahvari ke is hissay par ghhor karna chahiye, nah ke dhabba. taham, agar yeh bohat, bohat halka hai  jaisay ke aap ko apne toilet paper par thora sa nazar aata hai  jisay shayad spotting samjha ja sakta hai .  misaal ke tor par, agar aap ko itwaar ko halka khoon aata hai, paiir ko koi khoon nahi aata hai, aur mangal ko tempon ki zaroorat ke liye itna khoon behta hai, to aap ko itwaar ko apni mahvari ke aaghaz par ghhor karna chahiye .

response: dhabbay aap ke oopri toleedi rastay  jaisay aap ke bacha daaniuterus  ya aap ke nichale toleedi rastay  jaisay aap ki garewa ya andaam nihanivagina  se asaktay hain. spotting aap ki muddat se mukhtalif hai, jo ke aap ke reham ke asterlining , aap ke endometrium ki cyclicalshedding hai. bhaari dhabbay aksar bacha daaniuterus se hotay hain, jabkay halkay dhabbay oopri ya nichale rastay se asaktay hain .

context/1: baaz auqaat log halkay se khoon behnay ki wazahat karte hain jo un ki muddat ke aaghaz ya ekhtataam par hota hai jaisay dhabba .  sirf miqdaar ko dekh kar mahvari ke khoon se dhabbon mein farq karna mushkil ho sakta hai. aam tor par, agar aap ko halka khoon beh raha hai jo aap ki mahvari ke do din ke andar hota hai, to aap ko apni mahvari ke is hissay par ghhor karna chahiye, nah ke dhabba. taham, agar yeh bohat, bohat halka hai  jaisay ke aap ko apne toilet paper par thora sa nazar aata hai  jisay shayad spotting samjha ja sakta hai .  misaal ke tor par, agar aap ko itwaar ko halka khoon aata hai, paiir ko koi khoon nahi aata hai, aur mangal ko tempon ki zaroorat ke liye itna khoon behta hai, to aap ko itwaar ko apni mahvari ke aaghaz par ghhor karna chahiye .
context/2: thora khoon behnay se spotting kaisay mukhtalif hai ?
context/3: mohqiqeen aur sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne walay aksar spotting ko khoon behnay ke tor par bayan karte hain jis ke liye sinitri tahaffuz ki zaroorat nahi hoti hai  misaal ke tor par aap ko pad ya tempon istemaal karne ki zaroorat nahi hai  .  taham, yeh aik sawab dedi tareef hai. yahan tak ke agar khoon bohat ziyada nahi hai, kuch log sirf tahaffuz istemaal karne ka intikhab kar satke hain .  usooli tor par, aap ke cycle ke douran kisi bhi waqt daagh lag sakta hai, is liye muddat ke ird gird ya adwaar ke darmiyan. aisa khoon behna jo muddat se wabasta nahi lagta, jaisay aap ke cycle ke wast mein khoon behna, jis ke liye sinitri tahaffuz ki zaroorat hoti hai, ghair mahvari khoon behna kehlata hai. baaz auqaat log is khoon ko bhaari dhabbay ke tor par bayan karte hain .
context/4: spotting kya hai ?
context/5: mahvari ka khoon behna  yani aap ki mahvari , daghdar hona, aur ghair mahvari khoon behnay ke darmiyan ki lakerain uljan ka baais ban sakti hain. mahvari ka khoon behna woh khoon hai jo mahvari ke ekhtataam par endometrium ke behnay se hota hai. spotting ki mukhtalif tareefen hain, is par munhasir hai ke aap kis se puchhte hain .

response: zaroor daagh dhabbon ka hona bhi ibtidayi hamal ki aik aam alamat hai. taqreeban 4 mein se 1 logon ko dhabbay lagnay ka tajurbah hota hai, aam tor par kisi ko mahvari ki tawaqqa ke taqreeban 1 se 4 haftay baad. agar aap isqaat hamal honay ke baray mein fikar mand hain, to fikar nah karen. taham, bhaari dhabbay ya khoon behna tashweesh ka baais ho sakta hai. agar aap haamla hain aur khoon beh raha hai, to apne health care faraham kanandah ko cal karen taakay woh bitayen ke kya ho raha hai .  dhabbay aana ectopic hamal ki alamat ho sakta hai, aisa hamal jo bacha daaniuterus, aam tor par falopeen tube ke ilawa kahin aur barh raha ho. ectopic hamal se khoon behna deegar alamaat ke sath mil sakta hai jis mein aik taraf pait mein dard, kandhay mein dard, aur chakkar aana shaamil hain. agar aap ko dhabbon ki alamaat ka saamna hai aur aap ko shuba hai ke aap ko ectopic hamal ho sakta hai, to fori tibbi madad haasil karen .

response: jismani halaat, infection, aur dhabbay dhabbay dhabbay bhi infections aur toleedi rastay mein jismani tabdeelion, ya hormonal Adam tawazun ki wajah se ho satke hain. jismani halaat jo daghdar aqsat ka sabab ban satke hain un mein fibroids, polyps aur endometriosis shaamil hain. shoroni soozish ki bemari  pid , jo is waqt hoti hai jab baaz shoroni infection  jaisay stis  ka ilaaj nahi kya jata hai, ghair tay shuda dhabbon ke liye aik aur mujrim bhi ho sakta hai. pishaab ki naali ke infection  utis  pishaab ki naali  jahan se aap pishaab karte hain, aap ke clitoris aur andaam nihanivagina ke darmiyan  se khoon beh sakta hai. dukhool andaam nihanivagina jamaa ke baad mustaqil tor par dhabbon ko aam nahi samjha jata hai. jinsi taluqaat ke baad khoon behna aksar garewa ya polyps ke maslay ki wajah se hota hai. kuch logon ko apne pehlay jamaa ke tajarbay ke baad dhabbon ka tajurbah ho sakta hai, jo ke aam baat hai. agar aap jinsi taluqaat ke baad dhabbay dekh rahay hain to apne health care faraham kanandah se baat karen .

context/2: zaroor daagh dhabbon ka hona bhi ibtidayi hamal ki aik aam alamat hai. taqreeban 4 mein se 1 logon ko dhabbay lagnay ka tajurbah hota hai, aam tor par kisi ko mahvari ki tawaqqa ke taqreeban 1 se 4 haftay baad. agar aap isqaat hamal honay ke baray mein fikar mand hain, to fikar nah karen. taham, bhaari dhabbay ya khoon behna tashweesh ka baais ho sakta hai. agar aap haamla hain aur khoon beh raha hai, to apne health care faraham kanandah ko cal karen taakay woh bitayen ke kya ho raha hai .  dhabbay aana ectopic hamal ki alamat ho sakta hai, aisa hamal jo bacha daaniuterus, aam tor par falopeen tube ke ilawa kahin aur barh raha ho. ectopic hamal se khoon behna deegar alamaat ke sath mil sakta hai jis mein aik taraf pait mein dard, kandhay mein dard, aur chakkar aana shaamil hain. agar aap ko dhabbon ki alamaat ka saamna hai aur aap ko shuba hai ke aap ko ectopic hamal ho sakta hai, to fori tibbi madad haasil karen .
context/3: haan mein hamal ke baray mein janna chahta hon jis ki wajah se daagh lagtay hain .
context/4: hormonal Maney hamal ka aik aam zimni assar hai, khaas tor par naya tareeqa shuru karne ke pehlay chand mahino ke douran. kya aap hamal mein dhabbon ke baray mein janna chahtay hain ?
context/5: jee haan baraye meharbani

response: aap kaisay jantay hain ke ovulation kab ho raha hai ?
context: jismani halaat, infection, aur dhabbay dhabbay dhabbay bhi infections aur toleedi rastay mein jismani tabdeelion, ya hormonal Adam tawazun ki wajah se ho satke hain. jismani halaat jo daghdar aqsat ka sabab ban satke hain un mein fibroids, polyps aur endometriosis shaamil hain. shoroni soozish ki bemari  pid , jo is waqt hoti hai jab baaz shoroni infection  jaisay stis  ka ilaaj nahi kya jata hai, ghair tay shuda dhabbon ke liye aik aur mujrim bhi ho sakta hai. pishaab ki naali ke infection  utis  pishaab ki naali  jahan se aap pishaab karte hain, aap ke clitoris aur andaam nihanivagina ke darmiyan  se khoon beh sakta hai. dukhool andaam nihanivagina jamaa ke baad mustaqil tor par dhabbon ko aam nahi samjha jata hai. jinsi taluqaat ke baad khoon behna aksar garewa ya polyps ke maslay ki wajah se hota hai. kuch logon ko apne pehlay jamaa ke tajarbay ke baad dhabbon ka tajurbah ho sakta hai, jo ke aam baat hai. agar aap jinsi taluqaat ke baad dhabbay dekh rahay hain to apne health care faraham kanandah se baat karen .
context/0: kya jismani halaat ya infection aur spotting ke darmiyan koi talluq hai ?

context/4: haan mein hamal ke baray mein janna chahta hon jis ki wajah se daagh lagtay hain .
context/5: hormonal Maney hamal ka aik aam zimni assar hai, khaas tor par naya tareeqa shuru karne ke pehlay chand mahino ke douran. kya aap hamal mein dhabbon ke baray mein janna chahtay hain ?

response: jaisay jaisay beza qareeb aata hai, aap ka jism ziyada cervical seyalfluid peda karta hai. jab aap baath room istemaal karte hain to aap is seyalfluid ko apne zair jama ya toilet paper par dekh satke hain. yehstretcher, saaf, aur ziyada geela aur phislan ho jata hai  jaisay kachay anday ki safedi. yeh seyalfluid beza daaniovary se taqreeban 1 se 2 din pehlay" chouti" ki taraf jata hai, jab estrogen sab se ziyada hota hai. kuch log baizvi dard ya" mittelschmerz" mehsoos karte hain  pait ke nichale hissay ke dono taraf mehsoos honay wala taiz ya dard jaisa dard, jo chand ghanton ya dinon tak jari reh sakta hai .  apne bunyadi jismani darja hararat  bbt  ka suraagh lagana bhi aap ko beza daaniovary ka pata laganay ki ijazat day sakta hai  jaisa ke progestrone bacha daaniuterus ko fertilized ke inplantation ke liye tayyar karne ke liye barhta hai, is se aap ke bi bi tea mein mamooli izafah hota hai. aap ovulation prediction testskits  opks  bhi istemaal kar satke hain .

response: uterine fibroids pathon ke bafton ki ghair mamooli nashonuma hain jo reham ki dewaron mein  ya is par  banti hain. fibroidssomi hotay hain  zindagi ke liye nuqsaan da nahi , lekin yeh andaam nihanivagina se be qaida khoon behna aur shoroni dard jaisi alamaat ka sabab ban satke hain .  uterine fibroids bohat aam hain. taqreeban 4 mein se 3 khawateen ko apni zindagi mein kisi nah kisi mauqa par yeh ho sakta hai. woh toleedi saloon ke douran sab se ziyada aam hain, aur africi nasal ke logon mein honay ka ziyada imkaan hai. uterine fibroids aksar koi alamaat peda nahi karte aur aksar rajonooti ke baad suker jatay hain. doosri sooraton mein, ilaaj nah kiye jane walay fibroidski wajah se bohat ziyada khoon behna, khoon ki kami, shoroni mein dard ya dabao, zarkhaizi mein tabdeeli, aur hamal ke douran paichidgiyan peda ho sakti hain. alamaat ka inhisaar fibroidske size, maqam aur tadaad par hota hai .

context/4: jismani halaat, infection, aur dhabbay dhabbay dhabbay bhi infections aur toleedi rastay mein jismani tabdeelion, ya hormonal Adam tawazun ki wajah se ho satke hain. jismani halaat jo daghdar aqsat ka sabab ban satke hain un mein fibroids, polyps aur endometriosis shaamil hain. shoroni soozish ki bemari  pid , jo is waqt hoti hai jab baaz shoroni infection  jaisay stis  ka ilaaj nahi kya jata hai, ghair tay shuda dhabbon ke liye aik aur mujrim bhi ho sakta hai. pishaab ki naali ke infection  utis  pishaab ki naali  jahan se aap pishaab karte hain, aap ke clitoris aur andaam nihanivagina ke darmiyan  se khoon beh sakta hai. dukhool andaam nihanivagina jamaa ke baad mustaqil tor par dhabbon ko aam nahi samjha jata hai. jinsi taluqaat ke baad khoon behna aksar garewa ya polyps ke maslay ki wajah se hota hai. kuch logon ko apne pehlay jamaa ke tajarbay ke baad dhabbon ka tajurbah ho sakta hai, jo ke aam baat hai. agar aap jinsi taluqaat ke baad dhabbay dekh rahay hain to apne health care faraham kanandah se baat karen .
context/5: kya jismani halaat ya infection aur spotting ke darmiyan koi talluq hai ?

response: uterine fibroids ki kuch aam alamaat yeh hain :  adwaar jo bhaari, taweel, ya takleef da hotay hain . be tarteeb khoon behna shoroni dabao ya dard baar baar pishaab aana aur masanay ko khaali karne mein dushwari qabz haamla honay ya muddat tak le jane mein dushwari Shaz o nadir sooraton mein, uterine fibroids bohat barray, muray hue, ya mutasir ho satke hain. yeh halaat shadeed alamaat peda kar satke hain, aur fori tibbi ilaaj ki zaroorat par sakti hai .  kuch mtalaat se pata chalta hai ke hamal 3 mein se 1 afraad mein fibroidsko thora sa bara karne ka sabab ban sakta hai. yeh kuch alamaat ko ziyada qabil tawajah bana sakta hai. hamal mein uterine fibroids ki sab se aam paicheedgi dard hai, jo aam tor par dosray aur teesray sah mahi mein mehsoos hota hai .

response: uterine fibroids is waqt hota hai jab bacha daaniuterus mein pathon ke khaliye kayi gina barh jatay hain. jaisay jaisay khaliye barhatay hain, mukhtalif ashkaal aur size ki ganthin banti hain. woh mutadid ya kam ho satke hain  kuch logon ke paas sirf aik ho sakta hai. yeh ganth bacha daaniuterus ki androoni aur bairooni sthon ke sath sath reham ki deewar ke andar bhi barh sakti hai .  tehqeeq se pata chalta hai ke hormone estrogen aur progestrone uterin fibroidski nashonuma mein kirdaar ada karte hain. shayad yahi wajah hai ke rajonooti ke baad jab un hormones ki pedawar kam ho jati hai to fibroids suker jatay hain .

response: kuch logon mein uterine fibroids peda honay ka imkaan doosron ke muqablay mein ziyada hota hai, aur haqeeqat mein fibroids jeneati tor par waarsat mein mil satke hain. is ka matlab hai ke agar kisi khandan ke kisi fard ko un mein mubtala ho to kisi ko fibroidshonay ka ziyada imkaan hota hai. africi nasal ke logon mein un ki nashonuma ka ziyada imkaan hai. agar aap ko high blood pressure ya poli stick ovary sndrom hai to aap ko uterin fibroids honay ka ziyada imkaan hai. yeh un logon mein ziyada aam hain jin ki pehli haiz se pehlay ki Umar hoti hai, aur jin logon ne bachay ko janam nahi diya hai, halaank is ki wajah yeh ho sakti hai ke fibroidswali khawateen ko haamla honay mein dushwari ho sakti hai. surkh gosht ki khapat mein ziyada ghiza ko barqarar rakhnay se uterine fibroids ka khatrah bhi barh sakta hai, jaisa ke bear ka istemaal bhi ho sakta hai .

context/3: uterine fibroids ki kuch aam alamaat yeh hain :  adwaar jo bhaari, taweel, ya takleef da hotay hain . be tarteeb khoon behna shoroni dabao ya dard baar baar pishaab aana aur masanay ko khaali karne mein dushwari qabz haamla honay ya muddat tak le jane mein dushwari Shaz o nadir sooraton mein, uterine fibroids bohat barray, muray hue, ya mutasir ho satke hain. yeh halaat shadeed alamaat peda kar satke hain, aur fori tibbi ilaaj ki zaroorat par sakti hai .  kuch mtalaat se pata chalta hai ke hamal 3 mein se 1 afraad mein fibroidsko thora sa bara karne ka sabab ban sakta hai. yeh kuch alamaat ko ziyada qabil tawajah bana sakta hai. hamal mein uterine fibroids ki sab se aam paicheedgi dard hai, jo aam tor par dosray aur teesray sah mahi mein mehsoos hota hai .
context/4: is ki alamaat kya hain .
context/5: bilkul, mein kis terhan madad kar sakta hon ?

response: jee haan! fibroids ki mukhtalif kasmain hain jo mukhtalif alamaat peda kar sakti hain. reham ki deewar ke andar sarayat shuda fibroids Intramal fibroids bacha daaniuterus ki shakal ko tabdeel kar satke hain, jo zarkhaizi mein tabdeeli ka sabab ban sakta hai. fibroids jo bacha daaniuterus ke andar phailtay hain  sab muosal fibroids bhi haamla honay ya rehne mein dushwari ka baais ban satke hain .
context: oh, to kya fibroids ki mukhtalif aqsam hain ?
context/0: kuch logon mein uterine fibroids peda honay ka imkaan doosron ke muqablay mein ziyada hota hai, aur haqeeqat mein fibroids jeneati tor par waarsat mein mil satke hain. is ka matlab hai ke agar kisi khandan ke kisi fard ko un mein mubtala ho to kisi ko fibroidshonay ka ziyada imkaan hota hai. africi nasal ke logon mein un ki nashonuma ka ziyada imkaan hai. agar aap ko high blood pressure ya poli stick ovary sndrom hai to aap ko uterin fibroids honay ka ziyada imkaan hai. yeh un logon mein ziyada aam hain jin ki pehli haiz se pehlay ki Umar hoti hai, aur jin logon ne bachay ko janam nahi diya hai, halaank is ki wajah yeh ho sakti hai ke fibroidswali khawateen ko haamla honay mein dushwari ho sakti hai. surkh gosht ki khapat mein ziyada ghiza ko barqarar rakhnay se uterine fibroids ka khatrah bhi barh sakta hai, jaisa ke bear ka istemaal bhi ho sakta hai .

response: Uterine fibroids aam tor par be zarrar hotay hain aur aksar khud hi chalay jatay hain. jab alamaat zahir hotay hain, taham, ilaaj nah kiye jane walay fibroidskisi shakhs ke mayar zindagi mein mudakhlat kar satke hain aur khoon ki kami jaisi paichidgiyan peda kar satke hain  aisi haalat jab jism mein khoon ke surkh khaliye munasib tareeqay se kaam karne ke liye kaafi nahi hotay . yeh is waqt ho sakta hai jab uterine fibroids se bohat ziyada khoon beh raha ho .  uterine fibroids haamla honay ke imkanaat mein bhi mudakhlat kar satke hain, aur isqaat hamal ke imkanaat ko barha satke hain, lekin yahan mazeed tehqeeq ki zaroorat hai. un sooraton mein, ilaaj se logon ko haamla honay aur rehne mein madad mil sakti hai .  Shaz o nadir hi, uterine fibroids bohat barray, muray hue, ya mutasir ho satke hain. yeh halaat aisi alamaat peda kar satke hain jo shadeed hain, aur un ke liye fori tibbi ilaaj ki zaroorat par sakti hai, is liye un ki jaanch karana zaroori hai .

response: sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne wala mumkina tor par aap ki alamaat, tibbi, aur mahvari ki tareekh ke baray mein sawalaat pouchye ga. kuch uterine fibroids ki tashkhees jismani imthehaan se hoti hai. deegar tshkhisi tareeqon mein aik sharooni altrasaond  sonugram , aik am are aayi ya sonuastrogram  aik altrasaond jo bacha daaniuterus ke seyalfluid se bhar jane ke baad injaam diya jata hai  shaamil ho satke hain .

response: aap aur aap ka sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne wala halki alamaat ke sath fibroids ko baghair ilaaj ke chorney ka intikhab kar sakta hai. aap ki alamaat ka suraagh laganay se aap ko yeh jannay mein madad mil sakti hai ke aaya aap ke fibroids tabdeel ho rahay hain, aur kis waqt ilaaj ka mansoobah madadgaar saabit ho sakta hai. jab fibroids masail ka shikaar ho jatay hain, to un ke intizam aur ilaaj ke liye aur mustaqbil mein un ki tashkeel ko roknay ke liye bohat se ikhtiyarat hotay hain jin mein duwaein, tarz zindagi mein tabdeelian, jarrahi nah karne ke tareeqa car aur surgery shaamil hain. barah karam mujhe bitayen ke kya aap chahtay hain ke mein un mein se kisi ki tafseel mein jaoon .
context: mein uterine fibroids ke baray mein kya kar sakti hon ?
context/0: sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne wala mumkina tor par aap ki alamaat, tibbi, aur mahvari ki tareekh ke baray mein sawalaat pouchye ga. kuch uterine fibroids ki tashkhees jismani imthehaan se hoti hai. deegar tshkhisi tareeqon mein aik sharooni altrasaond  sonugram , aik am are aayi ya sonuastrogram  aik altrasaond jo bacha daaniuterus ke seyalfluid se bhar jane ke baad injaam diya jata hai  shaamil ho satke hain .
context/1: uterine fibroids ki tashkhees kaisay ki jati hai .
context/2: Uterine fibroids aam tor par be zarrar hotay hain aur aksar khud hi chalay jatay hain. jab alamaat zahir hotay hain, taham, ilaaj nah kiye jane walay fibroidskisi shakhs ke mayar zindagi mein mudakhlat kar satke hain aur khoon ki kami jaisi paichidgiyan peda kar satke hain  aisi haalat jab jism mein khoon ke surkh khaliye munasib tareeqay se kaam karne ke liye kaafi nahi hotay . yeh is waqt ho sakta hai jab uterine fibroids se bohat ziyada khoon beh raha ho .  uterine fibroids haamla honay ke imkanaat mein bhi mudakhlat kar satke hain, aur isqaat hamal ke imkanaat ko barha satke hain, lekin yahan mazeed tehqeeq ki zaroorat hai. un sooraton mein, ilaaj se logon ko haamla honay aur rehne mein madad mil sakti hai .  Shaz o nadir hi, uterine fibroids bohat barray, muray hue, ya mutasir ho satke hain. yeh halaat aisi alamaat peda kar satke hain jo shadeed hain, aur un ke liye fori tibbi ilaaj ki zaroorat par sakti hai, is liye un ki jaanch karana zaroori hai .
context/3: aap ko uterine fibroids ke liye check karwanay ki zaroorat kyun hai ?
context/4: jee haan! fibroids ki mukhtalif kasmain hain jo mukhtalif alamaat peda kar sakti hain. reham ki deewar ke andar sarayat shuda fibroids Intramal fibroids bacha daaniuterus ki shakal ko tabdeel kar satke hain, jo zarkhaizi mein tabdeeli ka sabab ban sakta hai. fibroids jo bacha daaniuterus ke andar phailtay hain  sab muosal fibroids bhi haamla honay ya rehne mein dushwari ka baais ban satke hain .
context/5: oh, to kya fibroids ki mukhtalif aqsam hain ?

response: barah karam is baray mein mazeed bitayen ke duwaein mere reham ke fibroids mein kaisay madad kar sakti hain .
context: aap aur aap ka sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne wala halki alamaat ke sath fibroids ko baghair ilaaj ke chorney ka intikhab kar sakta hai. aap ki alamaat ka suraagh laganay se aap ko yeh jannay mein madad mil sakti hai ke aaya aap ke fibroids tabdeel ho rahay hain, aur kis waqt ilaaj ka mansoobah madadgaar saabit ho sakta hai. jab fibroids masail ka shikaar ho jatay hain, to un ke intizam aur ilaaj ke liye aur mustaqbil mein un ki tashkeel ko roknay ke liye bohat se ikhtiyarat hotay hain jin mein duwaein, tarz zindagi mein tabdeelian, jarrahi nah karne ke tareeqa car aur surgery shaamil hain. barah karam mujhe bitayen ke kya aap chahtay hain ke mein un mein se kisi ki tafseel mein jaoon .

response: baaz sooraton mein, uterine fibroids ke ilaaj ke liye hormonal adwiyaat tajweez ki jati hain. un mein Selective Progesterone Receptor Modulators  sprm  shaamil hain jo jism mein progestronee ke assar ko tabdeel karte hain, aur Gonadotropin rilizng hormone  gnrh  agonists jo jism mein progestronee aur estrogen dono ki pedawar ko roktay hain. yeh adwiyaat toleedi Umar ke logon mein waqt ke sath sath uterine fibroids ke size aur tadaad ko kam karti dikhayi deti hain. kya aap dosray hal bhi janna chahain ge ?

response: sehat mand wazan ko barqarar rakhnay se uterine fibroids ki mojoodgi ko kam karne mein madad mil sakti hai. kaafi werzish karna aur mutawazan ghiza khanay se bhi is mein madad mil sakti hai. khaas tor par, surkh gosht mein kam ghiza aur sabz sabzian ziyada khanay se kuch logon mein fibroids ke phelao aur shiddat ko kam karne mein madad mil sakti hai .

context/0: yakeeni tor par, uterine fibroids ka ilaaj baaz auqaat pait ya shuruni ke zariye kam se kam hamla aawar jarrahi ke tareeqa car se kya jata hai. fibroids ke kuch mamlaat ka ilaaj pait ke mayomaktomi ke tareeqa car se kya ja sakta hai, jis mein pareshani walay fibroids ko jarrahi se hata diya jata hai. shadeed halaton mein, histrayuktomi, ya bacha daaniuterus ko hatana, kya ja sakta hai. barah karam mujhe bitayen ke agar aap yeh janna chahtay hain ke tarz zindagi mein tabdeeli uterine fibroids ko kis terhan mutasir kar sakti hain .
context/1: haan, barah karam mujhe jarrahi ke ikhtiyarat ke baray mein bitayen
context/2: kuch allamti uterine fibroids ghair hamla aawar tareeqa car jaisay uterine artery embolization aur radiofrequency myolysis ke zariye tabah ho satke hain. yeh tareeqa car fibroids ko khoon ki farahmi kaat dete hain. am are aayi guided focused altrasaond surgery  fus  aik nai taknik ki aik misaal hai jo fibroids ko tabah karne ke liye aawaz ki lehron ka istemaal karti hai .
context/3: haan, barah karam ghair jarrahi ke tareeqa car ki tafseelaat den .
context/4: baaz sooraton mein, uterine fibroids ke ilaaj ke liye hormonal adwiyaat tajweez ki jati hain. un mein Selective Progesterone Receptor Modulators  sprm  shaamil hain jo jism mein progestronee ke assar ko tabdeel karte hain, aur Gonadotropin rilizng hormone  gnrh  agonists jo jism mein progestronee aur estrogen dono ki pedawar ko roktay hain. yeh adwiyaat toleedi Umar ke logon mein waqt ke sath sath uterine fibroids ke size aur tadaad ko kam karti dikhayi deti hain. kya aap dosray hal bhi janna chahain ge ?
context/5: barah karam is baray mein mazeed bitayen ke duwaein mere reham ke fibroids mein kaisay madad kar sakti hain .

response: nahi

response: aisay kayi mikanzm hain jin ke zariye aik ghair faaal thyroid periods ko bhaari bana sakta hai :  kaafi thyroid hormone ke baghair, aap ke beza daaniovary bahao mein kami ke hormone  ko kaafi miqdaar mein bananay ke qabil nahi ho saktay hain . kaafi thyroid hormone ke baghair, aap bohat ziyada khoon behnay se roknay ke liye jamnay walay awamil ko kaafi nahi bana satke . kaafi thyroid hormone ke baghair, aap estrogen binding protein shbg kam karte hain aur isi terhan ziyada estrogen ka saamna karna parta hai . agar aap ke sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne walay ko pata chalta hai ke aap ke paas aik ghair faaal thyroid hai, to bhaari adwaar ke liye aap ka behtareen ilaaj thyroid hormone lena ho sakta hai .

response: amenorrhea lateeni lafz hai jo mahvari ki kami ke liye hai. hypothalamic amenorrhea ka seedha matlab hai aap ke hypothalmic  aap ke dimagh ke hormone command center  ki wajah se mahvari ki kami. aisa nahi hai ke aap ke hypothalmic mein kuch bhi ghalat hai, bilkul. is ne haiz  gnrh  ke liye darkaar hormone ki pedawar band kar di hai. yeh jazbati tanao, ya kaafi nah khanay jaisi cheezon ke jawab mein ho sakta hai .

context/4: aisay kayi mikanzm hain jin ke zariye aik ghair faaal thyroid periods ko bhaari bana sakta hai :  kaafi thyroid hormone ke baghair, aap ke beza daaniovary bahao mein kami ke hormone  ko kaafi miqdaar mein bananay ke qabil nahi ho saktay hain . kaafi thyroid hormone ke baghair, aap bohat ziyada khoon behnay se roknay ke liye jamnay walay awamil ko kaafi nahi bana satke . kaafi thyroid hormone ke baghair, aap estrogen binding protein shbg kam karte hain aur isi terhan ziyada estrogen ka saamna karna parta hai . agar aap ke sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne walay ko pata chalta hai ke aap ke paas aik ghair faaal thyroid hai, to bhaari adwaar ke liye aap ka behtareen ilaaj thyroid hormone lena ho sakta hai .
context/5: ho sakta hai mujhe ghair faaal thyroid hai. kya yeh shadeed adwaar ka sabab ban sakta hai ?

response: bhaari haiz ke liye Naturopathic ilaaj kya hai ?
context: apne hypothalamus ko qaail karen ke sab theek hai aur dobarah mahvari aana theek hai. aisa karne ke liye, aap ko tanao ko kam karne aur jism mein kuch charbi haasil karne ki zaroorat par sakti hai. jari bootion ki dawai ashwagandha Withania somnifera jism ke tanao ke radeamal ko munazzam karne mein madad karti hai, aur isi terhan hypothalamic amenorrhea ke liye madadgaar saabit ho sakti hai .
context/0: FHA  functional Hypothalamic Amenorrhea  ke qudrati ilaaj kya hain
context/1: amenorrhea lateeni lafz hai jo mahvari ki kami ke liye hai. hypothalamic amenorrhea ka seedha matlab hai aap ke hypothalmic  aap ke dimagh ke hormone command center  ki wajah se mahvari ki kami. aisa nahi hai ke aap ke hypothalmic mein kuch bhi ghalat hai, bilkul. is ne haiz  gnrh  ke liye darkaar hormone ki pedawar band kar di hai. yeh jazbati tanao, ya kaafi nah khanay jaisi cheezon ke jawab mein ho sakta hai .

response: aap sehat mand anton ke bacteria ko barqarar rakh kar estrogen ke aam sm rubai ko farogh day satke hain. bacteria sabzion, pribiotics aur anti biotics ke ghair zaroori istemaal se bachney se faida uthatay hain. estrogen ko kam karne ka aik aur tareeqa yeh hai ke broccoli se akhaz kardah phytonutrient liya jaye jisay dim  diindolylmethane  kehte hain .

response: haan yeh karta hai! tanao jism mein aik hormonal rastay ko chaalo karta hai jisay hypothalamicpituitaryadrenal hpa  mehwar kehte hain. hpa mehwar ko chaalo karna coretesol aur corticrotopin jari karne walay hormone  crh  ki barhti hui satah se wabasta hai. hpa mehwar, coretesol, aur crh jism mein tanao ke radeamal ko control karne mein madad karte hain. crh aur coretesol ka ikhraj toleedi hormones ki aam satah ko daba sakta hai, jo mumkina tor par ghair mamooli beza daaniovary, ovulation  yani beza nah honay , ya amenorrhea  yani mahvari ki Adam mojoodgi  ka baais bantaa hai. mazeed baraan, toleedi bafton mein crh ki ghair mamooli satah ko hamal ke manfi nataij se munsalik kya gaya hai, jaisay qabal az waqt paidaiesh

response: is baat ka imkaan hai ke rozana ki zindagi ka tanao aap ke cycle ki lambai ko mutasir karta hai. khawateen narson mein tanao ke aik mutalay mein ziyada tanao aur lambay chakkar dono ke darmiyan wabastagi payi gayi, halaank yeh nataij aik hissa mein ghoomnay wali shift work  kaam ki raton  ki wajah se ho satke hain, jo narson ke liye aam hai. is ke bar aks, ziyada tanao wali mulaazmaten bhi chhootey chakron se wabasta hain. tanao ki numayesh ki satah aur lambai mein farq logon ke jismon ko mukhtalif tareeqon se jawab dainay ka sabab ban sakta hai. misaal ke tor par, aik tehqeeq mein, ziyada tanao walay afraad mein perimenopause  rajonoortimenopause ke qareeb  aik saal ke baad kam tanao walay logon ke muqablay mein cycle tabdeel karne ka ziyada imkaan nahi tha. taham, ziyada tanao do saal ke baad chhootey mahvari se munsalik tha, jis se zahir hota hai ke alamaat fori tor par zahir nahi ho sakteen .

context/0: haan yeh karta hai! tanao jism mein aik hormonal rastay ko chaalo karta hai jisay hypothalamicpituitaryadrenal hpa  mehwar kehte hain. hpa mehwar ko chaalo karna coretesol aur corticrotopin jari karne walay hormone  crh  ki barhti hui satah se wabasta hai. hpa mehwar, coretesol, aur crh jism mein tanao ke radeamal ko control karne mein madad karte hain. crh aur coretesol ka ikhraj toleedi hormones ki aam satah ko daba sakta hai, jo mumkina tor par ghair mamooli beza daaniovary, ovulation  yani beza nah honay , ya amenorrhea  yani mahvari ki Adam mojoodgi  ka baais bantaa hai. mazeed baraan, toleedi bafton mein crh ki ghair mamooli satah ko hamal ke manfi nataij se munsalik kya gaya hai, jaisay qabal az waqt paidaiesh

context/2: bilkul nahi, dar haqeeqat, aap ka jism kya guzar raha hai is se khud aagah rehna acha hai. kya aap ke paas mere liye mazeed sawalaat hain ?
context/3: kya mein aap ko pareshan kar rahi hon ?
context/4: haan wahan hain! pms magnesium ko bohat acha jawab deta hai. kuch logon mein, mignishim ki kami darasal pms ki bunyadi wajah ho sakti hai. pi am s jari bootion ki dawai  white eggs kasts ko bhi acha jawab deta hai .
context/5: kya pms ke liye koi qudrati ilaaj hain ?

response: meri zindagi bohat dabao wali hai. kya yeh mere mahvari ke dard ko mutasir karta hai ?
context: is baat ka imkaan hai ke rozana ki zindagi ka tanao aap ke cycle ki lambai ko mutasir karta hai. khawateen narson mein tanao ke aik mutalay mein ziyada tanao aur lambay chakkar dono ke darmiyan wabastagi payi gayi, halaank yeh nataij aik hissa mein ghoomnay wali shift work  kaam ki raton  ki wajah se ho satke hain, jo narson ke liye aam hai. is ke bar aks, ziyada tanao wali mulaazmaten bhi chhootey chakron se wabasta hain. tanao ki numayesh ki satah aur lambai mein farq logon ke jismon ko mukhtalif tareeqon se jawab dainay ka sabab ban sakta hai. misaal ke tor par, aik tehqeeq mein, ziyada tanao walay afraad mein perimenopause  rajonoortimenopause ke qareeb  aik saal ke baad kam tanao walay logon ke muqablay mein cycle tabdeel karne ka ziyada imkaan nahi tha. taham, ziyada tanao do saal ke baad chhootey mahvari se munsalik tha, jis se zahir hota hai ke alamaat fori tor par zahir nahi ho sakteen .
context/0: kya meri roz marrah ki zindagi ke tanao is baat par assar andaaz ho satke hain ke mujhe apni mahvari kitni der tak aati hai ?
context/1: haan yeh karta hai! tanao jism mein aik hormonal rastay ko chaalo karta hai jisay hypothalamicpituitaryadrenal hpa  mehwar kehte hain. hpa mehwar ko chaalo karna coretesol aur corticrotopin jari karne walay hormone  crh  ki barhti hui satah se wabasta hai. hpa mehwar, coretesol, aur crh jism mein tanao ke radeamal ko control karne mein madad karte hain. crh aur coretesol ka ikhraj toleedi hormones ki aam satah ko daba sakta hai, jo mumkina tor par ghair mamooli beza daaniovary, ovulation  yani beza nah honay , ya amenorrhea  yani mahvari ki Adam mojoodgi  ka baais bantaa hai. mazeed baraan, toleedi bafton mein crh ki ghair mamooli satah ko hamal ke manfi nataij se munsalik kya gaya hai, jaisay qabal az waqt paidaiesh
context/2: jee haan. kya tanao is mein kirdaar ada karta hai ke mera toleedi nizaamreproductive system hayatiati tor par kaisay kaam karta hai ?
context/3: bilkul nahi, dar haqeeqat, aap ka jism kya guzar raha hai is se khud aagah rehna acha hai. kya aap ke paas mere liye mazeed sawalaat hain ?
context/4: kya mein aap ko pareshan kar rahi hon ?
context/5: haan wahan hain! pms magnesium ko bohat acha jawab deta hai. kuch logon mein, mignishim ki kami darasal pms ki bunyadi wajah ho sakti hai. pi am s jari bootion ki dawai  white eggs kasts ko bhi acha jawab deta hai .

response: mukhtasir mein, haan! takleef da mahvari ko aisi mlazmton mein kaam karne se jora gaya hai jo kam control hain, ghair mehfooz hain aur saathi karkun ki kam himayat haasil hai. pichlle mahinay ka tanao bhi dysmenorrhea ki tadad ko mutasir kar sakta hai, is liye ho sakta hai ke kisi ko tanao ke nateejay mein takleef da mahvari ka saamna nah ho jab tak ke is ki muddat aglay mahinay tak nah ho. isi terhan, jo log apne chakkar mein pehlay tanao ka saamna karte thay un mein haiz se pehlay aur is ke douran shadeed alamaat ki ittila dainay ka imkaan ziyada hota tha .

response: 1. jaan len ke yeh theek hai  yeh ziyada tar logon ke sath sunhwa hai jinhein mahvari aati hai . 2. woh samaan haasil karen jin ke istemaal mein aap ko aaraam mehsoos ho. school aam tor par apni mahvari ki masnoaat ko do jaghon par rakhtay hain : larkiyon ke baath room aur nurse ke daftar . agar aap class mein hain to maffi mangeen. haiz anay walay dost se poucheen ke kya un ke paas koi izafi pad  hai jisay aap udhaar le satke hain. agar woh aisa nahi karte hain, sirf is soorat mein kuch choti tabdeeli len jab aap ko samaan kharidne ke liye vending machine istemaal karne ki zaroorat ho. agar aap ka ustaad puchta hai ke kya ho raha hai aur aap doosron ke samnay apni muddat ke baray mein baat karne mein aaraam mehsoos nahi karte hain, to" pait ke masail" aik achi baat hai .

response: aap ki agli haiz anay se pehlay, aap jo bhi jama karne ke tareeqay istemaal karte hain un ka zakheera karen aur is baat ko yakeeni banayen ke aap ke paas har aik bag aur purse mein kuch spear pad hain jo aap aksar apne sath le jatay hain. agar aap apne khoon ke bahao ko munazzam karne ke liye nan dspoz able jaisay period panties, ya dhoney ke qabil cotton pad istemaal karte hain, to yaad rakhen ke dobarah qabil istemaal bag ya container bhi sath layein jo aap istemaal shuda cheezon ko apne sath rakh satke hain agar aap ko din ke waqt inhen tabdeel karna parre. apne din ke time ke intikhab ko barbaad karne ke khilaaf aik izafi ahthyat yeh hai ke underwear ka aik izafi jora bhi apne bag mein chhupa kar rakhen .

context/1: 1. jaan len ke yeh theek hai  yeh ziyada tar logon ke sath sunhwa hai jinhein mahvari aati hai . 2. woh samaan haasil karen jin ke istemaal mein aap ko aaraam mehsoos ho. school aam tor par apni mahvari ki masnoaat ko do jaghon par rakhtay hain : larkiyon ke baath room aur nurse ke daftar . agar aap class mein hain to maffi mangeen. haiz anay walay dost se poucheen ke kya un ke paas koi izafi pad  hai jisay aap udhaar le satke hain. agar woh aisa nahi karte hain, sirf is soorat mein kuch choti tabdeeli len jab aap ko samaan kharidne ke liye vending machine istemaal karne ki zaroorat ho. agar aap ka ustaad puchta hai ke kya ho raha hai aur aap doosron ke samnay apni muddat ke baray mein baat karne mein aaraam mehsoos nahi karte hain, to" pait ke masail" aik achi baat hai .
context/2: agar mujhe school mein mahvari aati hai to kya karoon ?
context/3: mukhtasir mein, haan! takleef da mahvari ko aisi mlazmton mein kaam karne se jora gaya hai jo kam control hain, ghair mehfooz hain aur saathi karkun ki kam himayat haasil hai. pichlle mahinay ka tanao bhi dysmenorrhea ki tadad ko mutasir kar sakta hai, is liye ho sakta hai ke kisi ko tanao ke nateejay mein takleef da mahvari ka saamna nah ho jab tak ke is ki muddat aglay mahinay tak nah ho. isi terhan, jo log apne chakkar mein pehlay tanao ka saamna karte thay un mein haiz se pehlay aur is ke douran shadeed alamaat ki ittila dainay ka imkaan ziyada hota tha .
context/4: meri zindagi bohat dabao wali hai. kya yeh mere mahvari ke dard ko mutasir karta hai ?
context/5: is baat ka imkaan hai ke rozana ki zindagi ka tanao aap ke cycle ki lambai ko mutasir karta hai. khawateen narson mein tanao ke aik mutalay mein ziyada tanao aur lambay chakkar dono ke darmiyan wabastagi payi gayi, halaank yeh nataij aik hissa mein ghoomnay wali shift work  kaam ki raton  ki wajah se ho satke hain, jo narson ke liye aam hai. is ke bar aks, ziyada tanao wali mulaazmaten bhi chhootey chakron se wabasta hain. tanao ki numayesh ki satah aur lambai mein farq logon ke jismon ko mukhtalif tareeqon se jawab dainay ka sabab ban sakta hai. misaal ke tor par, aik tehqeeq mein, ziyada tanao walay afraad mein perimenopause  rajonoortimenopause ke qareeb  aik saal ke baad kam tanao walay logon ke muqablay mein cycle tabdeel karne ka ziyada imkaan nahi tha. taham, ziyada tanao do saal ke baad chhootey mahvari se munsalik tha, jis se zahir hota hai ke alamaat fori tor par zahir nahi ho sakteen .

response: un doston aur hum jamaat ke sath meharban aur madadgaar banin jo isi terhan ki pareshani mein khatam hotay hain. aik pad paish karen aur apne doston ke group mein mahvari aur sehat ko mamool par laane mein madad karen .  agar aap kisi aur ki patlon ya skirt par khoon dekhte hain, to inhen sorat e haal ke baray mein ahthyat se bitayen. agar yeh un ki pehli mahvari hai, to inhen nurse ya baath room le jayen aur zaroorat parney par inhen kuch muddat ka samaan udhaar den. aap is mein aik sath hain, lehaza aik dosray ka khayaal rakhen !

response: agar aap ko apne kapron par mahvari ke daagh nazar atay hain, to jitni jaldi ho sakay inhen thanday pani aur sabun se pehlay se dho len. khoon aik sakht madahfluid hai jo bohat se textile ko khushk karne ke baad saaf karta hai, is liye fori karwai aap ko daagh ko mukammal tor par khatam karne ke behtar imkanaat faraham karti hai. taham, agar libaas par daagh rehta hai, to is ke baray mein ziyada fikar nah karen. bohat se logon ke paas jung mein pehnay hue" period panties" ke chand jore hotay hain. un zair jaamon par kharij honay walay halkay dhabbon ya khoon ke gehray dhabbay ho satke hain jo abhi khatam nahi ho rahay hain, lekin yeh aaraam da hain aur bohat ziyada bahao walay dinon ya dinon ke liye behtareen intikhab hain jab aap tawaqqa karte hain ke aap ki mahvari shuru ho sakti hai .

response: jama karne ke bohat saaray tareeqay hain jo aap istemaal kar satke hain. aap ko pad aur kapron ka saamna karne ka ziyada imkaan hai. pad istemaal karne mein sab se aasaan hain aur aksar school narson ke dafatir mein dastyab hotay hain  aap ko bas apne zair jama par chipaknay wali side ke sath aik jagah rakhna hai aur aap jane ke liye tayyar hain. taimiyon bhi kasrat se dastyab hain. taimiyon ke sath seekhnay ka thora sa munhani khutoot hai, kyunkay inhen aap ki andaam nihanivagina mein daakhil karne ki zaroorat hai. lekin bohat se log inhen tarjeeh dete hain, lehaza agar aap aaraam da mehsoos karte hain, to aap inhen shot day satke hain. qata nazar is ke ke aap kis qisam ke period numeral ke sath jane ka faisla karte hain, aik dost, school ki nurse, ya aap ke walidain yeh zahir karne ke qabil hon ge ke usay sahih tareeqay se kaisay istemaal kya jaye .

response: andaam nihanivagina vulva aur garewa ke darmiyan aik tube hai. yeh tube aap ke reham aur bairooni duniya ke darmiyan conection hai. andaam nihanivagina woh hai jis se bachay paidaiesh ke douran bahar nikaltay hain, aur aap ki mahvari ke douran jis se khoon nikalta hai. andaam nihanivagina ko daakhil karne ke liye bhi istemaal kya jata hai, jaisay ke uzoo tanasul, unglio, khawateen ke kndom, jinsi khilonay, mahvari ke cupp ke sath .  andaam nihanivagina jism ke dosray hisson ke rastay ke tor par bhi kaam kar sakti hai. uzoo tanasil andam Nihani ke jinsi taluqaat ke douran, inzaalejaculate andaam nihanivagina mein jama hota hai, jis se nutfa garewa ke zariye bacha daaniuterus mein daakhil hota hai. andaam nihanivagina ki dewaron ko dawaiyon aur Maney hamal adwiyaat ke liye intizami rastay ke tor par bhi istemaal kya ja sakta hai, jaisay inter vaginal hormone kareem, hormonal andaam nihanivagina Maney hamal ki angothi, ya andaam nihanivagina  adwiyaat .

response: haan yeh karta hai. andaam nihanivagina 1 shakhs ki poori zindagi mein bohat kuch badal sakti hai. aik ost baaligh andaam nihanivagina qadray Khamida hoti hai, lekin har jism mukhtalif hota hai, aur bohat choti ya bohat barri andaam nihanivagina jaisi koi cheez nahi hai .  andaam nihanivagina poooray jism mein hormonal tabdeelion se sakht mutasir hoti hai. mahvari  pehli mahvari  ke baad aur rajonoortimenopause se pehlay toleedi saloon ke douran, jism mein astrogen ki aala sthon se muharrak honay ki wajah se, andaam nihanivagina ke andar tissue ki mazeed tahein mojood hoti hain .  rajonoortimenopause ke baad, jab astrogen kam hota hai, to andaam nihanivagina ki diivaaren patli aur kamzor hojati hain, jo andaam nihanivagina ki khushki aur andaam nihanivagina ki ratobanton mein kami ki alamaat ka sabab ban sakti hain. is ke nateejay mein jinsi taluqaat ke douran takleef ho sakti hai aur andaam nihanivagina mein jalan ya infection ke imkanaat barh satke hain .

context/0: andaam nihanivagina vulva aur garewa ke darmiyan aik tube hai. yeh tube aap ke reham aur bairooni duniya ke darmiyan conection hai. andaam nihanivagina woh hai jis se bachay paidaiesh ke douran bahar nikaltay hain, aur aap ki mahvari ke douran jis se khoon nikalta hai. andaam nihanivagina ko daakhil karne ke liye bhi istemaal kya jata hai, jaisay ke uzoo tanasul, unglio, khawateen ke kndom, jinsi khilonay, mahvari ke cupp ke sath .  andaam nihanivagina jism ke dosray hisson ke rastay ke tor par bhi kaam kar sakti hai. uzoo tanasil andam Nihani ke jinsi taluqaat ke douran, inzaalejaculate andaam nihanivagina mein jama hota hai, jis se nutfa garewa ke zariye bacha daaniuterus mein daakhil hota hai. andaam nihanivagina ki dewaron ko dawaiyon aur Maney hamal adwiyaat ke liye intizami rastay ke tor par bhi istemaal kya ja sakta hai, jaisay inter vaginal hormone kareem, hormonal andaam nihanivagina Maney hamal ki angothi, ya andaam nihanivagina  adwiyaat .
context/1: andaam nihanivagina kya hai ?
context/2: yeh aik acha sawal hai, bohat se log nahi jantay ke vulva aur andaam nihanivagina do mukhtalif hissay hain. walvo aap ke jinsi aaza ka woh hissa hai jo aap ke jism ke bahar hota hai  aap ka lbya, andaam nihanivagina ka khilna, aur pishaab ki naali ka khilna  jis sorakh se aap pishaab karte hain . jab ke andaam nihanivagina volva ka sirf aik hissa hain, bohat se log" andaam nihanivagina " kehte hain jab un ka matlab waqai volva hota hai. lekin wa;vo sirf andaam nihanivagina ke muqablay mein bohat ziyada chal raha hai .

context/2: haan yeh ho ga! hamal ke douran hormone ki satah mein tabdeeli se andaam nihanivagina bhi mutasir hoti hai. khoon ke bahao mein izafah sahrooni ki taraf jata hai, jis ki wajah se volva aur andaam nihanivagina ka rang gehra hota hai. hamal ke douran, andaam nihanivagina ki dewaron ke marboot tissue aahista aahista aaraam karte hain, bachay ki paidaiesh ki tayari mein. dilyori ke baad, andaam nihanivagina aur andaam nihanivagina ka khilna earzi tor par chaura ho jata hai, lekin dilyori ke 612 haftay baad, andaam nihanivagina apne hamal se pehlay ke size mein wapas ajati hai. jaisay jaisay logon ki Umar barhti jati hai, andaam nihanivagina ki diivaaren ziyada aaraam da hoti jati hain, aur andaam nihanivagina ka qutar wasee hota jata hai .
context/3: kya yeh hamal ke douran bhi badal jaye ga ?
context/4: haan yeh karta hai. andaam nihanivagina 1 shakhs ki poori zindagi mein bohat kuch badal sakti hai. aik ost baaligh andaam nihanivagina qadray Khamida hoti hai, lekin har jism mukhtalif hota hai, aur bohat choti ya bohat barri andaam nihanivagina jaisi koi cheez nahi hai .  andaam nihanivagina poooray jism mein hormonal tabdeelion se sakht mutasir hoti hai. mahvari  pehli mahvari  ke baad aur rajonoortimenopause se pehlay toleedi saloon ke douran, jism mein astrogen ki aala sthon se muharrak honay ki wajah se, andaam nihanivagina ke andar tissue ki mazeed tahein mojood hoti hain .  rajonoortimenopause ke baad, jab astrogen kam hota hai, to andaam nihanivagina ki diivaaren patli aur kamzor hojati hain, jo andaam nihanivagina ki khushki aur andaam nihanivagina ki ratobanton mein kami ki alamaat ka sabab ban sakti hain. is ke nateejay mein jinsi taluqaat ke douran takleef ho sakti hai aur andaam nihanivagina mein jalan ya infection ke imkanaat barh satke hain .
context/5: kya meri andaam nihanivagina Umar ke sath badalti hai ?

response: mein janna chahti hon ke jinsi taluqaat ke douran meri andaam nihanivagina  private part  kaisay badalti hai .
context: mahvari ke hormonal utaar charhao ke jawab mein andaam nihanivagina mein bhi tabdeeli aati hai. wast cycle ke ird gird, jab astrogrn sab se ziyada hota hai, andaam nihanivagina ke tissue gaarha aur bhara ho jata hai .  garewa, andaam nihanivagina ke oopri hissay mein, poooray chakkar mein harkat karta hai aur shakal badalta hai. zarkhaiz khirki se pehlay aur baad mein, garewa kam hai aur aik mazboot saakht ke sath, andaam nihanivagina mein mehsoos kya ja sakta hai, aur garewa ke beech mein sorakh band hai. zarkhaiz khirki ke douran, garewa ka sorakh bacha daaniuterus mein supreme ke dakhlay ko aasaan bananay ke liye khilta hai, garewa andaam nihanivagina mein oopar uthta hai, aur chone par naram hota hai .

response: andaam nihanivagina ziyada taizi se tabdeelion se guzar sakti hai, jaisay ke jinsi sargarmi ke douran. jab andaam nihanivagina ke sath 1 shakhs jinsi tor par bedaar hota hai to, khoon ke bahao mein izafah jinsi aaza ki taraf hota hai, jis ki wajah se andaam nihanivagina ke tissue khoon se bhar jatay hain, aur izafi phislan peda hoti hai. is seyalfluid ke arosal fluid kehte hain .  jinsi josh ke douran, andaam nihanivagina shakal mein lamba aur chaura ho kar phelti hai. yeh shakal mein tabdeeli is waqt hoti hai jab bacha daaniuterus aur garewa shoroni mein ounchay kheinchain jatay hain, jo ziyada jagah peda karta hai aur garewa ko andaam nihanivagina mein kharij honay walay kisi bhi money se daur le jata hai. is se money ko khawateen ke sayalo ke sath ghul mil jane ka waqt milta hai, jis se nutfa ko anday ki khad daalnay ke liye zaroori jismani tabdeelion se guzarnay ki tehreek millti hai .

response: agar aap apni andaam nihanivagina ko dhona chahtay hain, to aap ko usay garam pani se dhona chahiye. agar aap chahain to, aap halkay sabun ka istemaal kar satke hain jo jald ko kharish nahi kere ga  lekin yeh zaroori nahi hai. apne honton ko allag allag karen aur tahoon ke ird gird aahista se saaf karen, saaf wash clothe ya apne hathon se. apni andaam nihanivagina ke andar pani ya sabun haasil karne se guraiz karen .  apne vulva ko dhoney ke ilawa, yeh aik acha khayaal hai ke aap har roz maqad aur apne vulva aur maqad ke darmiyan walay hissay ko dho len." samnay se peechay" dhona behtar hai  dosray lafzon mein, pehlay apne volva ko aur phir apne maqad ko dhuain. doosri soorat mein, maqad se bacteria aap ki andaam nihanivagina mein phail satke hain, jo infection ka sabab ban satke hain .

response: nahi, agar aap apni goli musalsal aur sahih tareeqay se letay hain, to aap ko bezaovulate nahi hona chahiye. yeh goli hamal ko roknay ka bunyadi tareeqa hai. aik mamool ke chakkar mein, jism ke qudrati toleedireproductive hormones oopar neechay hotay hain, aap ke jism ko aik anday ko rihayi ke liye tayyar karne, is anday ko jari karne, aur aap ke bacha daaniuterus ko mumkina tor par fertilizers anday ko qubool karne ke liye tayyar karte hain .  Maney hamal goli contraceptive pillmein mojood hormones aap ke beza daaniovary ko anday tayyar karne aur chorney se roktay hain. woh mamool ke hormonal" sayiklng" ko roktay hain, Bashmole beza, endomentrium ki anam nashonuma, aur qudrati muddat, yani aap ko misali tor par beza nahi hona chahiye aur agar sahih tareeqay se liya jaye to aap haamla nahi ho satke .
