context/4: mahvari ke hormonal utaar charhao ke jawab mein andaam nihanivagina mein bhi tabdeeli aati hai. wast cycle ke ird gird, jab astrogrn sab se ziyada hota hai, andaam nihanivagina ke tissue gaarha aur bhara ho jata hai .  garewa, andaam nihanivagina ke oopri hissay mein, poooray chakkar mein harkat karta hai aur shakal badalta hai. zarkhaiz khirki se pehlay aur baad mein, garewa kam hai aur aik mazboot saakht ke sath, andaam nihanivagina mein mehsoos kya ja sakta hai, aur garewa ke beech mein sorakh band hai. zarkhaiz khirki ke douran, garewa ka sorakh bacha daaniuterus mein supreme ke dakhlay ko aasaan bananay ke liye khilta hai, garewa andaam nihanivagina mein oopar uthta hai, aur chone par naram hota hai .
context/5: mahvari ke douran, meri andaam nihanivagina kaisay badalti hai ?

response: Maney hamal goli contraceptive pillpar mera khoon mukhtalif kyun hai ?
context: nahi, agar aap apni goli musalsal aur sahih tareeqay se letay hain, to aap ko bezaovulate nahi hona chahiye. yeh goli hamal ko roknay ka bunyadi tareeqa hai. aik mamool ke chakkar mein, jism ke qudrati toleedireproductive hormones oopar neechay hotay hain, aap ke jism ko aik anday ko rihayi ke liye tayyar karne, is anday ko jari karne, aur aap ke bacha daaniuterus ko mumkina tor par fertilizers anday ko qubool karne ke liye tayyar karte hain .  Maney hamal goli contraceptive pillmein mojood hormones aap ke beza daaniovary ko anday tayyar karne aur chorney se roktay hain. woh mamool ke hormonal" sayiklng" ko roktay hain, Bashmole beza, endomentrium ki anam nashonuma, aur qudrati muddat, yani aap ko misali tor par beza nahi hona chahiye aur agar sahih tareeqay se liya jaye to aap haamla nahi ho satke .
context/0: kya mein contraceptive ki goli par bezaovulate karti hon ?
context/1: agar aap apni andaam nihanivagina ko dhona chahtay hain, to aap ko usay garam pani se dhona chahiye. agar aap chahain to, aap halkay sabun ka istemaal kar satke hain jo jald ko kharish nahi kere ga  lekin yeh zaroori nahi hai. apne honton ko allag allag karen aur tahoon ke ird gird aahista se saaf karen, saaf wash clothe ya apne hathon se. apni andaam nihanivagina ke andar pani ya sabun haasil karne se guraiz karen .  apne vulva ko dhoney ke ilawa, yeh aik acha khayaal hai ke aap har roz maqad aur apne vulva aur maqad ke darmiyan walay hissay ko dho len." samnay se peechay" dhona behtar hai  dosray lafzon mein, pehlay apne volva ko aur phir apne maqad ko dhuain. doosri soorat mein, maqad se bacteria aap ki andaam nihanivagina mein phail satke hain, jo infection ka sabab ban satke hain .
context/2: apni andaam nihanivagina ko kaisay saaf karoon ?
context/3: andaam nihanivagina ziyada taizi se tabdeelion se guzar sakti hai, jaisay ke jinsi sargarmi ke douran. jab andaam nihanivagina ke sath 1 shakhs jinsi tor par bedaar hota hai to, khoon ke bahao mein izafah jinsi aaza ki taraf hota hai, jis ki wajah se andaam nihanivagina ke tissue khoon se bhar jatay hain, aur izafi phislan peda hoti hai. is seyalfluid ke arosal fluid kehte hain .  jinsi josh ke douran, andaam nihanivagina shakal mein lamba aur chaura ho kar phelti hai. yeh shakal mein tabdeeli is waqt hoti hai jab bacha daaniuterus aur garewa shoroni mein ounchay kheinchain jatay hain, jo ziyada jagah peda karta hai aur garewa ko andaam nihanivagina mein kharij honay walay kisi bhi money se daur le jata hai. is se money ko khawateen ke sayalo ke sath ghul mil jane ka waqt milta hai, jis se nutfa ko anday ki khad daalnay ke liye zaroori jismani tabdeelion se guzarnay ki tehreek millti hai .

response: Maney hamal goli contraceptive pillaap ke bacha daaniuterus  aap ke endomentrium  ki asterlining ko mouti honay se rokti hai, jaisa ke yeh aik aam mahvari mein hota hai. yeh ovulation aur toleedi hormones ki aam sayiklng ko bhi rokta hai. jab aap ko wapsi ka khoon beh raha hai to, khoon behna aam mahvari ke khoon se halka hota hai. response: haan, yeh mumkin hai. agar aap ki mahvari thori der mein aik baar jaldi aati hai, to yeh mumkina tor par mamool ki baat hai aur tashweesh ka baais nahi hai. aap ke tarz zindagi mein tabdeeli, shadeed jismani werzish, bemari, ya tanao ki wajah se mahvari jald shuru ho sakti hai. taham, baaz auqaat yeh baghair kisi wajah ke hota hai, aur yeh ab bhi zaroori nahi ke ghair mamooli ho. lehaza, agar aap ko aik hafta qabal mahvari aati hai, to pareshan honay ki koshish nah karen. agar aap ki mahvari mustaqil tor par be qaida rehti hai, to aap apne sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne walay ko bta satke hain ke woh kisi bhi pareshani ko mustard karen .

Maney hamal goli contraceptive pillaap ke bacha daaniuterus  aap ke enfomentrium  ki asterlining ko mouti honay se rokti hai, jaisa ke yeh aik aam mahvari mein hota hai. yeh ovulation aur toleedi hormones ki aam sayiklng ko bhi rokta hai. jab aap ko wapsi ka khoon beh raha hai to, khoon behna aam mahvari ke khoon se halka hota hai .
context/4: Maney hamal goli contraceptive pillpar mera khoon mukhtalif kyun hai ?
context/5: nahi, agar aap apni goli musalsal aur sahih tareeqay se letay hain, to aap ko bezaovulate nahi hona chahiye. yeh goli hamal ko roknay ka bunyadi tareeqa hai. aik mamool ke chakkar mein, jism ke qudrati toleedireproductive hormones oopar neechay hotay hain, aap ke jism ko aik anday ko rihayi ke liye tayyar karne, is anday ko jari karne, aur aap ke bacha daaniuterus ko mumkina tor par fertilizers anday ko qubool karne ke liye tayyar karte hain .  Maney hamal goli contraceptive pillmein mojood hormones aap ke beza daaniovary ko anday tayyar karne aur chorney se roktay hain. woh mamool ke hormonal" sayiklng" ko roktay hain, Bashmole beza, endomentrium ki anam nashonuma, aur qudrati muddat, yani aap ko misali tor par beza nahi hona chahiye aur agar sahih tareeqay se liya jaye to aap haamla nahi ho satke .

response: aap ki mahvari jald shuru honay ki kuch mumkina wajohaat :  hormonal Adam tawazun tibbi ahwaalmedical conditions kuch duwaein lena perimenopause ziyada werzish karna naaqis ghizaiyat tanao wazan mein achanak izafah ya kami aap ka pedaishi control ka tareeqa aap ke cycle ko bhi mutasir kar sakta hai. hungami Maney hamal goli contraceptive pillibtidayi mahvari ka sabab ban sakti hai. agar aap chand mushtarqa Maney hamalcontraceptive golion ko chore dete hain, to aap ke hormone ki satah kam ho sakti hai, aur khoon behna shuru ho sakta hai is ke muqarara waqt se pehlay .
context: mujhe mahvari jaldi kyun aati hai ?
context/0: haan, yeh mumkin hai. agar aap ki mahvari thori der mein aik baar jaldi aati hai, to yeh mumkina tor par mamool ki baat hai aur tashweesh ka baais nahi hai. aap ke tarz zindagi mein tabdeeli, shadeed jismani werzish, bemari, ya tanao ki wajah se mahvari jald shuru ho sakti hai. taham, baaz auqaat yeh baghair kisi wajah ke hota hai, aur yeh ab bhi zaroori nahi ke ghair mamooli ho. lehaza, agar aap ko aik hafta qabal mahvari aati hai, to pareshan honay ki koshish nah karen. agar aap ki mahvari mustaqil tor par be qaida rehti hai, to aap apne sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne walay ko bta satke hain ke woh kisi bhi pareshani ko mustard karen .

response: aap ki poori periods ke douran, aap ko taqreeban 23 chamach  3545 mili letter  khoon bahe ga. is mein reham ki parat shaamil hai, jo jald ke khaliyaat, khoon ki nalion aur ghudood se mlitay jaltay khalion se bani hoti hai. har daur munfarid hota hai aur har aik frikoynsi, bhaari pan, rang aur saakht mein mukhtalif hota hai. haiz ke sab se bhaari dinon mein jamnay ya clips kuch logon ke liye aam ho satke hain. dorania mein khoon ke lothray clips ya khoon ke tukron ki terhan zahir ho satke hain, ya jelly jaisi mustaqil mizaji aur size aur tadaad mein mukhtalif ho satke hain .
context: bohat se logon ko period clots hotay hain, kya yeh normal hai ?

response: rajonoortimenopause is waqt hoti hai jab kisi ki mahvari khatam ho jati hai, aur hamal ab mumkin nahi rehta. rajonoortimenopause ka lafz yonani zabaan ke lafz mean se hai, jis ka matlab hai" maheena" aur pausis ka matlab hai tawaquf ya taattul .  rajonoortimenopause aik anokha tajurbah hai  kya aap jantay hain ke insaan kurrah arz par sirf 4 parchaiyon mein se 1 hai jo is ka tajurbah karte hain. yeh bohat saari nai tabdeelian laa sakta hai, aur kuch logon ke liye yeh bilkul bhi tabdeeli ki terhan mehsoos nahi kar sakta .  rajonoortimenopause zindagi ka aik aam marhala hai, lekin usay surgery, manshiat ke ilaaj, ya dawaiyon se bhi mutasir kya ja sakta hai. yeh takneeki tor par aap ke aakhri mahvari ke baad shuru hota hai, lekin aap ka sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne wala aap ko 12 mah ke baad baghair kisi mahvari ke rajonoortimenopause tak pounchanay par ghhor kere ga .

response: perimenopause jism ki rajonoortimenopause mein muntaqili hai  tafrehi haqeeqat : peeri yonani lafz" aas paas" se aaya hai . ho sakta hai ke aap ne is istilaah ko pehlay nah suna ho, kyunkay log aksar perimenopause  transistion period  ko rajonooti  aap ki aakhri muddat ke baad ka waqt  ke sath uljhaate hain. lekin andaza lagayen kya? woh darasal 2 mukhtalif marahil hain !  perimenopause chand mahino tak mukhtasir ya 8 saal tak jari reh sakta hai. ausatan, yeh taqreeban 45 saal tak rehta hai. perimenopause ke douran, hormone ki satah mein utaar charhao aata hai aur phir kami waqay hoti hai, jis se naye ehsasat, alamaat aur tabdeelian janam layte hain.perimenopause ke yeh tajarbaat logon aur sqafton mein wasee pemanay par mukhtalif hotay hain, aap ke waalid sahib ko mukhtalif wajohaat ki bana par mukhtalif tajarbaat hue hon ge .

context/3: aap ki poori periods ke douran, aap ko taqreeban 23 chamach  3545 mili letter  khoon bahe ga. is mein reham ki parat shaamil hai, jo jald ke khaliyaat, khoon ki nalion aur ghudood se mlitay jaltay khalion se bani hoti hai. har daur munfarid hota hai aur har aik frikoynsi, bhaari pan, rang aur saakht mein mukhtalif hota hai. haiz ke sab se bhaari dinon mein jamnay ya clips kuch logon ke liye aam ho satke hain. dorania mein khoon ke lothray clips ya khoon ke tukron ki terhan zahir ho satke hain, ya jelly jaisi mustaqil mizaji aur size aur tadaad mein mukhtalif ho satke hain .
context/4: bohat se logon ko period clots hotay hain, kya yeh normal hai ?
context/5: aap ki mahvari jald shuru honay ki kuch mumkina wajohaat :  hormonal Adam tawazun tibbi ahwaalmedical conditions kuch duwaein lena perimenopause ziyada werzish karna naaqis ghizaiyat tanao wazan mein achanak izafah ya kami aap ka pedaishi control ka tareeqa aap ke cycle ko bhi mutasir kar sakta hai. hungami Maney hamal goli contraceptive pillibtidayi mahvari ka sabab ban sakti hai. agar aap chand mushtarqa Maney hamalcontraceptive golion ko chore dete hain, to aap ke hormone ki satah kam ho sakti hai, aur khoon behna shuru ho sakta hai is ke muqarara waqt se pehlay .

response: har aik aurat aur shakhs jo aik cycle ke sath qudrati Umar bherne ke amal se guzarta hai zindagi ke un marahil ka tajurbah kere ga. is ke bawajood, woh ab bhi Saqafat aur tehqeeq mein kam numaindagi kar rahay hain .  yeh janna ke kon si tabdeelian mumkin hain aap ko apne andar tabdeeli ki nishandahi karne mein madad mil sakti hai. neez, chunkay perimenopause ke douran toleedi halaat jaisay polistick ovary sndrom  pcos  ka hona ya peda hona ab bhi mumkin hai, is liye yeh janna zaroori hai ke perimenopause ki mumkina alamaat kya hain, aur kon si alamaat kisi aur cheez ki alamat hosakti hain. jo anay wala hai is ke liye tayyar rehne mein koi harj nahi ?
context: mere liye rajonoortimenopause aur perimenopause ke baray mein janna kyun zaroori hai .
context/0: perimenopause jism ki rajonoortimenopause mein muntaqili hai  tafrehi haqeeqat : peeri yonani lafz" aas paas" se aaya hai . ho sakta hai ke aap ne is istilaah ko pehlay nah suna ho, kyunkay log aksar perimenopause  transistion period  ko rajonooti  aap ki aakhri muddat ke baad ka waqt  ke sath uljhaate hain. lekin andaza lagayen kya? woh darasal 2 mukhtalif marahil hain !  perimenopause chand mahino tak mukhtasir ya 8 saal tak jari reh sakta hai. ausatan, yeh taqreeban 45 saal tak rehta hai. perimenopause ke douran, hormone ki satah mein utaar charhao aata hai aur phir kami waqay hoti hai, jis se naye ehsasat, alamaat aur tabdeelian janam layte hain.perimenopause ke yeh tajarbaat logon aur sqafton mein wasee pemanay par mukhtalif hotay hain, aap ke waalid sahib ko mukhtalif wajohaat ki bana par mukhtalif tajarbaat hue hon ge .
context/1: perimenopause kya hai ?
context/2: rajonoortimenopause is waqt hoti hai jab kisi ki mahvari khatam ho jati hai, aur hamal ab mumkin nahi rehta. rajonoortimenopause ka lafz yonani zabaan ke lafz mean se hai, jis ka matlab hai" maheena" aur pausis ka matlab hai tawaquf ya taattul .  rajonoortimenopause aik anokha tajurbah hai  kya aap jantay hain ke insaan kurrah arz par sirf 4 parchaiyon mein se 1 hai jo is ka tajurbah karte hain. yeh bohat saari nai tabdeelian laa sakta hai, aur kuch logon ke liye yeh bilkul bhi tabdeeli ki terhan mehsoos nahi kar sakta .  rajonoortimenopause zindagi ka aik aam marhala hai, lekin usay surgery, manshiat ke ilaaj, ya dawaiyon se bhi mutasir kya ja sakta hai. yeh takneeki tor par aap ke aakhri mahvari ke baad shuru hota hai, lekin aap ka sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne wala aap ko 12 mah ke baad baghair kisi mahvari ke rajonoortimenopause tak pounchanay par ghhor kere ga .

response: perimenopause ka sahih aaghaz  rajonorroti mein muntaqili  ki nishandahi karna mushkil hai. aik tehqeeq jis ne khawateen ko rajonoortimenopause mein muntaqili ke douran track kya is se maloom sunhwa ke mahvari ki be qaidgi ausatan 47 aur 48 saal ki Umar ke darmiyan shuru hui. lekin yeh bohat pehlay ya baad mein shuru ho sakti hai. isi tehqeeq mein, un logon mein se jo 45 saal ki Umar mein bhi mahvari mein thay, taqreeban 3 mein se 1 ne mahvari ki be qaidgi ki ittila di. 52 saal ki Umar mein, taqreeban 10 mein se 1 ne ittila di ke woh ab bhi aam tor par mahvari mein hain. perimenopause ki doosri tabdeelian aur alamaat hain jo mahvari ki be qaidgi shuru honay se pehlay mehsoos ki ja sakti hain, jo perimenopause ke mukhtalif nuqta aaghaz ki nishandahi karne mein madad kar sakti hain, lekin mazeed tehqeeq ki zaroorat hai .

context/5: perimenopause jism ki rajonoortimenopause mein muntaqili hai  tafrehi haqeeqat : peeri yonani lafz" aas paas" se aaya hai . ho sakta hai ke aap ne is istilaah ko pehlay nah suna ho, kyunkay log aksar perimenopause  transistion period  ko rajonooti  aap ki aakhri muddat ke baad ka waqt  ke sath uljhaate hain. lekin andaza lagayen kya? woh darasal 2 mukhtalif marahil hain !  perimenopause chand mahino tak mukhtasir ya 8 saal tak jari reh sakta hai. ausatan, yeh taqreeban 45 saal tak rehta hai. perimenopause ke douran, hormone ki satah mein utaar charhao aata hai aur phir kami waqay hoti hai, jis se naye ehsasat, alamaat aur tabdeelian janam layte hain.perimenopause ke yeh tajarbaat logon aur sqafton mein wasee pemanay par mukhtalif hotay hain, aap ke waalid sahib ko mukhtalif wajohaat ki bana par mukhtalif tajarbaat hue hon ge .

response: aap pooch satke hain : rajonoortimenopause kitni der tak rehti hai? perimenopause muntaqili ki muddat hai, aur rajonoortimenopause aap ki aakhri muddat ke baad ka waqt hai .  mahvari ki be qaadgyon ke douran mahvari ki be qaidgi mahvari ki be qaidgi ke aaghaz se aakhri muddat tak ausatan 4 saal tak rehti hai. lekin yeh chand mahino se  8 saal tak kahin bhi reh sakta hai. taqreeban 10 mein se 1 afraad ko haiz ki be qaidgi ke chand mahino ke sath, ziyada achanak muntaqili ka tajurbah ho sakta hai. yeh log garam chamak jaisi kam alamaat ki ittila dete hain .

context/1: rajonoortimenopause ki osatan Umar kya hai ?
context/2: perimenopause ka sahih aaghaz  rajonorroti mein muntaqili  ki nishandahi karna mushkil hai. aik tehqeeq jis ne khawateen ko rajonoortimenopause mein muntaqili ke douran track kya is se maloom sunhwa ke mahvari ki be qaidgi ausatan 47 aur 48 saal ki Umar ke darmiyan shuru hui. lekin yeh bohat pehlay ya baad mein shuru ho sakti hai. isi tehqeeq mein, un logon mein se jo 45 saal ki Umar mein bhi mahvari mein thay, taqreeban 3 mein se 1 ne mahvari ki be qaidgi ki ittila di. 52 saal ki Umar mein, taqreeban 10 mein se 1 ne ittila di ke woh ab bhi aam tor par mahvari mein hain. perimenopause ki doosri tabdeelian aur alamaat hain jo mahvari ki be qaidgi shuru honay se pehlay mehsoos ki ja sakti hain, jo perimenopause ke mukhtalif nuqta aaghaz ki nishandahi karne mein madad kar sakti hain, lekin mazeed tehqeeq ki zaroorat hai .

response: tambaku noshi : haan .  hormonal birth control : shayad .  aap ki jinyat, mahol aur tarz zindagi sabhi is mein kirdaar ada kar satke hain ke aap kis terhan perimenopause ka tajurbah karte hain, aur perimenopause aur rajonoortimenopause ke waqt. jo log baad ki zindagi mein rajonoortimenopause tak pahonch jatay hain un mein mukhtasir transition hotay hain. tambaku noshi karne walay perimenopause ke waqt qadray kam Umar hotay hain aur un ki muntaqili mukhtasir hoti hai, ost se taqreeban aik saal pehlay rajonoortimenopause tak pahonch jati hai. nasli pas manzar aur ya mutaliqa maholiyati aur ravayye ke awamil ki wajah se mumkina tor par deegar ikhtilafat hain, jaisay ke gaon mein rehna ya shehri shehar mein rehna lekin is mauzo par mazeed tehqeeq ki zaroorat hai .

response: kisi shakhs ki hamal ki tareekh aur zabani Maney hamal adwiyaat  ocs  ke istemaal ki tareekh rajonoortimenopause mein takheer kar sakti hai. is mauzo par mutalay miley jalay hain  kuch mtalaat mein association ka pata chala hai, aur doosron ko nahi  aur is ki hayatiati wajah  agar sach hai  to poori terhan samajh nahi aayi hai. agarchay haamla honay aur ocs ka istemaal beza daaniovary ko dabata hai, lekin woh beza daaniovary se pehlay andon ki nashonuma  aur mout  ko nahi dabatay, is liye kyun ocs ka istemaal rajonoortimenopause ke waqt ko mutasir kere ga, yeh abhi tak wazeh nahi hai .

response: yahan kuch alamaat hain jo aap tajurbah kar satke hain : garam chamak  urf at flushes  paseena aa raha hai . neend mein khlal mood aur iztiraab mein tabdeeli dard shaqeeqa bholeain mein izafah jinsi khwahish mein tabdeelian andaam nihanivagina ki khushki aur kharish kam zarkhaizi banjh pan pait mein jism ki charbi mein izafah . dairpa jismani tabdeelion ke baray mein aagah hona jin mein hadion ki kasafat ka nuqsaan, andaam nihanivagina ki khushki, pishaab ke amal mein tabdeeli, aur jinsi feal mein tabdeelian shaamil hain .  khush qismati se, mahvari ke khatam honay ka matlab yeh bhi hai ke aap ne apne cycle ke douran jo bhi manfi alamaat ka tajurbah kya ho, jaisay dard, neez ghair iraadi hamal ka khatrah .

context/1: kisi shakhs ki hamal ki tareekh aur zabani Maney hamal adwiyaat  ocs  ke istemaal ki tareekh rajonoortimenopause mein takheer kar sakti hai. is mauzo par mutalay miley jalay hain  kuch mtalaat mein association ka pata chala hai, aur doosron ko nahi  aur is ki hayatiati wajah  agar sach hai  to poori terhan samajh nahi aayi hai. agarchay haamla honay aur ocs ka istemaal beza daaniovary ko dabata hai, lekin woh beza daaniovary se pehlay andon ki nashonuma  aur mout  ko nahi dabatay, is liye kyun ocs ka istemaal rajonoortimenopause ke waqt ko mutasir kere ga, yeh abhi tak wazeh nahi hai .
context/2: kya meri hamal ki tareekh aur zabani Maney hamal adwiyaat is Umar ko mutasir kar sakti hain ?
context/3: tambaku noshi : haan .  hormonal birth control : shayad .  aap ki jinyat, mahol aur tarz zindagi sabhi is mein kirdaar ada kar satke hain ke aap kis terhan perimenopause ka tajurbah karte hain, aur perimenopause aur rajonoortimenopause ke waqt. jo log baad ki zindagi mein rajonoortimenopause tak pahonch jatay hain un mein mukhtasir transition hotay hain. tambaku noshi karne walay perimenopause ke waqt qadray kam Umar hotay hain aur un ki muntaqili mukhtasir hoti hai, ost se taqreeban aik saal pehlay rajonoortimenopause tak pahonch jati hai. nasli pas manzar aur ya mutaliqa maholiyati aur ravayye ke awamil ki wajah se mumkina tor par deegar ikhtilafat hain, jaisay ke gaon mein rehna ya shehri shehar mein rehna lekin is mauzo par mazeed tehqeeq ki zaroorat hai .
context/4: rajonoortimenopause ki Umar ko kya mutasir kar sakta hai ?
context/5: aap pooch satke hain : rajonoortimenopause kitni der tak rehti hai? perimenopause muntaqili ki muddat hai, aur rajonoortimenopause aap ki aakhri muddat ke baad ka waqt hai .  mahvari ki be qaadgyon ke douran mahvari ki be qaidgi mahvari ki be qaidgi ke aaghaz se aakhri muddat tak ausatan 4 saal tak rehti hai. lekin yeh chand mahino se  8 saal tak kahin bhi reh sakta hai. taqreeban 10 mein se 1 afraad ko haiz ki be qaidgi ke chand mahino ke sath, ziyada achanak muntaqili ka tajurbah ho sakta hai. yeh log garam chamak jaisi kam alamaat ki ittila dete hain .

response: aap mehsoos kar satke hain ke aap ka mahvari har chakkar se thora pehlay aata hai  yani mahvari ke chhootey daur  aur yeh ziyada bhaari hai .  jaisay jaisay aap perimenopause ke qareeb pahunchte hain, aap ke hormone ki satah tabdeel hona shuru hojati hai. yeh aap ke mahvari ke ghair mutawaqqa honay se pehlay hota hai. kuch logon ke liye, perimenopause ki ibtidayi alamaat mein se aik yeh hai ke un ki mahvari qadray pehlay aati hai yahni un ka mahvari  24 din tak kam ho jata hai. perimenopause se pehlay, astrogen ki satah darasal thori der ke liye barh sakti hai, aur progesterone ki satah aam tor par kam ho jati hai. yeh woh cheez hai jo patak ke marhalay ko mukhtasir karti hai, aur deegar tabdeelion, alamaat ya ehsasat ka sabab bhi ban sakti hai. is douran aap apni mahvari ke bhaari pan mein tabdeelian mehsoos kar satke hain. kam progesterone  ziyada progesterone ke sath ya is ke baghair  bhaari adwaar ka baais bhi ban sakta hai, jo ke ibtidayi perimenopause mein ziyada aam hai .
context: perimenopause se pehlay aur is ke douran mera mahvari kaisay badlay ga .
context/0: yahan kuch alamaat hain jo aap tajurbah kar satke hain : garam chamak  urf at flushes  paseena aa raha hai . neend mein khlal mood aur iztiraab mein tabdeeli dard shaqeeqa bholeain mein izafah jinsi khwahish mein tabdeelian andaam nihanivagina ki khushki aur kharish kam zarkhaizi banjh pan pait mein jism ki charbi mein izafah . dairpa jismani tabdeelion ke baray mein aagah hona jin mein hadion ki kasafat ka nuqsaan, andaam nihanivagina ki khushki, pishaab ke amal mein tabdeeli, aur jinsi feal mein tabdeelian shaamil hain .  khush qismati se, mahvari ke khatam honay ka matlab yeh bhi hai ke aap ne apne cycle ke douran jo bhi manfi alamaat ka tajurbah kya ho, jaisay dard, neez ghair iraadi hamal ka khatrah .

response: baad mein, aap ko fasid chakkar aur khoon behnay mein tabdeelian ho sakti hain .  jaisay jaisay aap ke beza daaniovary mein yatko ki tadaad kam hoti jati hai, beza daaniovary kam hoti jati hai, aur hormone ki satah ziyada se ziyada utaar charhao shuru hoti hai. mahvari ke chakkar lambay, aur phir batadreej ziyada mutaghayyar ho satke lambay aur chhootey, mahvari ke sath jo bhaari, halkay, aur is se kahin kam mutawaqqa hain .  aap ki muddat ka boojh bhi utaar charhao aaye ga. ovulation ke baghair cyclon ke adwaar halkay ho satke hain, jabkay aik taweel cycle ke baad anay walay adwaar taweel ho satke hain. ausatan, rajonooti se pehlay aakhri 10 cyclon mein se taqreeban 6 taweel aur olovaltary hotay hain  jahan beza nahi hota . rajonoortimenopause se pehlay 12 saloon mein, cyclon ka 5 hafton se ziyada waqt tak rehna aam hai .

context/1: baad mein, aap ko fasid chakkar aur khoon behnay mein tabdeelian ho sakti hain .  jaisay jaisay aap ke beza daaniovary mein yatko ki tadaad kam hoti jati hai, beza daaniovary kam hoti jati hai, aur hormone ki satah ziyada se ziyada utaar charhao shuru hoti hai. mahvari ke chakkar lambay, aur phir batadreej ziyada mutaghayyar ho satke lambay aur chhootey, mahvari ke sath jo bhaari, halkay, aur is se kahin kam mutawaqqa hain .  aap ki muddat ka boojh bhi utaar charhao aaye ga. ovulation ke baghair cyclon ke adwaar halkay ho satke hain, jabkay aik taweel cycle ke baad anay walay adwaar taweel ho satke hain. ausatan, rajonooti se pehlay aakhri 10 cyclon mein se taqreeban 6 taweel aur olovaltary hotay hain  jahan beza nahi hota . rajonoortimenopause se pehlay 12 saloon mein, cyclon ka 5 hafton se ziyada waqt tak rehna aam hai .
context/2: uge kya hota hai ?
context/3: aap mehsoos kar satke hain ke aap ka mahvari har chakkar se thora pehlay aata hai  yani mahvari ke chhootey daur  aur yeh ziyada bhaari hai .  jaisay jaisay aap perimenopause ke qareeb pahunchte hain, aap ke hormone ki satah tabdeel hona shuru hojati hai. yeh aap ke mahvari ke ghair mutawaqqa honay se pehlay hota hai. kuch logon ke liye, perimenopause ki ibtidayi alamaat mein se aik yeh hai ke un ki mahvari qadray pehlay aati hai yahni un ka mahvari  24 din tak kam ho jata hai. perimenopause se pehlay, astrogen ki satah darasal thori der ke liye barh sakti hai, aur progesterone ki satah aam tor par kam ho jati hai. yeh woh cheez hai jo patak ke marhalay ko mukhtasir karti hai, aur deegar tabdeelion, alamaat ya ehsasat ka sabab bhi ban sakti hai. is douran aap apni mahvari ke bhaari pan mein tabdeelian mehsoos kar satke hain. kam progesterone  ziyada progesterone ke sath ya is ke baghair  bhaari adwaar ka baais bhi ban sakta hai, jo ke ibtidayi perimenopause mein ziyada aam hai .
context/4: perimenopause se pehlay aur is ke douran mera mahvari kaisay badlay ga .
context/5: yahan kuch alamaat hain jo aap tajurbah kar satke hain : garam chamak  urf at flushes  paseena aa raha hai . neend mein khlal mood aur iztiraab mein tabdeeli dard shaqeeqa bholeain mein izafah jinsi khwahish mein tabdeelian andaam nihanivagina ki khushki aur kharish kam zarkhaizi banjh pan pait mein jism ki charbi mein izafah . dairpa jismani tabdeelion ke baray mein aagah hona jin mein hadion ki kasafat ka nuqsaan, andaam nihanivagina ki khushki, pishaab ke amal mein tabdeeli, aur jinsi feal mein tabdeelian shaamil hain .  khush qismati se, mahvari ke khatam honay ka matlab yeh bhi hai ke aap ne apne cycle ke douran jo bhi manfi alamaat ka tajurbah kya ho, jaisay dard, neez ghair iraadi hamal ka khatrah .

response: fori yaad dehani : perimenopause rajonoortimenopause se pehlay ki muntaqili ki muddat hai. yeh jism ka aik aam kaam hai, lekin is ki wajah se honay wali kuch tabdeelian be cheeni, ya ghusse mein bhi mehsoos kar sakti hain .  agar aap alamaat ka saamna kar rahay hain jo aap ke miyaar zindagi ko mutasir karti hain, jaisay garam chamak, andaam nihanivagina ki khushki, mood mein tabdeeli, ya sonay mein dushwari, sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne walay ya perimenopause ke maahir se milna aik acha khayaal ho sakta hai .

response: agar aap apni muddat ke wazan ya Tawalat ke baray mein fikar mand hain, aap ko mukammal rajonoortimenopause tak pounchanay ke baad kisi qisam ke dhabbay ya khoon behnay ka tajurbah hota hai, aap ko mukammal rajonoortimenopause tak pounchanay ke baad koi dhabba ya khoon behna mehsoos hota hai ya perimenopause ke douran ya rajonoortimenopause ke baad ghair mamooli khoon behna nazar aata hai, aap ko aik hith ke paas jana chahiye. faraham kanandah agar aap dekhte hain ke aap ko mahvari ke darmiyan khoon aata hai, khaas tor par agar aap ki polistick ovary sndrom  pcos  ki tareekh hai, wazan ziyada hai, bacha daaniuterus ke cancer ki khandani tareekh hai, ya chhaati ke cancer se bachney ke liye sirf istrogen hormone therapy ya kuch duwaein li hain., aap ko yakeeni tor par sehat faraham karne walay se milna chahiye. bilashuba, agar aap ko koi shak hai aur aap ko koi ghair mamooli cheez nazar aati hai, to aap ko hamesha apne sawalaat ke jawabaat kisi maahir se pooch kar haasil karne chahiye, jaisa ke meri terhan !

response: perimenopause aur rajonoortimenopause mein khoon behnay se mutaliq kuch mazeed maloomat jin se aap ko aagah hona chahiye. agarchay perimenopause ke douran khoon behnay mein tabdeelion ki tawaqqa ki jati hai, lekin khoon behnay mein kuch tabdeelian aap ke endometrium  yani aap ke reham ki parat  mein ghair mamooli tabdeelion ki wajah se hosakti hain. agar endometrium bohat gaarha aur be qaida ho jaye to yeh cancer mein tabdeel ho sakta hai, lekin agar usay jald pakar liya jaye to usay umooman roka ja sakta hai. is ke ilawa, baaz sooraton mein, rajonoortimenopause ke baad khoon behna jari rehta hai. is qisam ke khoon behnay ko perimenopause ki alamaat samajh kar ghalti karna aasaan hai, jo kisi ko yeh sochnay mein gumraah kar sakta hai ke jab woh haqeeqat mein mukammal rajonoortimenopause tak nahi puhanche hain .

context/1: agar aap apni muddat ke wazan ya Tawalat ke baray mein fikar mand hain, aap ko mukammal rajonoortimenopause tak pounchanay ke baad kisi qisam ke dhabbay ya khoon behnay ka tajurbah hota hai, aap ko mukammal rajonoortimenopause tak pounchanay ke baad koi dhabba ya khoon behna mehsoos hota hai ya perimenopause ke douran ya rajonoortimenopause ke baad ghair mamooli khoon behna nazar aata hai, aap ko aik hith ke paas jana chahiye. faraham kanandah agar aap dekhte hain ke aap ko mahvari ke darmiyan khoon aata hai, khaas tor par agar aap ki polistick ovary sndrom  pcos  ki tareekh hai, wazan ziyada hai, bacha daaniuterus ke cancer ki khandani tareekh hai, ya chhaati ke cancer se bachney ke liye sirf istrogen hormone therapy ya kuch duwaein li hain., aap ko yakeeni tor par sehat faraham karne walay se milna chahiye. bilashuba, agar aap ko koi shak hai aur aap ko koi ghair mamooli cheez nazar aati hai, to aap ko hamesha apne sawalaat ke jawabaat kisi maahir se pooch kar haasil karne chahiye, jaisa ke meri terhan !
context/2: mujhe Rajonoooorti aur perimenopause ke hawalay se sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne walay se kab milna chahiye ?
context/3: fori yaad dehani : perimenopause rajonoortimenopause se pehlay ki muntaqili ki muddat hai. yeh jism ka aik aam kaam hai, lekin is ki wajah se honay wali kuch tabdeelian be cheeni, ya ghusse mein bhi mehsoos kar sakti hain .  agar aap alamaat ka saamna kar rahay hain jo aap ke miyaar zindagi ko mutasir karti hain, jaisay garam chamak, andaam nihanivagina ki khushki, mood mein tabdeeli, ya sonay mein dushwari, sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne walay ya perimenopause ke maahir se milna aik acha khayaal ho sakta hai .
context/4: mein rajonoortimenopause aur perimenopause ki alamaat ko kaisay munazzam kar sakta hon ?
context/5: aakhirkaar, yeh koi muddat nahi hai .  chunkay beza nayaab ho jata hai, aap ki mahvari aik waqt mein mahino ke liye daur ho sakti hai, aur phir wapas aa sakti hai. yeh marhala ziyada tar logon ke liye 13 saal ke darmiyan rehta hai, lekin phir, har koi mukhtalif hai. bil akhir, rajonoortimenopause pahonch jati hai, aur muddat ke sath sath cycle khatam ho jata hai .  taqreeban 10 mein se 1 log haiz ko ziyada achanak rokkk satke hain, bohat kam taweel be qaidgi ke sath .

response: rajonoortimenopause ke baad koi dhabba ya khoon behna ghair mamooli hai aur usay sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne walay se check karana chahiye. rajonoortimenopause ke baad dhabbay ya khoon aana kisi tibbi haalat ki wajah se ho sakta hai, jaisay yotrn polyps. bacha daaniuterus ke polyps bacha daaniuterus ki androoni asterlining par barhatay hain aur Umar ke sath ziyada aam ho jatay hain .

response: kya aap andaam nihanivagina se be qaida khoon behnay ko dekh rahay hain? yeh uterine polyps ki wajah se ho sakta hai. uterine polyps, jisay endometrial polyps bhi kaha jata hai, bacha daaniuterus ki androoni asterlining  endometrium  par ghair mamooli nashonuma hai . yotrn polyps bohat aam hain. yeh aam tor par rajonoortimenopause tak aur is ke baad hotay hain, aap ki nani kisi ko jaan sakti hain. chhootey polyps koi alamaat peda nahi kar saktay hain aur khud hi daur ho saktay hain. doosri sooraton mein, ilaaj nah kiye jane walay polyps aisi alamaat ka sabab ban satke hain jo zindagi ke miyaar ko mutasir karte hain aur cancer ban'nay ka aik chhota sa imkaan le satke hain. woh zarkhaizi ko bhi mutasir kar satke hain, lekin is mauzo par tehqeeq ka fuqdaan hai .  uterine polyps ki taqreeban tamam alamaat ka pata lagana aasaan hai. ibtidayi aur jald ilaaj ka pata lagana pechidgion ke khatray ko kam kar sakta hai .

response: bacha daaniuterus ke polyps is waqt hotay hain jab bacha daaniuterus ke asterlining  endometrium  ke khaliyaat kayi gina barh jatay hain, jis se ganthin banti hain. yeh ganthin aksar ladkhadte theliyon ya bafton se bani mashroom se mushabihat rakhti hain. ziyada tar bohat chhootey hain, lekin size mein chand mili meter se le kar kayi centi meter qutar tak ho satke hain. polyps mutadid ya kam ho saktay hain, aur kuch logon mein sirf aik ho sakta hai .  aap ko kuch aur maloomat faraham karne ke liye, kuch logon ko uterine polyps ban'nay ka imkaan doosron ke muqablay mein ziyada hota hai. yeh un logon mein sab se ziyada aam hain jo peeri menopause aur post menopause hain. agar aap motapay ka shikaar hain to aap ko yeh bhi maloom hona chahiye ke motapay se logon mein polyps peda honay ka ziyada imkaan hota hai. agar aap ne chhaati ke cancer ki dawa tamoxifen li hai, to yeh bhi aik ahem Ansar ho sakta hai .
context: uterine polyps kyun hotay hain ?
context/0: kya aap andaam nihanivagina se be qaida khoon behnay ko dekh rahay hain? yeh uterine polyps ki wajah se ho sakta hai. uterine polyps, jisay endometrial polyps bhi kaha jata hai, bacha daaniuterus ki androoni asterlining  endometrium  par ghair mamooli nashonuma hai . yotrn polyps bohat aam hain. yeh aam tor par rajonoortimenopause tak aur is ke baad hotay hain, aap ki nani kisi ko jaan sakti hain. chhootey polyps koi alamaat peda nahi kar saktay hain aur khud hi daur ho saktay hain. doosri sooraton mein, ilaaj nah kiye jane walay polyps aisi alamaat ka sabab ban satke hain jo zindagi ke miyaar ko mutasir karte hain aur cancer ban'nay ka aik chhota sa imkaan le satke hain. woh zarkhaizi ko bhi mutasir kar satke hain, lekin is mauzo par tehqeeq ka fuqdaan hai .  uterine polyps ki taqreeban tamam alamaat ka pata lagana aasaan hai. ibtidayi aur jald ilaaj ka pata lagana pechidgion ke khatray ko kam kar sakta hai .

response: Uterine polyps ki aik qisam se mlitay jaltay hain  woh bacha daaniuterus mein pathon ke tissue se bantay hain, lekin bohat si aik jaisi alamaat ka sabab ban satke hain, sath hi deegar alamaat . sab se bara farq yeh hai ke toleedi saloon mein fibroids ka ziyada imkaan hota hai aur rajonoortimenopause ke baad suker jatay hain, jabkay Polyps ke rajonoortimenopause ke baad masail ka ziyada imkaan hota hai, is liye waqai is baat par munhasir hai ke aap is waqt kis marhalay mein hain .

context/5: bacha daaniuterus ke polyps is waqt hotay hain jab bacha daaniuterus ke asterlining  endometrium  ke khaliyaat kayi gina barh jatay hain, jis se ganthin banti hain. yeh ganthin aksar ladkhadte theliyon ya bafton se bani mashroom se mushabihat rakhti hain. ziyada tar bohat chhootey hain, lekin size mein chand mili meter se le kar kayi centi meter qutar tak ho satke hain. polyps mutadid ya kam ho saktay hain, aur kuch logon mein sirf aik ho sakta hai .  aap ko kuch aur maloomat faraham karne ke liye, kuch logon ko uterine polyps ban'nay ka imkaan doosron ke muqablay mein ziyada hota hai. yeh un logon mein sab se ziyada aam hain jo peeri menopause aur post menopause hain. agar aap motapay ka shikaar hain to aap ko yeh bhi maloom hona chahiye ke motapay se logon mein polyps peda honay ka ziyada imkaan hota hai. agar aap ne chhaati ke cancer ki dawa tamoxifen li hai, to yeh bhi aik ahem Ansar ho sakta hai .

response: jab aap apne polyps ki tashkhees ke liye jayen ge, to sehat ki dekh bhaal faraham karne wala aap se alamaat, tibbi aur mahvari ki tareekh ke baray mein sawalaat pouchye ga aur aik saada jismani muaina kere ga. agar inhen shuba hai ke aap ko bacha daaniuterus ke polyps hain, to woh transvaginal altrasaond, aik hysteroscopy  bacha daaniuterus mein aik chhota camera dala gaya hai  ya biopsy  tissue ka namona lainay ke liye bacha daaniuterus mein aik chhota sa tool dala jata hai  bhi kar satke hain .
context: agar mujhe uterine polyps hain to mein kaisay tashkhees karoon ga ?
context/0: bulaa jhijhak mujh se aap ke koi aur sawalaat poucheen .
context/1: oh mujhe yeh maloom nahi tha .
context/2: bacha daaniuterus ke chhootey polyps aksar ghair allamti hotay hain, aur khud atay aur ja satke hain. taham, kuch ilaaj nah kiye jane walay polyps aisi alamaat ka sabab ban satke hain jo aap ke miyaar zindagi ko mutasir karte hain aur un ki wajah se paichidgiyan peda ho sakti hain jaisay ke khoon ki kami  aisi haalat jab jism mein khoon ke surkh khaliye munasib tareeqay se kaam karne ke liye kaafi nahi hotay hain. khoon ki kami ki ziyada miqdaar  .  Shaz o nadir sooraton mein, baaz reham ke polyps mein cancer ban'nay ka bohat kam imkaan hota hai. woh haamla honay ya rehne ki salahiyat ko bhi mutasir kar satke hain, lekin is mauzo par tehqeeq ka abhi bhi fuqdaan hai .

response: jee haan. baaz auqaat uterine polyps ki alamaat ke ilaaj ke liye hormonal duwaein tajweez ki jati hain. un mein Gonadotropin nikalnay wala hormone  gnrh  Agonists shaamil hain, jo jism mein baaz hormones progesterone, aur progesterone ki pedawar ko roktay hain, jo aksar kareem ki shakal mein tajweez kiye jatay hain. taham, uterine polyps ke liye un hormonal ilaaj ki taseer par bohat kam tehqeeq hui hai .

response: chhootey polypsko aik amal se hataya ja sakta hai jisayhysteroscopic excision kehte hain. tehqeeq mein bataya gaya hai ke chhootey polyps 1cm  walay 10 mein se 7 afraad ne is tareeqa car ke baad un ki alamaat mein numaya behtari payi. barah karam apne health care faraham karne walay se poucheen ke kya aap ko is ki zaroorat hai ya nahi .

context/5: kya mein uterine polyps ke liye dawa istemaal kar sakta hon ?

context/1: is par tehqeeq abhi tak wazeh nahi hai, lekin wazan mein kami un logon ki tashkhees ko behtar bana sakti hai jin ki tashkhees uterine polyps aur motapay dono se hoti hai .
context/2: tarz zindagi mein tabdeeli aur uterine polyps ke darmiyan koi talluq ?

response: haan, badboo aana bilkul theek hai. koi andaam nihanivagina bo ke baghair nahi hai, aur nah hi woh hona chahiye. andaam nihanivagina mein tanbay se le kar meethi tak bohat si mumkina bo hoti hai. aap ki andaam nihanivagina ki bo aap ki khoraak aur mahvari ke lehaaz se badal sakti hai .  agar bo taiz aur nagawaar hai, to dr ya deegar tibbi nighdasht faraham karne walay se rabita karen. baaz halaat, jaisa ke bacterial viogosis, aap ki andaam nihanivagina se sakht bo aa sakti hai. aap ka faraham kanandah aap ko aglay iqdamaat ke baray mein mahswara day sakta hai .

response: chand tabdeelian runuma hoti hain. is marhalay ke pehlay hissay ke douran aap ke toleedireproductive hormones apni kam tareen satah par hain  jo woh jagah hai jahan woh aap ke khoon ke douran thay . is marhalay ke aakhri hissay ke douran estrogen barhna shuru ho jata hai aur aap ke reham ki parat gaarha hona shuru ho jati hai. beza daaniovary ke douran aap ki beza daaniovary anda chorney ke liye tayyar ho jati hai  aglay marhalay mein metabolism sust hota hai aur aaraam karne par cortisol ki satah kam hoti hai. is douran koi khaas progestrone ya testosterone ki pedawar nahi hoti hai aur agar aap ke hormones ghair mutawazan hain to aap is marhalay ke douran thakawat mehsoos kar satke hain .

response: aap ke jism mein kuch tabdeelian runuma hoti hain. estrogen ki satah barhti rehti hai, aap ke reham ki asterlining gaarhi hoti rehti hai aur aap ke progestrone ki satah bherne lagti hai. context/0: haan yeh hota hai. dar haqeeqat, aap ka dimagh har marhalay mein tabdeelion se guzarta hai. is marhalay ke douran hormone ki satah aap ke dimagh ko tafseelaat par tawajah markooz karne aur projects ko semathnay mein acha banati hai. is marhalay ke ekhtataam ki taraf, jaisay jaisay aap ke hormone ki satah kam hoti jaye gi, aap ko tawanai kam hogi aur aap samaji honay ki bajaye andar ki taraf tawajah markooz karne ke liye ziyada mael mehsoos karen ge .
context/1: kya is marhalay mein mera dimagh bhi badal jata hai ?
context/2: aap ke jism mein kuch tabdeelian runuma hoti hain. estrogen ki satah barhti rehti hai, aap ke reham ki asterlining gaarhi hoti rehti hai aur aap ke progestrone ki satah bherne lagti hai. Luteal marhalay ke ekhtataam ki taraf, estrogen, testosterone, aur progestrone chouti aur phir girna shuru kar dete hain, aap ki mahvari se ain pehlay apni nichli satah ko maartay hain. is marhalay ke douran premenstrual syndrome hoti hai jisme jism mein progestrone ki nisbat bohat ziyada estrogen ki wajah se hota hai, ya estrogen ka ghalba aur metabolism taiz kardeta hai .
context/3: jab mein luteal marhalay mein hon to mere jism ko kya hota hai .
context/4: yeh ovulation ke 10 se 14 din baad aur aap ke khoon se pehlay hota hai .
context/5: yeh kitni der tak rehta hai .

response: aap ki mahvari se aik hafta pehlay, agar aap ke paas progestrone ki nisbat bohat ziyada estrogen hai, to aap PMS  premenstrual syndrome  ki alamaat ka tajurbah kar satke hain, Bashmole be khwabiinsomnia. estrogen ka ghalba aam awamil ki aik taweel fehrist se shuru hota hai, Bashmole tanao, khud ki dekh bhaal ki kami, naaqis khoraak, micronutrients ki kami, magnesium, zinc aur selenium bhi is maslay ko sunhwa day sakta hai. magnesium aaraam ko farogh dainay mein madad karta hai. selenium progestrone ko badhaane aur aap ke toleedireproductive hormones ko dobarah tawazun mein laane mein madad kar sakta hai. mtalaat se pata chalta hai ke zank neend ki miqdaar aur miyaar ko behtar bananay mein madad kar sakta hai.  kuch aam maholiyati awamil sorat e haal ko mazeed kharab kar dete hain. caffeine piinaa aik hai. agar aap ko adrenal thakawat hai, to aap pms se mutaliq be khwabiinsomnia ka tajurbah kar satke hain, jahan aap thakey hare bistar par laitay hain lekin so nahi satke.

response: agar aap ke progestrone ki satah majmoi tor par kam ho to hormone ka adam tawazun mazeed kharab ho jata hai  jo har umar ki khawateen ko mutasir kar sakta hai, lekin yeh aksar 35 saal se ziyada umar ki khawateen mein hota hai. is ki wajah yeh hai ke perimenopause ke douran progestrone ki majmoi satah neechay ki taraf bherne lagti hai, aur kam progestrone melatonin ki pedawar par manfi assar dalta hai, jis ki neend anay aur sonay ke liye zaroori hai. progestrone bhi aaraam ko farogh deta hai, aur is ki kaafi miqdaar ke baghair, aap ko aasani se neend anay mein pareshani hogi. progestrone neend ke liye acha hai .

response: aap ka cycle 2632 din tak chalna chahiye. aap ke khoon ka rang cranberry ya anaar ke juice ka hona chahiye, baghair kisi jamnay ke. aik acha, mazboot, bahao jo mushkil se bhaari nahi hai. aap ki mahvari waqai sab se pehlay subah se shuru honi chahiye, baghair kisi bhooray daagh ke jo cranberry ya anaar jaisa surkh ki shakal ka baais banay. aur yeh 47 din tak rehna chahiye, ziyada ya chhota nahi. aap ko thora sa ehsas ya garam ehsasat ke sath apne bacha daaniuterus ko harkat mein mehsoos karne ke qabil hona chahiye, lekin kisi qisam ka dard nahi hona chahiye jo aap ko manshiat ya garam pani ki bottlon tak pounchanay par majboor kar sakta hai. aap ki mahvari ke baad, beza daaniovary tak, aap ko cervical fluid ki nashonuma dekhna chahiye, jo ke sehat mand zarkhaizi ka ishara hai aur haamla honay ke liye zaroori hai .

response: ya kam wazan hona? aakhir mein, polycystic ovary syndrome  pcos  kehlanay wali aik haalat, jis mein aap ke beza daaniovary par cyst barhatay hain, nojawan khawateen mein beza daaniovary ko rokkk satke hain .  mahvari ki kami ke liye sab se ahem muharikaat mein se aik hormonal birth control se bahar aana hai. aur goli ko rokna is baat ki zamanat nahi deta ke aap ki mahvari wapas aajay gi. dar haqeeqat, khoraak aur tarz zindagi mein tabdeelion ke zariye tawajah markooz kiye baghair, bohat si khawateen jo goli chodthee hain inhen mahino ya saloon tak dobarah khoon nahi aana shuru hota hai. kuch Maroof ," darsi kitaab" wajohaat hain jin ki wajah se mahvari gayab ho jati hai, jaisay hamal, doodh pilana, aur rajonoortimenopause .  bohat ziyada werzish mein bhi mashgool hai. jaisa ke aap jantay hon ge ke kisi bhi cheez ka bohat ziyada istemaal kabhi sehat mand nahi hota. bohat ziyada werzish hormonal Adam tawazun ka baais ban sakti hai, lehaza bohat kam khana kha sakta hai .

context/4: aap ki mahvari se aik hafta pehlay, agar aap ke paas progestrone ki nisbat bohat ziyada estrogen hai, to aap PMS  premenstrual syndrome  ki alamaat ka tajurbah kar satke hain, Bashmole be khwabiinsomnia. estrogen ka ghalba aam awamil ki aik taweel fehrist se shuru hota hai, Bashmole tanao, khud ki dekh bhaal ki kami, naaqis khoraak, micronutrients ki kami, magnesium, zinc aur selenium bhi is maslay ko sunhwa day sakta hai. magnesium aaraam ko farogh dainay mein madad karta hai. selenium progestrone ko badhaane aur aap ke toleedireproductive hormones ko dobarah tawazun mein laane mein madad kar sakta hai. mtalaat se pata chalta hai ke zank neend ki miqdaar aur miyaar ko behtar bananay mein madad kar sakta hai.  kuch aam maholiyati awamil sorat e haal ko mazeed kharab kar dete hain. caffeine piinaa aik hai. agar aap ko adrenal thakawat hai, to aap pms se mutaliq be khwabiinsomnia ka tajurbah kar satke hain, jahan aap thakey hare bistar par laitay hain lekin so nahi satke.
context/5: mujhe be khwabiinsomnia ho rahi thi aur aglay haftay mujhe mahvari aa gayi. kya un ke darmiyan koi rabt hai ?

response: mere mahvari chhuut gayi hai aur mere paas koi mashhoor wajah nahi hai, barah karam madad karen mein bohat darti hon ke mere sath kuch ghalat hai
context: ya kam wazan hona? aakhir mein, polycystic ovary syndrome  pcos  kehlanay wali aik haalat, jis mein aap ke beza daaniovary par cyst barhatay hain, nojawan khawateen mein beza daaniovary ko rokkk satke hain .  mahvari ki kami ke liye sab se ahem muharikaat mein se aik hormonal birth control se bahar aana hai. aur goli ko rokna is baat ki zamanat nahi deta ke aap ki mahvari wapas aajay gi. dar haqeeqat, khoraak aur tarz zindagi mein tabdeelion ke zariye tawajah markooz kiye baghair, bohat si khawateen jo goli chodthee hain inhen mahino ya saloon tak dobarah khoon nahi aana shuru hota hai. kuch Maroof ," darsi kitaab" wajohaat hain jin ki wajah se mahvari gayab ho jati hai, jaisay hamal, doodh pilana, aur rajonoortimenopause .  bohat ziyada werzish mein bhi mashgool hai. jaisa ke aap jantay hon ge ke kisi bhi cheez ka bohat ziyada istemaal kabhi sehat mand nahi hota. bohat ziyada werzish hormonal Adam tawazun ka baais ban sakti hai, lehaza bohat kam khana kha sakta hai .
context/0: meri mahvari aana band ho gayi hai, lekin meri shadi nahi hui hai. kya mere sath kuch ghalat hai ?
context/1: aap ka cycle 2632 din tak chalna chahiye. aap ke khoon ka rang cranberry ya anaar ke juice ka hona chahiye, baghair kisi jamnay ke. aik acha, mazboot, bahao jo mushkil se bhaari nahi hai. aap ki mahvari waqai sab se pehlay subah se shuru honi chahiye, baghair kisi bhooray daagh ke jo cranberry ya anaar jaisa surkh ki shakal ka baais banay. aur yeh 47 din tak rehna chahiye, ziyada ya chhota nahi. aap ko thora sa ehsas ya garam ehsasat ke sath apne bacha daaniuterus ko harkat mein mehsoos karne ke qabil hona chahiye, lekin kisi qisam ka dard nahi hona chahiye jo aap ko manshiat ya garam pani ki bottlon tak pounchanay par majboor kar sakta hai. aap ki mahvari ke baad, beza daaniovary tak, aap ko cervical fluid ki nashonuma dekhna chahiye, jo ke sehat mand zarkhaizi ka ishara hai aur haamla honay ke liye zaroori hai .
context/2: mai soch rahi thi ke aik aam, sehat mand ya kaamil mahvari kaisa hona chahiye ?
context/3: agar aap ke progestrone ki satah majmoi tor par kam ho to hormone ka adam tawazun mazeed kharab ho jata hai  jo har umar ki khawateen ko mutasir kar sakta hai, lekin yeh aksar 35 saal se ziyada umar ki khawateen mein hota hai. is ki wajah yeh hai ke perimenopause ke douran progestrone ki majmoi satah neechay ki taraf bherne lagti hai, aur kam progestrone melatonin ki pedawar par manfi assar dalta hai, jis ki neend anay aur sonay ke liye zaroori hai. progestrone bhi aaraam ko farogh deta hai, aur is ki kaafi miqdaar ke baghair, aap ko aasani se neend anay mein pareshani hogi. progestrone neend ke liye acha hai .

response: tanao samait mahvari ke gayab honay ya be qaidgi ki wajohaat ke baray mein kam baat ki jati hai  lekin kam haqeeqi nahi . daimi tanaochronic stress cortisol ko berhata hai aur blood sugar mein khlal dalta hai, jo beza daaniovary mein khlal dalta hai. mtalaat se yeh bhi pata chalta hai ke tanao wali mlazmtonjobs wali khawateen ko ovulation  beza nahi aana  aur mahvari ki tabdeeli ka khatrah dugna hota hai. doosri tehqeeq se pata chalta hai ke beza daaniovary ke waqt ziyada tanao wali khawateen ko haamla honay mein mushkil paish aati hai . jab aap ka blood sugar musalsal oopar aur neechay ja raha hai jis ki badolat ziyada sugar aur behtar carbohydrate wali ghazayein khanay ki badolat la patah ya fasid adwaar ko bhi eendhan day sakta hai. ghair mutawazan khoon mein sugar ka talluq banjh pan se hai, aur diabetes ki duwaein jaisay metformin aksar pcos wali khawateen ko ovulation ko mutharrak karne ke liye tajweez ki jati hain .
context: mere mahvari chhuut gayi hai aur mere paas koi mashhoor wajah nahi hai, barah karam madad karen mein bohat darti hon ke mere sath kuch ghalat hai

response: khud ki dekh bhaal ko sanjeedgi se len. aap jitna ziyada tanao ka shikaar hon ge, tanao ko sambhalay aur usay kam karne ke liye aap ko itna hi mushkil kaam karne ki zaroorat hai. apni zindagi ko un tanao ke liye scan karen jo aap tabdeel kar satke hain, aur phir aisa karen! blood sugar ke masail ko hal karne ka wahid behtareen tareeqa khoraak hai. sehat mand paicheeda  aur nongluten  carbohydrate par zor den, kaafi sehat mand, aala qisam ki fat aur protein khayen, aur yakeeni banayen ke aap qous quzah ke tamam rangon mein ghair nashasta daar sabzian front load karen. jaldi sonay ki aadat daalein! neend se hormones bohat ziyada mutasir hotay hain. 24 ghantay ka carcadian cycle hamaray jism ke hormones par barah e raast assar dalta hai aur is se barah e raast mutasir hota hai. jab hamari neend kam hoti hai to hamaray hormones ko mutawazan rakhna taqreeban namumkin hota hai. lehaza aaj raat  aur har raat!  sonay ko tarjeeh den .
context: mein apne haiz nah anay se thak gayi hon, mein usay wapas chahti hon .

context/5: aap ka cycle 2632 din tak chalna chahiye. aap ke khoon ka rang cranberry ya anaar ke juice ka hona chahiye, baghair kisi jamnay ke. aik acha, mazboot, bahao jo mushkil se bhaari nahi hai. aap ki mahvari waqai sab se pehlay subah se shuru honi chahiye, baghair kisi bhooray daagh ke jo cranberry ya anaar jaisa surkh ki shakal ka baais banay. aur yeh 47 din tak rehna chahiye, ziyada ya chhota nahi. aap ko thora sa ehsas ya garam ehsasat ke sath apne bacha daaniuterus ko harkat mein mehsoos karne ke qabil hona chahiye, lekin kisi qisam ka dard nahi hona chahiye jo aap ko manshiat ya garam pani ki bottlon tak pounchanay par majboor kar sakta hai. aap ki mahvari ke baad, beza daaniovary tak, aap ko cervical fluid ki nashonuma dekhna chahiye, jo ke sehat mand zarkhaizi ka ishara hai aur haamla honay ke liye zaroori hai .

response: mahireen ka khayaal hai ke PMS har mah jinsi hormones mein cyclical tabdeelion se  juzwi tor par  shuru hota hai. mahana hormone ki tabdeelian aam aur mutawaqqa hain. woh hotay hain! lekin is maslay ki jarr is waqt hoti hai jab hamaray paas estrogen aur progestrone hamari zaroorat se ziyada ya kam ho. jab hamara jism is harmonal tor par ghair mutawazan mahol mein 28 din ke hormone cycle se guzarta hai, isi waqt hamein alamaat ka saamna karna parta hai. agar aap khoraak aur tarz zindagi ke sath bunyadi hormone ke Adam tawazun ko dur karte hain, to aap premenstrual syndrome ki alamaat ko mita satke hain. mahireen ka yeh bhi maanna hai ke PMS ki alamaat mein ghizaiyat ki kami aik kirdaar ada karti hai. tehqeeq ne vitamin d, calcium, aur magnesium ki kam satah aur pms alamaat ke darmiyan talluq zahir kya hai .
context: Pre Menstrual syndrome ki kya wajah hai ?
context/0: khud ki dekh bhaal ko sanjeedgi se len. aap jitna ziyada tanao ka shikaar hon ge, tanao ko sambhalay aur usay kam karne ke liye aap ko itna hi mushkil kaam karne ki zaroorat hai. apni zindagi ko un tanao ke liye scan karen jo aap tabdeel kar satke hain, aur phir aisa karen! blood sugar ke masail ko hal karne ka wahid behtareen tareeqa khoraak hai. sehat mand paicheeda  aur nongluten  carbohydrate par zor den, kaafi sehat mand, aala qisam ki fat aur protein khayen, aur yakeeni banayen ke aap qous quzah ke tamam rangon mein ghair nashasta daar sabzian front load karen. jaldi sonay ki aadat daalein! neend se hormones bohat ziyada mutasir hotay hain. 24 ghantay ka carcadian cycle hamaray jism ke hormones par barah e raast assar dalta hai aur is se barah e raast mutasir hota hai. jab hamari neend kam hoti hai to hamaray hormones ko mutawazan rakhna taqreeban namumkin hota hai. lehaza aaj raat  aur har raat!  sonay ko tarjeeh den .
context/1: mein apne haiz nah anay se thak gayi hon, mein usay wapas chahti hon .
context/2: tanao samait mahvari ke gayab honay ya be qaidgi ki wajohaat ke baray mein kam baat ki jati hai  lekin kam haqeeqi nahi . daimi tanaochronic stress cortisol ko berhata hai aur blood sugar mein khlal dalta hai, jo beza daaniovary mein khlal dalta hai. mtalaat se yeh bhi pata chalta hai ke tanao wali mlazmtonjobs wali khawateen ko ovulation  beza nahi aana  aur mahvari ki tabdeeli ka khatrah dugna hota hai. doosri tehqeeq se pata chalta hai ke beza daaniovary ke waqt ziyada tanao wali khawateen ko haamla honay mein mushkil paish aati hai . jab aap ka blood sugar musalsal oopar aur neechay ja raha hai jis ki badolat ziyada sugar aur behtar carbohydrate wali ghazayein khanay ki badolat la patah ya fasid adwaar ko bhi eendhan day sakta hai. ghair mutawazan khoon mein sugar ka talluq banjh pan se hai, aur diabetes ki duwaein jaisay metformin aksar pcos wali khawateen ko ovulation ko mutharrak karne ke liye tajweez ki jati hain .
context/3: mere mahvari chhuut gayi hai aur mere paas koi mashhoor wajah nahi hai, barah karam madad karen mein bohat darti hon ke mere sath kuch ghalat hai
context/4: ya kam wazan hona? aakhir mein, polycystic ovary syndrome  pcos  kehlanay wali aik haalat, jis mein aap ke beza daaniovary par cyst barhatay hain, nojawan khawateen mein beza daaniovary ko rokkk satke hain .  mahvari ki kami ke liye sab se ahem muharikaat mein se aik hormonal birth control se bahar aana hai. aur goli ko rokna is baat ki zamanat nahi deta ke aap ki mahvari wapas aajay gi. dar haqeeqat, khoraak aur tarz zindagi mein tabdeelion ke zariye tawajah markooz kiye baghair, bohat si khawateen jo goli chodthee hain inhen mahino ya saloon tak dobarah khoon nahi aana shuru hota hai. kuch Maroof ," darsi kitaab" wajohaat hain jin ki wajah se mahvari gayab ho jati hai, jaisay hamal, doodh pilana, aur rajonoortimenopause .  bohat ziyada werzish mein bhi mashgool hai. jaisa ke aap jantay hon ge ke kisi bhi cheez ka bohat ziyada istemaal kabhi sehat mand nahi hota. bohat ziyada werzish hormonal Adam tawazun ka baais ban sakti hai, lehaza bohat kam khana kha sakta hai .

context/2: sugar sab se ziyada ishtial angaiz ghzaon mein se aik hai jisay aap kha satke hain  aur ziyada soozishinflammation ka matlab hai ziyada pms. jab aap pms par qaboo panay ki koshish kar rahay hon to sugar ko kam karna zaroori hai .
context/3: mujhe meethi cheeze khana pasand hai, kya yeh mere PMS mein hissa dalta hai ?
context/4: mahireen ka khayaal hai ke PMS har mah jinsi hormones mein cyclical tabdeelion se  juzwi tor par  shuru hota hai. mahana hormone ki tabdeelian aam aur mutawaqqa hain. woh hotay hain! lekin is maslay ki jarr is waqt hoti hai jab hamaray paas estrogen aur progestrone hamari zaroorat se ziyada ya kam ho. jab hamara jism is harmonal tor par ghair mutawazan mahol mein 28 din ke hormone cycle se guzarta hai, isi waqt hamein alamaat ka saamna karna parta hai. agar aap khoraak aur tarz zindagi ke sath bunyadi hormone ke Adam tawazun ko dur karte hain, to aap premenstrual syndrome ki alamaat ko mita satke hain. mahireen ka yeh bhi maanna hai ke PMS ki alamaat mein ghizaiyat ki kami aik kirdaar ada karti hai. tehqeeq ne vitamin d, calcium, aur magnesium ki kam satah aur pms alamaat ke darmiyan talluq zahir kya hai .
context/5: Pre Menstrual syndrome ki kya wajah hai ?

response: hum aik aisay muashray mein rehtay hain jo hamesha masroof rehne ko bohat ahmiyat deta hai. agar aap kisi se puchhte hain ke woh kaisay kar rahay hain ya naya kya hai aur woh jawab dete hain," mein bohat masroof hon ", to yeh aksar itna hi fakhr ka maqam lagta hai jitna ke yeh shikayat karta hai. lekin hamein tanao par apna muaqqaf tabdeel karne ki zaroorat hai. tehqeeq se pata chalta hai ke hamaray samjhay jane walay tanao ki satah jitni ziyada hogi, hamara pms itna hi kharab hoga  aur yeh ke tanao ko kam karne ki technique pms ko kam karne ke liye muaser ghair dwasazi ki madaghalatien ho sakti hain. is liye apni yoga chitaai ko pakren, bahar jayen aur fitrat se ghiri hui kuch gehri sansen len, ya tafrehi sar garmion ke liye ziyada waqt nikalen jo aap ko sukoon bakhshti hai .

response: soozishinflammation chot ya tanao ke liye aik nizaam bhar mein radeamal hai, aur yeh maholiyati awamil ki aik barri tadaad ke zariye laya ja sakta hai ghair sehat bakhash ghazayein khanay aur zahreeley sehat aur jismani nighdasht ki masnoaat ke istemaal ke liye bohat ziyada baithy rehne se. prostaglandins hormone numa maday hain jo jism ke sozishi radeamal ko control karte hain aur mahireen ka khayaal hai ke woh pms ki bohat si alamaat ko mutharrak kar satke hain.  prostagladin ki ziyada pedawar isi wajah se kuch khawateen ko NSAIDs jaisay ibuprofen lainay se aaraam milta hai. NSAIDs prostagladins ki tarkeeb ko roktay hain.

response: haan, chupa huwa wazan un mein se aik hai. agarchay ziyada wazan PMS ke ziyada khatray se munsalik hai, lekin asal masla yeh hai ke aap andar se kitney' charbi' hain, jo is baat se zahir nahi hota ke aap ka wazan kitna hai. aap bahar se putlaay aur andar se ziyada wazni ho satke hain, ho sakta hai aap ka pms aap ko androoni motapay se nimatnay ke liye keh raha ho .  ho sakta hai ke aap apne cycle ke sath hum ahangiinsync mein nahi reh rahay hon. tehqeeq se pata chalta hai ke hamara 28 din ka mahvari hamaray dimaghi kaam, jazbaat, mood, hisi amal, bhook, aur yahan tak ke dard ke baray mein hamaray tasawwur ko bhi mutasir karta hai. agar aap 28 din ke cycle ke chaar marahil mein se har aik ke douran apne jism ki munfarid hormonal zaroriat ki himayat nahi kar rahay hain, to aap ko sehat mand, dard se pak adwaar nahi hon ge .

response: jee haan, yeh wohi hai jo mein yahan karne aayi hon, yani aap ke sawalaat ka jawab dainay ke liye. yeh aik mehfooz jagah hai aur aap apni mahvari ki sehat se mutaliq koi bhi sawal pooch satke hain .
context: mere paas ab bhi bohat saaray sawalaat hain, kya aap waqai jari rakhna chahtay hain ?
context/0: haan, chupa huwa wazan un mein se aik hai. agarchay ziyada wazan PMS ke ziyada khatray se munsalik hai, lekin asal masla yeh hai ke aap andar se kitney' charbi' hain, jo is baat se zahir nahi hota ke aap ka wazan kitna hai. aap bahar se putlaay aur andar se ziyada wazni ho satke hain, ho sakta hai aap ka pms aap ko androoni motapay se nimatnay ke liye keh raha ho .  ho sakta hai ke aap apne cycle ke sath hum ahangiinsync mein nahi reh rahay hon. tehqeeq se pata chalta hai ke hamara 28 din ka mahvari hamaray dimaghi kaam, jazbaat, mood, hisi amal, bhook, aur yahan tak ke dard ke baray mein hamaray tasawwur ko bhi mutasir karta hai. agar aap 28 din ke cycle ke chaar marahil mein se har aik ke douran apne jism ki munfarid hormonal zaroriat ki himayat nahi kar rahay hain, to aap ko sehat mand, dard se pak adwaar nahi hon ge .
context/1: kya koi aur cheez hai jo mere PMS ko kharab karne mein Muawin hai ?
context/2: soozishinflammation chot ya tanao ke liye aik nizaam bhar mein radeamal hai, aur yeh maholiyati awamil ki aik barri tadaad ke zariye laya ja sakta hai ghair sehat bakhash ghazayein khanay aur zahreeley sehat aur jismani nighdasht ki masnoaat ke istemaal ke liye bohat ziyada baithy rehne se. prostaglandins hormone numa maday hain jo jism ke sozishi radeamal ko control karte hain aur mahireen ka khayaal hai ke woh pms ki bohat si alamaat ko mutharrak kar satke hain.  prostagladin ki ziyada pedawar isi wajah se kuch khawateen ko NSAIDs jaisay ibuprofen lainay se aaraam milta hai. NSAIDs prostagladins ki tarkeeb ko roktay hain.
context/3: kya mujhe soozishinflammation ke baray mein fikar karne ki zaroorat hai jo mere PMS ko mazeed kharab karti hai ?
context/4: tambaku noshi majmoi sehat ke liye nuqsaan da hai, yaqeenan hormone tawazun samait. tambaku noshi karne wali khawateen mein pms honay ka imkaan dugna hota hai. bas cigrette ko nah kahain.

response: PMS ko shikast dene keliye apne mahool ko tarteeb dene ka tareeqa ye hai. kam soozish wali ghizaen khayen, jaisay masloob sabzian, churaye hue pastured anday aur churaye hue pastured janwaron ke protein, aur giri daar meway aur beej nuts aur seeds. cheeni ki miqdaar ko kam karen jo aap khatay hain. aanar aur choti tail wali machhli khayen jis mein soozishinflammation se larnay walay omega 3 fatty acids ki aala satah hoti hai. jab bhi mumkin ho namiati aur saaf khayen. coffee chore do. agar aap werzish nahi karte hain, ziyada sugar wali ghiza khayen aur  ya aap ki plate mein kaafi ghizaiyat se bharpoor sabzian nahi hain, to aap ka wazan ziyada ya motapa ho sakta hai, jis ka PMS ke sath mazboot talluq hai. jab aap androoni tor par kya ho raha hai usay durust karna shuru karte hain, aap alamaat mein kami dekh satke hain. tibbi literature mein, aala satah ka tanao ziyada shadeed pms se munsalik hota hai, inhen kam rakhnay ki koshish karen .

response: jee haan! tamam bio hacks sirf aap ko haasil hon ge agar aap apne cycle ke mutabiq zindagi guzaarna shuru nahi karte hain. aap ke 28 din ke chakkar ke har hafta taweel marhalay ke liye khana aur werzish karna behtar mehsoos karne aur alamaat se pak mahvari ki bunyaad hai. bohat lambay arsay se, hum din raat isi terhan zindagi guzaar rahay hain. yeh mardon ke liye kaam karta hai, lekin aurton ke liye nahi. apne cycle ko hum aahang karne se nah sirf aap ki mahvari ke masail hal hon ge, balkay is se aap ko zindagi mein mazeed khushi, tawanai aur kamyabi haasil karne mein madad miley gi. seedhay alfaaz mein, aap ke 28 din ke chakkar ka khayaal rakhna itna hi ahem hai jitna aap ke 24 ghantay ke carcadian cycle ka khayaal rakhna .

response: chanay magnesium ka aik bara zareya hai. un mein vitamin B6 bhi hota hai . kelay, broccoli, gobhi, aur deegar gehray pattoun wali sabzian. un sab mein indole3 carbinol hota hai, jo jigar ko izafi estrogen ko metabolize karne aur estrogen ke ghalbay ko roknay mein madad karta hai  jo ke aik aam hormone ka Adam tawazun hai jo PMS samait kayi terhan ke masail ko janam deta hai  .  nariyal ka dahi mein zindah saqaftlive cultures ki shakal mein probiotics hotay hain  jo anton ko estrogen ko metabolize karne aur hormones ko mutawazan rakhnay mein madad karta hai   meethay aalo qudrati tor par meethay hotay hain aur aap ki meethi khwahisaat ko poora karne mein madad kar satke hain. meethay aalo mein mojood vitamin A jigar ki madad karta hai kyunkay yeh izafi estrogen ko metabolize karta hai  hadion ka shorba magnesium aur calcium ka aik acha zareya ho sakta hai, yeh dono pms ki alamaat ko kam karne mein madad kar satke hain .

response: aur agar mein pms ko rokna chahti hon lekin mein dawaein istemaal nahi karna chahti to kya ye mumkin hai? kya koi qudrati supplements hain ?
context: chanay magnesium ka aik bara zareya hai. un mein vitamin B6 bhi hota hai . kelay, broccoli, gobhi, aur deegar gehray pattoun wali sabzian. un sab mein indole3 carbinol hota hai, jo jigar ko izafi estrogen ko metabolize karne aur estrogen ke ghalbay ko roknay mein madad karta hai  jo ke aik aam hormone ka Adam tawazun hai jo PMS samait kayi terhan ke masail ko janam deta hai  .  nariyal ka dahi mein zindah saqaftlive cultures ki shakal mein probiotics hotay hain  jo anton ko estrogen ko metabolize karne aur hormones ko mutawazan rakhnay mein madad karta hai   meethay aalo qudrati tor par meethay hotay hain aur aap ki meethi khwahisaat ko poora karne mein madad kar satke hain. meethay aalo mein mojood vitamin A jigar ki madad karta hai kyunkay yeh izafi estrogen ko metabolize karta hai  hadion ka shorba magnesium aur calcium ka aik acha zareya ho sakta hai, yeh dono pms ki alamaat ko kam karne mein madad kar satke hain .
context/0: mein jaanti hon ke PMS mojood hai lekin mein janna chahti hon ke woh kon si ghazayein hain jinhein khana acha samjha jata hai ?
context/1: jee haan! tamam bio hacks sirf aap ko haasil hon ge agar aap apne cycle ke mutabiq zindagi guzaarna shuru nahi karte hain. aap ke 28 din ke chakkar ke har hafta taweel marhalay ke liye khana aur werzish karna behtar mehsoos karne aur alamaat se pak mahvari ki bunyaad hai. bohat lambay arsay se, hum din raat isi terhan zindagi guzaar rahay hain. yeh mardon ke liye kaam karta hai, lekin aurton ke liye nahi. apne cycle ko hum aahang karne se nah sirf aap ki mahvari ke masail hal hon ge, balkay is se aap ko zindagi mein mazeed khushi, tawanai aur kamyabi haasil karne mein madad miley gi. seedhay alfaaz mein, aap ke 28 din ke chakkar ka khayaal rakhna itna hi ahem hai jitna aap ke 24 ghantay ke carcadian cycle ka khayaal rakhna .
context/2: aap ke cycle ke sath mutabqat pazeeri kya ahem hai ?
context/3: PMS ko shikast dene keliye apne mahool ko tarteeb dene ka tareeqa ye hai. kam soozish wali ghizaen khayen, jaisay masloob sabzian, churaye hue pastured anday aur churaye hue pastured janwaron ke protein, aur giri daar meway aur beej nuts aur seeds. cheeni ki miqdaar ko kam karen jo aap khatay hain. aanar aur choti tail wali machhli khayen jis mein soozishinflammation se larnay walay omega 3 fatty acids ki aala satah hoti hai. jab bhi mumkin ho namiati aur saaf khayen. coffee chore do. agar aap werzish nahi karte hain, ziyada sugar wali ghiza khayen aur  ya aap ki plate mein kaafi ghizaiyat se bharpoor sabzian nahi hain, to aap ka wazan ziyada ya motapa ho sakta hai, jis ka PMS ke sath mazboot talluq hai. jab aap androoni tor par kya ho raha hai usay durust karna shuru karte hain, aap alamaat mein kami dekh satke hain. tibbi literature mein, aala satah ka tanao ziyada shadeed pms se munsalik hota hai, inhen kam rakhnay ki koshish karen .
context/4: mein pms se guzarna nahi chahti, barah karam mujhe batayen ke aik baar aur hamesha ke liye un se chhutkara kaise haasil kar lon .
context/5: jee haan, yeh wohi hai jo mein yahan karne aayi hon, yani aap ke sawalaat ka jawab dainay ke liye. yeh aik mehfooz jagah hai aur aap apni mahvari ki sehat se mutaliq koi bhi sawal pooch satke hain .

response: jee haan. tehqeeq se pata chalta hai ke magnesium pms ki alamaat ko kam karne mein madad karta hai, Bashmole wazan mein izafah, chhaati ki narmi, aur apharabloating. omega 3 fatty acid aur vitamin d3 hormone ke tawazun ko farogh dainay mein madad karte hain. tehqeeq ke mutabiq vitamin E mahvari se pehlay chhaati ki narmi ko kam karne mein madad karta hai. jese vitamin b6 karta hai!  alpha Lipoic acid ala jigar ke liye taaqatwar anti oxidant support faraham karta hai kyunkay yeh izafi estrogen ko metabolize karne ka kaam karta hai  yaad rakhen : progestrone ke muqablay mein bohat ziyada estrogen pms alamaat ko mutharrak kar sakta hai  aur blood sugar ko bhi support karta hai. calcium supplements ko luteal marhalay ke douran mood ke badlao mein madad karne mai saabit huwa hai.

context/4: jee haan. tehqeeq se pata chalta hai ke magnesium pms ki alamaat ko kam karne mein madad karta hai, Bashmole wazan mein izafah, chhaati ki narmi, aur apharabloating. omega 3 fatty acid aur vitamin d3 hormone ke tawazun ko farogh dainay mein madad karte hain. tehqeeq ke mutabiq vitamin E mahvari se pehlay chhaati ki narmi ko kam karne mein madad karta hai. jese vitamin b6 karta hai!  alpha Lipoic acid ala jigar ke liye taaqatwar anti oxidant support faraham karta hai kyunkay yeh izafi estrogen ko metabolize karne ka kaam karta hai  yaad rakhen : progestrone ke muqablay mein bohat ziyada estrogen pms alamaat ko mutharrak kar sakta hai  aur blood sugar ko bhi support karta hai. calcium supplements ko luteal marhalay ke douran mood ke badlao mein madad karne mai saabit huwa hai.
context/5: aur agar mein pms ko rokna chahti hon lekin mein dawaein istemaal nahi karna chahti to kya ye mumkin hai? kya koi qudrati supplements hain ?

response: mahvari jism mein hormones mein tabdeeli ki wajah se hoti hai. hormones keemiyai messenger hain. beza daani zanana hormone estrogen aur progesterone kharij karti hai. yeh hormones bacha daani  ya reham  ki parat ko bananay ka sabab bantay hain. blt up Aster fertilised anday ke sath jornay aur nashonuma shuru karne ke liye tayyar hai. agar koi khad shuda anda nah ho to Aster toot jati hai aur khoon behnay lagta hai. phir wohi amal baar baar hota hai .

response: jism mein hormones mein tabdeeli ki wajah se mahvari hoti hai. hormones keemiyai messenger hain. beza daani zanana hormone estrogen aur progesterone kharij karti hai. yeh hormones bacha daani  ya reham  ki parat ko bananay ka sabab bantay hain. blt up lining fertilizer anday ke sath munsalik honay aur nashonuma shuru karne ke liye tayyar hai. agar koi khad shuda anda nah ho to Aster toot jati hai aur khoon behnay lagta hai. phir wohi amal baar baar hota hai .

response: mahvari ke dard pait ke nichale hissay mein dharaktey dard hain. ziyada tar khawateen ko apni mahvari ke ibtidayi dinon se theek pehlay ya is ke douran dard ka saamna karna parta hai. mahvari ke dard  ko kam karne ke liye aap darj zail cheezon ko aazma sakte hain : apne pait ya kamar ke nichale hissay par heating pad rakhna, ya garam ghusal karna. dard aap ki mahvari ka aik khobsorat mayaari hissa hai. lekin agar aap ki mahvari ka dard itna takleef da hai ke aap roz marrah ki zindagi mein hissa nahi le sakte to barah karam apne doctor se rujoo karen .

response: ho sakta hai aap ko mahvari se pehlay ke syndrome ya pms ka saamna ho. PMS aurat ki mahvari se pehlay hi hota hai. pms mein darj zail alamaat hain jin mein chirchira pan aur mood mein tabdeelian shaamil hain. aap apni mahvari se aik hafta pehlay werzish karein, namkeen khaano ko chhorein, aur caffeine ko kam karein. agar aap ka mood ab bhi mushkil hai to apne doctor se baat karen. woh aap ko dawa lainay ka mashwara day sakte hain

PMS aurat ki mahvari se pehlay hi hota hai. pms mein darj zail alamaat hain jin mein chirchira pan aur mood mein tabdeelian shaamil hain. aap apni mahvari se aik hafta pehlay werzish karein, namkeen khaano ko chhorein, aur caffeine ko kam karein. agar aap ka mood ab bhi mushkil hai to apne doctor se baat karen. woh aap ko dawa lainay ka mashwara day sakte hain

response: mahvari ke dard  ko kam karne ke liye aap darj zail cheezon ko aazma sakte hain : apne pait ya kamar ke nichale hissay par heating pad rakhna, ya garam ghusal karna. dard aap ki mahvari ka aik khobsorat mayaari hissa hai. lekin agar aap ki mahvari ka dard itna takleef da hai ke aap roz marrah ki zindagi mein hissa nahi le sakte to barah karam apne doctor se rujoo karen .

response: aap ki mahvari be qaida hai agar yeh 21 din se ziyada kasrat se aati hai, ya aap mahvari ke darmiyan 35 din ya is se ziyada jatay hain. fasid periods ke liye aam tor par apne doctor se mahswara karne ki koi fori wajah nahi hoti. lekin agar aap fikar mand hain to barah karam aisa karen. agar aap ko maney hamalcontraception ki zaroorat ho to aap ka doctor aap ko hormonal maney hamalcontraception adwiyaat tajweez kar ke aap ki madad kar sakta hai jo nah sirf ghair iraadi hamal ko qabil aetmaad tareeqay se roktay hain balkay aap ke mahvari ko bhi mustahkam kar sakte hain taakay aap apne mahvari ke liye behtar mansoobah bandi kar saken .

response: mahvari ka khoon aam tor par 3 se 7 din ke darmiyan rehta hai, lekin mahvari ka poora daur 21 se 35 din tak jari reh sakta hai. mahvari ki lambai 1 shakhs se dosray shakhs mein aur aik hi shakhs mein mahinay se mahinay tak mukhtalif ho sakti hai .lehaza jab ke baaz khawateen ke liye mahvari ka khoon 7 din ya is se kam waqt mein khatam ho sakta hai, lekin mahvari ka poora daur aam tor par is se ziyada taweel hota hai. agar aap ko apne mahvari ke baray mein khadshaat hain, to apne doctor se baat karna hamesha acha khayaal hai

response: ho sakta hai aap ko mahvari se pehlay ke syndrome ya pms ka saamna ho. PMS aurat ki mahvari se pehlay hi hota hai. PMS mein darj zail alamaat hain jin mein chirchira pan, mood mein tabdeeli, aphaarabloating, dard, qabz, ishaal, mahasay, andaam nihanivagina se kharij honay wala madah, sir dard, khanay ki khwahish, mood mein tabdeeli, aur naram chhaati shaamil hain .

response: mahvari ke douran bohat ziyada khoon behnay ki wajah se dard naak doraniye ke dard ho sakte hain, jo aksar aap ko apni mahvari ke aas paas roz marrah ki zindagi mein hissa lainay par assar andaaz karta hai. ya woh kharish ya kisi aur bemari ki wajah se ho sakte hain. is takleef da haalat mein bacha daaniuterus ke andar mojood khaliyaat ya tissue bacha daaniuterus ke bahar barhatay hain. aap ko apne doctor se milna chahiye jo khoon ki jaanch kar sakta hai aur aap ki history haasil kar sakta hai taakay aap ko behtar honay mein madad miley. kuch hormonal maney hamalcontraception khawateen ya larkiyon ke liye registered hain jin ko mahvari mein shadeed dard hota hai .

context/1: mahvari ke douran bohat ziyada khoon behnay ki wajah se dard naak doraniye ke dard ho sakte hain, jo aksar aap ko apni mahvari ke aas paas roz marrah ki zindagi mein hissa lainay par assar andaaz karta hai. ya woh kharish ya kisi aur bemari ki wajah se ho sakte hain. is takleef da haalat mein bacha daaniuterus ke andar mojood khaliyaat ya tissue bacha daaniuterus ke bahar barhatay hain. aap ko apne doctor se milna chahiye jo khoon ki jaanch kar sakta hai aur aap ki history haasil kar sakta hai taakay aap ko behtar honay mein madad miley. kuch hormonal maney hamalcontraception khawateen ya larkiyon ke liye registered hain jin ko mahvari mein shadeed dard hota hai .

response: tampon aik mahvari ki masnoaat hai jo haiz ke douran andaam nihanivagina mein daakhil karkay khoon aur andaam nihanivagina ki  ko jazb karne ke liye design ki gayi hai. pad ke bar aks, yeh andaam nihanivagina ki naali ke andar andar rakha jata hai. aik baar sahih tareeqay se daakhil karne ke baad, aik tampon andaam nihanivagina ke zareya apni jagah par rakha jaye ga aur phialta hai kyunkay yeh mahvari ke khoon ko jazb karta hai .

response: kapray ke pad is waqt tak istemaal mein mehfooz reh sakte hain jab tak ke woh hifzaan sehat ke mutabiq istemaal hon. kapray ke pads ko achi terhan se dhona chahiye, Sooraj ki roshni mein khushk karna chahiye, aur khushk aur jaraseem se pak jaghon par rakhna chahiye. yaad rakhen, jab mahvari aur zaati hifzaan sehat par amal nahi kya jata hai, to yeh infection ka baais ban sakta hai. lehaza ahthyat karo .

context/3: mein kon si doosri masnoaat istemaal kar sakta hon ?
context/4: mahvari woh hissa hota hai jab aurat ki andaam nihanivagina se kuch dinon tak khoon aata hai. ziyada tar khawateen ke liye yeh har 28 din mein hota hai. lekin mahvari ke 21 win din se le kar 40 win din tak is se ziyada ya kam baar baar hona aik aam baat hai .

response: mujhe dard kyun aata hai ?
context: jee haan! bilaa jhijhak mujh se apne sawalaat poucheen .
context/0: kya mein aap se mahvari ke baray mein mazeed sawalaat pooch sakta hon ?
context/1: kapray ke pad is waqt tak istemaal mein mehfooz reh sakte hain jab tak ke woh hifzaan sehat ke mutabiq istemaal hon. kapray ke pads ko achi terhan se dhona chahiye, Sooraj ki roshni mein khushk karna chahiye, aur khushk aur jaraseem se pak jaghon par rakhna chahiye. yaad rakhen, jab mahvari aur zaati hifzaan sehat par amal nahi kya jata hai, to yeh infection ka baais ban sakta hai. lehaza ahthyat karo .

response: dard ki aik aam wajah premenstrual syndrome ya pms mukhtsiran hai. PMS aurat ki mahvari se pehlay hi hota hai. yeh alamaat cycle ki hormonal tabdeelion ki wajah se hoti hain. PMS mein darj zail alamaat hain jin mein chirchira pan, mood mein tabdeeli, aphaarabloating, dard, qabz, ishaal, mahasay, andaam nihanivagina se kharij honay wala madah, sir dard, khanay ki khwahish, mood mein tabdeeli, aur naram chhaati shaamil hain .

response: tampon aik mahvari ki masnoaat hai jo haiz ke douran andaam nihanivagina mein daakhil karkay khoon aur andaam nihanivagina ki ratubaton ko jazb karne ke liye design ki gayi hai. pad ke bar aks, yeh andaam nihanivagina ki naali ke andar andar rakha jata hai. aik baar sahih tareeqay se daakhil karne ke baad, andaam nihanivagina ke zareya aik tampon ko jagah par rakha jata hai aur yeh mahvari ke khoon ko jazb karne ke sath phialta hai .

response: jism mein hormones mein tabdeeli ki wajah se mahvari hoti hai. hormones keemiyai messenger hain. beza daani zanana hormone estrogen aur progesterone kharij karti hai. yeh hormones bacha daaniuterus  ya reham  ki parat ko bananay ka sabab bantay hain. blt up asterlining fertilised anday ke sath jornay aur nashonuma shuru karne ke liye tayyar hai. agar khad nah ho to asterlining toot jati hai aur khoon behnay lagta hai. phir wohi amal baar baar hota hai .

response: jism mein hormones mein tabdeeli ki wajah se mahvari hoti hai. hormones keemiyai messenger hain. beza daani zanana hormone estrogen aur progestrone kharij karti hai. yeh hormones bacha daaniuterus  ya reham  ki parat ko bananay ka sabab bantay hain. built up lining fertilized anday ke sath jornay aur nashonuma shuru karne ke liye tayyar hai. agar koi khad shuda anda nah ho to lining toot jati hai aur khoon behnay lagta hai. phir wohi amal baar baar hota hai .

response: mujhe nahi maloom ke mahvari honay par kya karoon
context: jism mein hormones mein tabdeeli ki wajah se mahvari hoti hai. hormones keemiyai messenger hain. beza daani zanana hormone estrogen aur progestrone kharij karti hai. yeh hormones bacha daaniuterus  ya reham  ki parat ko bananay ka sabab bantay hain. built up lining fertilized anday ke sath jornay aur nashonuma shuru karne ke liye tayyar hai. agar koi khad shuda anda nah ho to lining toot jati hai aur khoon behnay lagta hai. phir wohi amal baar baar hota hai .

response: fasid haiz ke liye aam tor par apne doctor se mahswara karne ki koi fori wajah nahi hoti. lekin agar aap fikar mand hain to barah karam aisa karen. agar aap ko maney hamalcontraception ki zaroorat ho to aap ka doctor aap ko hormonal maney hamalcontraception adwiyaat tajweez kar ke aap ki madad kar sakta hai jo nah sirf ghair iraadi hamal ko qabil aetmaad tareeqay se roktay hain balkay aap ke mahvari ko bhi mustahkam kar sakte hain taakay aap apne mahvari ke liye behtar mansoobah bandi kar saken .

response: haiz, jisay period bhi kaha jata hai, mahvari ka hissa hai jab aurat ki andaam nihanivagina se kuch dinon tak khoon aata hai. ziyada tar khawateen ke liye yeh har 28 din mein hota hai. lekin mahvari ke 21 win din se le kar 40 win din ke douran mahvari ka is se kam ya ziyada hona aik aam baat hai .
