context/1: haiz, jisay period bhi kaha jata hai, mahvari ka hissa hai jab aurat ki andaam nihanivagina se kuch dinon tak khoon aata hai. ziyada tar khawateen ke liye yeh har 28 din mein hota hai. lekin mahvari ke 21 win din se le kar 40 win din ke douran mahvari ka is se kam ya ziyada hona aik aam baat hai .
context/2: haiz kya hai ?
context/3: fasid haiz ke liye aam tor par apne doctor se mahswara karne ki koi fori wajah nahi hoti. lekin agar aap fikar mand hain to barah karam aisa karen. agar aap ko maney hamalcontraception ki zaroorat ho to aap ka doctor aap ko hormonal maney hamalcontraception adwiyaat tajweez kar ke aap ki madad kar sakta hai jo nah sirf ghair iraadi hamal ko qabil aetmaad tareeqay se roktay hain balkay aap ke mahvari ko bhi mustahkam kar sakte hain taakay aap apne mahvari ke liye behtar mansoobah bandi kar saken .
context/4: agar mera mahvari be qaida ho to kya karoon ?
context/5: beza daani zanana hormone estrogen aur progestrone kharij karti hai. yeh hormones bacha daaniuterus  ya reham  ki parat ko bananay ka sabab bantay hain. built up lining fertilized  anday ke sath jornay aur nashonuma shuru karne ke liye tayyar hai. agar koi khad shuda anda nah ho to lining toot jati hai aur khoon behnay lagta hai. phir wohi amal baar baar hota hai .

response: agar aap ke mahvari ko mutasir karne wali koi maloom haalat nahi hai aur aap ko baqaidagi se mahvari aati hai, to aap ki mahvari aap ke aam cycle ke lehaaz se, aap ki aakhri mahvari ke 21 se 35 dinon ke andar shuru honi chahiye. agar kayi din guzar chuke hain aur aap ko abhi bhi mahvari nahi hui hai, to is baat ka imkaan ho sakta hai ke aap haamla hon. hamal test karwaen aur doctor se mahswara karen .

response: aap ki mahvari ke douran waqtan foqatan kuch jhuriyan nazar aana bilkul mamool ki baat hai. yeh khoon ke jamnay hain jin mein tissue shaamil ho sakte hain. jaisa ke bacha daaniuterus apni asterlining ko bahati hai, yeh tissue jism ko mahvari ke aik qudrati hissay ke tor par chor deta hai. lehaza tissue ke jamnay aam tor par fikar mand honay ki koi cheez nahi hai .

context: aap ki mahvari ke douran waqtan foqatan kuch jhuriyan nazar aana bilkul mamool ki baat hai. yeh khoon ke jamnay hain jin mein tissue shaamil ho sakte hain. jaisa ke bacha daaniuterus apni asterlining ko bahati hai, yeh tissue jism ko mahvari ke aik qudrati hissay ke tor par chor deta hai. lehaza tissue ke jamnay aam tor par fikar mand honay ki koi cheez nahi hai .

response: mahvari ke dard pait ke nichale hissay mein dharaktey hain. ziyada tar khawateen ko apni mahvari ke ibtidayi dinon se theek pehlay ya is ke douran dard ka saamna karna parta hai. mahvari ke dard aur dard ko kam karne ke liye aap darj zail cheezon ko aazma sakte hain : apne pait ya kamar ke nichale hissay par heating pad rakhna, ya garam ghusal karna. dard aap ki mahvari ka aik khobsorat mayaari hissa hai. lekin agar aap ki mahvari ka dard itna takleef da hai ke aap roz marrah ki zindagi mein hissa nahi le sakte to barah karam apne doctor se rujoo karen .
context: aap batayen ke mujhe pehlay din hi dard kyun hota hai aur baqi din normal kyun rehta hain .

response: hum periods ke ibtidayi dinon mein dard kyun mehsoos karte hain .
context: mahvari ke douran bohat ziyada khoon behnay ki wajah se dard ho satka hai, roz marrah ki zindagi mein hissa lainay par assar andaaz bhi hota hai. ya woh endometriosis ki wajah se ho saktay hain. is takleef da haalat mein bacha daaniuterus ke andar mojood khaliyaattissue bacha daaniuterus ke bahar barhatay hain. aap ko apne doctor se milna chahiye jo khoon ki jaanch kar sakta hai aur aap ki history haasil kar sakta hai taakay aap ko behtar honay mein madad miley.
context/0: mahvari mein itni takleef kyun hoti hai .
context/1: 3 se 8 din ke darmiyan mahvari ka hona mamool ki baat hai .
context/2: agar meri mahvari 3 din tak rehti hai to kya yeh aam hai ?
context/3: mahvari ke dard pait ke nichale hissay mein dharaktey hain. ziyada tar khawateen ko apni mahvari ke ibtidayi dinon se theek pehlay ya is ke douran dard ka saamna karna parta hai. mahvari ke dard aur dard ko kam karne ke liye aap darj zail cheezon ko aazma sakte hain : apne pait ya kamar ke nichale hissay par heating pad rakhna, ya garam ghusal karna. dard aap ki mahvari ka aik khobsorat mayaari hissa hai. lekin agar aap ki mahvari ka dard itna takleef da hai ke aap roz marrah ki zindagi mein hissa nahi le sakte to barah karam apne doctor se rujoo karen .
context/4: aap batayen ke mujhe pehlay din hi dard kyun hota hai aur baqi din normal kyun rehta hain .

response: jee haan, aap ki mahvari mein tabdeeli mehsoos karna bilkul mamool ki baat hai. kuch mahino mein, aap ka mahvari pichlle mahinay ki nisbat ziyada ya kam dinon tak jari reh sakta hai. ya aap ka cycle pehlay se pehlay ya baad mein shuru ho sakta hai. agar aap ke paas aam tor par baqaida cycle hai, to tabdeeli tibbi haalat ki nishandahi kar sakti hai. kisi bhi tashweesh ki soorat mein, barah karam infiradi tibbi mahswara haasil karne ke liye apne doctor se baat karen .

response: bohat se log der se mahvari ka tajurbah karte hain. woh hamal ke ilawa bohat si wajohaat ki bana par hotay hain. aam wajohaat hormonal Adam tawazun se le kar sangeen tibbi halaat tak hosakti hain. do baar aisay bhi hotay hain jab aap ki mahvari ka be qaida hona aam hota hai : jab yeh pehli baar shuru hota hai, aur jab rajunoortimenopause ki muntaqili shuru hoti hai .

context/1: Jee haan! Lekin yeh zaroori hai ke munasib hifzaan sehat ko yakeeni bananay ke liye aap 4 se 8 ghantay ke istemaal ke baad apna pad tabdeel karen .
context/2: kya hum pehle 2 din mein pad istemaal kar saktay hain ?
context/3: kya haal hai? aaj aap kaisi hain?
context/4: hello
context/5: bohat se log der se mahvari ka tajurbah karte hain. woh hamal ke ilawa bohat si wajohaat ki bana par hotay hain. aam wajohaat hormonal Adam tawazun se le kar sangeen tibbi halaat tak hosakti hain. do baar aisay bhi hotay hain jab aap ki mahvari ka be qaida hona aam hota hai : jab yeh pehli baar shuru hota hai, aur jab rajunoortimenopause ki muntaqili shuru hoti hai .

response: aap ki mahvari be qaida hai agar yeh 21 din se ziyada kasrat se aati hai, ya aap mahvari ke darmiyan 35 din ya is se ziyada jatay hain. Agar aisa na bhi ho toh aam tor par apne doctor se mahswara karne ki koi fori wajah nahi hoti. lekin agar aap fikar mand hain to barah karam aisa karen. agar aap ko maney hamalcontraception ki zaroorat ho to aap ka doctor aap ko hormonal maney hamalcontraception adwiyaat tajweez kar ke aap ki madad kar sakta hai jo nah sirf ghair iraadi hamal ko qabil aetmaad tareeqay se roktay hain balkay aap ke mahvari ko bhi mustahkam kar sakte hain taakay aap apne mahvari ke liye behtar mansoobah bandi kar saken. baaz auqaat be qaida mahvari kuch adwiyaat ki wajah se hosakti hai, bohat ziyada werzish karna, bohat kam jismani wazan, bohat ziyada jismani wazan, hormonal Adam tawazun jaisay ke  hormone ki satah ki ghayrmaa'mooli bhi be qaidgi ka sabab ban sakti hai. sahih tashkhees ke liye apne doctor se rujoo karen .

response: yaqeen rakhen, covid vaccine aap ke mahvari ko tabdeel nahi karti hain ya aap ke mamool se ziyada dard ka baais nahi banti hain. munh pe daane ya acne mahvari ki aik alamat hai aur kuch khawateen un ka tajurbah apni mahvari ke aaghaz mein karti hain. agar aap ki mahvari takleef da hai to chand minute ke liye apni kamar par garam kapra rakh kar dard ko dur karne ki koshish karen. haiz mein takheer hamal ki alamat ho sakti hai, apne aglay iqdamaat ke liye doctor se mahswara karen .

response: aisa ho sakta hai. mahvari mein utaar charhao aata hai jab woh pehli baar shuru hotay hain. agar aap kuch saalon se haiz horaha hai, to yeh aam tor par har aik cycle ki lambai aur hajam ke barabar hona chahiye. aap ab bhi waqtan foqatan tabdeelian mehsoos kar satke hain, jaisay aap ke hormones ke lehaaz se aap ki haiz ka wazan aur Tawalat jo utaar charhao ka shikaar ho sakti hai. tanao, khoraak, ya emergency goli lainay jaisi cheezon ki wajah se hormones earzi tor par tabdeel ho satke hain. agar aap har daur mein bezaovulate nahi karte hain to aap ke doraniye mein bhi tagayuraat hon ge  aap ko aik period chhuut sakta hai, ya mamool se baad mein aata hai, ya aap ke mamool se ziyada halka aur chhota ho sakta hai. har chakkar ke douran bezaovulation nah hona jawani aur perimenopause ke douran aam hai, aur yeh earzi tor par ghair haazri aur mahvari ke bhaari honay ki aik aam wajah hai .

response: scienci lehaaz se aap ka ya aap ka haiz ka khoon napak nahi hai. jab tak kisi aurat ko khoon se peda honay wali bemari nah ho, mahvari ka ratobat be zarrar hai. mahvari ke douran koi zahreela mawaad kharij nahi hota hai, kyunkay yeh aik asterlining hai jo bachay ki parwarish ke liye itna saaf hai aur saaf hona chahiye. mahvari ka seyal aam khoon se ziyada khatarnaak nahi hai. aap ke aaza jism mein bohat si ratobatein kharij karte hain, aur aap ke poooray jism ke andar bhi khoon hota hai. agar yeh zahreela ya nuqsaan da hota to aap zindah nah hotay !

response: aap ke mahvari se pehlay kharab mood ya mood mein tabdeeli pre menstrual syndrome  pms  ka hissa ho sakti hai. mahvari se pehlay aur is ke douran bemaar mehsoos karna mamool ki baat hai. jaisay jaisay larki ke mahvari ke douran hormone ki satah barhti aur girty hai, yeh jismani aur jazbati tor par is ke mehsoos karne ke andaaz ko mutasir kar sakti hai. kya aap janna chahtay hain ke pms kya hai ?

context/1: scienci lehaaz se aap ka ya aap ka haiz ka khoon napak nahi hai. jab tak kisi aurat ko khoon se peda honay wali bemari nah ho, mahvari ka ratobat be zarrar hai. mahvari ke douran koi zahreela mawaad kharij nahi hota hai, kyunkay yeh aik asterlining hai jo bachay ki parwarish ke liye itna saaf hai aur saaf hona chahiye. mahvari ka seyal aam khoon se ziyada khatarnaak nahi hai. aap ke aaza jism mein bohat si ratobatein kharij karte hain, aur aap ke poooray jism ke andar bhi khoon hota hai. agar yeh zahreela ya nuqsaan da hota to aap zindah nah hotay !
context/2: agar aap mahvari par hain to kya aap najas hain ?
context/3: aap ki mahvari ke baad, khoon behna aahista aahista kam ho sakta hai. aap ko toilet paper par thora sa khoon nazar aa sakta hai jisay aap maseh karne ke liye istemaal karte hain, ya aap dekh sakte hain ke din bhar aap ke zair jama par daagh jama hotay hain. yeh sab aam samjha jata hai .
context/4: jee haan
context/5: kya aap spotting ka hawala day rahay hain ?

response: mahireen ka khayaal hai ke PMS har mah jinsi hormones mein cyclical tabdeelion se  juzwi tor par  shuru hota hai. mahana hormone ki tabdeelian aam aur mutawaqqa hain. woh hotay hain! lekin is maslay ki jarr is waqt hoti hai jab hamaray paas estrogen aur progesrone hamari zaroorat se ziyada ya kam ho. jab hamara jism is hormonal tor par ghair mutawazan mahol mein 28 din ke hormone cycle se guzarta hai, isi waqt hamein alamaat ka saamna karna parta hai. agar aap khoraak aur tarz zindagi ke sath bunyadi hormone ke Adam tawazun ko dur karte hain, to aap Pre Menstrual Syndrome ki alamaat ko mita satke hain. mahireen ka yeh bhi maanna hai ke PMS ki alamaat mein ghizaiyat ki kami aik kirdaar ada karti hai. tehqeeq ne vitamin d, calcium, aur magnesium ki kam satah aur pms alamaat ke darmiyan talluq zahir kya hai .

response: mahvari chhotna ya der se aana hamal ke ilawa bohat si wajohaat se hota hai. aam wajohaat hormonal Adam tawazun se le kar sangeen tibbi halaat tak ho sakti hain. do baar aisay bhi hotay hain jab aap ki mahvari ka be qaida hona aam hota hai : jab yeh pehli baar shuru hota hai, aur jab rajonoortimenopause ki muntaqili shuru hoti hai .

context/1: ziyada tar larkiyan 12 saal ki Umar mein apne mahvari ka aaghaz karti hain, lekin woh 8 saal ki Umar mein shuru ho sakti hain, is liye yeh yakeeni bananay ke liye ke woh tayyar hain, choti Umar se hi larkiyon se baat karna zaroori hai .
context/2: sab se ibtidayi Umar kya hai jis mein mein apni mahvari haasil karsakti hon .
context/3: mahvari chhotna ya der se aana hamal ke ilawa bohat si wajohaat se hota hai. aam wajohaat hormonal Adam tawazun se le kar sangeen tibbi halaat tak ho sakti hain. do baar aisay bhi hotay hain jab aap ki mahvari ka be qaida hona aam hota hai : jab yeh pehli baar shuru hota hai, aur jab rajonoortimenopause ki muntaqili shuru hoti hai .
context/4: kya mere mahvari ka aik do din takheer se aana mamool hai ?
context/5: hamal ke pehlay 12 hafton ke douran, andaam Nihani se khoon behna isqaat hamal ya ectopic hamal ki alamat ho sakta hai. taham, agar aap ko hamal ke is marhalay par khoon aata hai to is ka imkaan hai ke aap ka mamool aur kamyaab hamal ho jaye ga .

response: ziyada tar khawateen ke liye, dard aur apharabloating is" dost" ki makhsoos alamaat hain jo mahana dora karta hai. lekin jab dard bohat ziyada ho aur bohat ziyada khoon behnay, bukhaar ke sath jor diya jaye, ya achanak is se badter mehsoos ho jis ka pehlay tajurbah kya gaya hai, to yeh apne dr se milnay ka waqt hai. agar aap ko bohat takleef da mahvari ke dard hain jo do ya teen din se ziyada arsay tak rehtay hain, to apne doctor se mulaqaat karen .
context: dard ke liye mujhe kab dr se milna chahiye .

response: dard aik madham dard ya taiz aur achanak maror ho sakta hai. yeh aam tor par aap ke pait ke baen ya dayen taraf hota hai is par munhasir hota hai ke beza daani anda jari kar rahi hai. yeh sirf chand minute tak chal sakta hai ya aik ya 2 din tak jari reh sakta hai. kuch khawateen ko andaam Nihanivagina se thora sa khoon behnay ka ehsas hota hai .

response: woh Umar jis mein kisi ko mahvari aana band ho jati hai usay rajunoortimenopause kaha jata hai. rajunoortimenopause ki tareef is waqt hoti hai jab kisi shakhs ko lagataar 12 mah tak mahvari nah aati ho. Pakistan mein rajunoortimenopause ki ost Umar 51 saal ke lag bhag hai, lekin yeh 40 se 58 saal ki Umar ke darmiyan kisi bhi waqt ho sakti hai. taham, baaz tibbi halaat, surgery, ya ilaaj jaisay kimothrapi ya taabkari ki wajah se bhi rajunoortimenopause pehlay ho sakti hai .

response: haan, 30 saal ki Umar ko aam tor par rajunoortimenopause ke liye bohat jaldi samjha jata hai. 40 saal ki Umar se pehlay rajunoortimenopause ko qabal az waqt rajunoortimenopause ya premature ovarian insufficiency   poi  kaha jata hai. qabal az waqt rajunoortimenopause ki kayi mumkina wajohaat hain, jin mein jeneati awamil, khud car qowat mudafat ki kharabi, baaz tibbi ilaaj, aur kuch qisam ki surgery shaamil hain. agar aap rajunoortimenopause ki alamaat ka saamna kar rahay hain aur un ke waqt ya shiddat ke baray mein fikar mand hain, to yeh zaroori hai ke aap apne doctor se baat karen .

response: mahvari ke douran kharish chand mukhtalif awamil ki wajah se ho sakti hai :baaz auqaat pad mein mojood chemical ya pad aur jald ke darmiyan ragar ki wajah se jalan ya kharish ka baais ban satke hain. agar aap kharish ka saamna kar rahay hain to, mukhtalif brand ya pad ki qisam par switch karne ki koshish karen .khameer ka infection : aap ke mahvari ke douran hormonal tabdeelian aisa mahol bana sakti hain jo khameeryeast ki afzaish ke liye sazgaar ho. yeh andaam Nihanivagina mein kharish aur takleef ka sabab ban sakta hai. agar aap ko shak hai ke aap ko khameer ka infection hai, to aap ko tashkhees aur ilaaj ke liye apne dr se milna chahiye .allergy : aap ko kisi aisi cheez se allergy ho sakti hai jo aap ki mahvari ke douran aap ki jald ke raabtey mein aati hai, jaisay ke aik khaas brand ka pad, aap ke kapray dhoney ke liye istemaal honay wala sabun, ya fabric naram karne walay .hormonal tabdeelian : aap ke mahvari ke douran hormones mein utaar charhao bhi kharish aur deegar ghair aaraam da alamaat ka sabab ban sakta hai .agar aap apni mahvari ke douran kharish ka saamna kar rahay hain, to yeh zaroori hai ke achi hifzaan sehat par amal karen, pareshan kin cheezon se bachchen, aur agar kharish jari rehti hai ya is ke sath deegar alamaat jaisay kharij honay, badboo, ya dard hoti hai apne dr se baat karen
context: mahvari ke douran mujhe kharish kyun mehsoos hoti hai .

context/2: haan, 30 saal ki Umar ko aam tor par rajunoortimenopause ke liye bohat jaldi samjha jata hai. 40 saal ki Umar se pehlay rajunoortimenopause ko qabal az waqt rajunoortimenopause ya premature ovarian insufficiency   poi  kaha jata hai. qabal az waqt rajunoortimenopause ki kayi mumkina wajohaat hain, jin mein jeneati awamil, khud car qowat mudafat ki kharabi, baaz tibbi ilaaj, aur kuch qisam ki surgery shaamil hain. agar aap rajunoortimenopause ki alamaat ka saamna kar rahay hain aur un ke waqt ya shiddat ke baray mein fikar mand hain, to yeh zaroori hai ke aap apne doctor se baat karen .
context/3: kya rajunoortimenopause keliye 30 saal ki umar bohat jaldi hai?
context/4: woh Umar jis mein kisi ko mahvari aana band ho jati hai usay rajunoortimenopause kaha jata hai. rajunoortimenopause ki tareef is waqt hoti hai jab kisi shakhs ko lagataar 12 mah tak mahvari nah aati ho. Pakistan mein rajunoortimenopause ki ost Umar 51 saal ke lag bhag hai, lekin yeh 40 se 58 saal ki Umar ke darmiyan kisi bhi waqt ho sakti hai. taham, baaz tibbi halaat, surgery, ya ilaaj jaisay kimothrapi ya taabkari ki wajah se bhi rajunoortimenopause pehlay ho sakti hai .

response: qabal az waqt rajonoortipremature menopause rajonoorti hai jo 40 saal ki Umar se pehlay hoti hai. ibtidayi rajonoorti 40 aur 45 saal ki Umar ke darmiyan hoti hai. jo khawateen jald ya qabal az waqt rajonoorti ka tajurbah karti hain inhen osteoporosis aur qalbi amraaz jaisi bimarion ke khatray ko kam karne ke liye hormone therapy ki zaroorat par sakti hai .

response: rajonoortimenopause ke douran estrogen ki kami khawateen mein hadion ki kami ka baais banti hai. hadion ka nuqsaan hadion ko kamzor karne ka sabab ban sakta hai, jis ki wajah se haddiyan ziyada aasani se toot sakti hain. jab haddiyan bohat ziyada kamzor ho jayen to is haalat ko osteoporosis kehte hain .

response: jee haan. rajonoorti ke baad, khawateen ko dil ke doray aur faalij jaisay amraaz qalb ka ziyada imkaan hota hai. estrogen ki satah mein tabdeeli is wajah ka hissa hosakti hai, lekin is ki Umar barhti jarahi hai. is ki wajah yeh hai ke jaisay jaisay aap ki Umar barhti hai, aap ka wazan barh sakta hai aur sehat ke deegar masail peda ho satke hain jo aap ke qalbi amraaz ka khatrah berhate hain. apne dr se ahem test jaisay cholesterol aur high blood pressure ke baray mein poucheen .
context: kya rajonoortimenopause dil ki bemari ka khatrah barhati hai ?
context/0: rajonoortimenopause ke douran estrogen ki kami khawateen mein hadion ki kami ka baais banti hai. hadion ka nuqsaan hadion ko kamzor karne ka sabab ban sakta hai, jis ki wajah se haddiyan ziyada aasani se toot sakti hain. jab haddiyan bohat ziyada kamzor ho jayen to is haalat ko osteoporosis kehte hain .
context/1: kya rajonoortimeonpause hadion ki kami ka sabab banti hai ?
context/2: muharikaat se parhaiz karen, jaisay ke masala daar gizayein, sharaab, caffeine aur tanao. apne ghar ya kaam ki jagah par pankha rakhen aur jab aap ko garam flash shuru honay ka ehsas ho to aahista, gehri sansen lainay ki koshish karen .
context/3: mein garam chamkohot flashes ko kaisay rokkk sakti hon ?
context/4: qabal az waqt rajonoortipremature menopause rajonoorti hai jo 40 saal ki Umar se pehlay hoti hai. ibtidayi rajonoorti 40 aur 45 saal ki Umar ke darmiyan hoti hai. jo khawateen jald ya qabal az waqt rajonoorti ka tajurbah karti hain inhen osteoporosis aur qalbi amraaz jaisi bimarion ke khatray ko kam karne ke liye hormone therapy ki zaroorat par sakti hai .
context/5: kya 40 saal ki Umar mein rajonoorti hona theek hai ?

response: jinsi khwahish dono jinson mein Umar ke sath kam hoti jati hai, aur 40 aur 50 ki dahai ki khawateen mein kam khwahish aam hai, lekin alamgir nahi. kuch khawateen ne dilchaspi mein izafah kya hai, jabkay doosron ko koi tabdeeli nazar nahi aati hai. yaad rakhnay ki ahem baat yeh hai ke nafsiati, saqafati, zaati, bahami aur hayatiati awamil ki aik poori range mojood hai jo jinsi dilchaspi ko kam karne mein hissa daal sakti hai, lehaza agar khwahish mein kami aap ko pareshan kar rahi hai, to apne doctor ko bitayen. tibbi tashkhees kam jinsi khwahish ki kisi bhi bunyadi tibbi ya nafsiati wajohaat ki nishandahi kar sakti hai, jis ke baad munasib samjha ja sakta hai .

context: aap yakeeni tor par jaan len ke aap ne rajonoorti ka tajurbah kya hai jab aap ne aik saal tak aap ko mahvari nahi huwi hai. jab tak ke aap ka aik saal baghair haiz ke nahi guzar jata, tab bhi aap ko mehfooz jinsi tareeqo par amal karna chahiye agar aap haamla nahi hona chahtay hain. rajonoortimenppause ke baad, aap ko jinsi tor par muntaqil honay walay infection ke khatray ko kam karne ke liye latex condom ka istemaal karkay mehfooz jinsi tareeqo par amal karna jari rakhna chahiye .
context/0: ab jab ke mein ne rajonoorti shuru kar di hai, kya mujhe haamla honay ki fikar honi chahiye ?
context/1: jinsi khwahish dono jinson mein Umar ke sath kam hoti jati hai, aur 40 aur 50 ki dahai ki khawateen mein kam khwahish aam hai, lekin alamgir nahi. kuch khawateen ne dilchaspi mein izafah kya hai, jabkay doosron ko koi tabdeeli nazar nahi aati hai. yaad rakhnay ki ahem baat yeh hai ke nafsiati, saqafati, zaati, bahami aur hayatiati awamil ki aik poori range mojood hai jo jinsi dilchaspi ko kam karne mein hissa daal sakti hai, lehaza agar khwahish mein kami aap ko pareshan kar rahi hai, to apne doctor ko bitayen. tibbi tashkhees kam jinsi khwahish ki kisi bhi bunyadi tibbi ya nafsiati wajohaat ki nishandahi kar sakti hai, jis ke baad munasib samjha ja sakta hai .
context/2: jab se meri mahvari ruk gayi hai, meri sex ki khwahish kam ho gayi hai. kya yeh aam hai ?
context/3: bohat si khawateen rajonoorti ke douran Ilmi tabdeelion ki ittila deti hain. kaafi neend lena aur faaal rehne se madad mil sakti hai. taham, agar bhool jana aap ki roz marrah ki zindagi ko mutasir kar raha hai, to apne dr se milein .
context/4: rajonoorti ke douran mai cheezain bhool kyun jaati hun ?
context/5: kaafi neend lena aur jismani tor par mutharrak rehne se mood ke bdlao ko roknay mein madad mil sakti hai. aap tanao se nimatnay ke naye tareeqay seekhnay ki bhi koshish kar satke hain, jaisay muraqba ya journaling .
